1.content:
here are your choices:

Nala
Kiara (simba's daughter from the lion King 2)
Sarabi (Simba's mother)
Shenzi (the hyena)

or for someone not listed here, you can choose otheres
1.title: who?

11.content:
Simba's loving queen, What shoud she be when gaining,

a young cub, or a full grown lioness?
11.title: Nala

111.content:
"Ok Nala that's more then enough."
"Ah mom, come on i'm not even half vol. And Nala looked at what was left of their meal. A big hippo.
"Come on mom. I mean no one else is gonna eat it right."
"If you keep eating so much you will turn into a hippo!"
The last days Nala was starting to gain weight. First her mother thought that it was just a little growth spurt but if she kept eating like she did the past days she would become a fat lion.
"Not fair. I'm still hungry. and i still need to grow."
"You need to grow but not in the wrong size."
Nala felt her belly. It was bigger then a few days ago. She smiled.
She did't tell anyone not even Simba or her own mother but she liked the idea of becoming a fat lion.
"But if i want to become fat she need to let me eat first"

That night Nala woke up from the hunger. It was the middle of the night. Everyone else was asleep. Slowly she walked outside and walked to were the hippo was.
It didn't take long for Nala to find him and she started to stuff her face. She ripped pieces of meat of it and swallowed it without even chewing.
After about five-teen minutes all what was left of the hippo was inside her belly. She belched loudly. She felt again her belly that felt again bigger.
"I'm going to become such a fat lion."
She then heard someone in the bushes.
111.title: I'm hungry

choices: Simba hunts down a gazelle. Nala eats it.
1111.content:
It was Simba.

Nala ran over to pin him to the ground like she usually did.
"ooff!" Simba grunted as he noticed that his friend had turned a little heavier. "Your' a... little heavy"

"Ooops, I'm sorry" Nala blushed. She got off him. "What are you doing here in the middle of the night?"

"I want to hunt something by myself. It will soon be morning and I want to be worked up so I can catch my pray before it will have a chance to yawn" Simba explained.

"Without any grownups?" Nala asked.

"Well, I thought I'd bring you along for backup" he grinned "-and besides, the grownups allways tell us what we can do and when we can do it. I want to make my own decissions. Are you coming along?"
1111.title: The best friend.

11111.content:
"Sure. The grownups won't even let me eat as much as I want. If it's rebelling you want, I'm in" Nala said.
---

a few hours later Simba and Nala approached a sleeping gazelle flock.

"Okay. I'm gonna sneak up on the small, fat gazelle over there. When I'm close enough you approach from the opposite direction waking up the flock. Then I can get this one by surprise!" Simba explained.

Nala wasn't sure if she understood, but she walked over to where Simba had directed her waiting for his sign. She wasn't sure how she sould wake them up, but right on cue her stomach rumbled loudely.

Just as a few gazelles woke up, Simba ran in growling wildely. The entire flock scattered into one direction except for the small, fat gazelle who was so startled it fell over clumsily when trying to run. Just as it fell, Simba was over it.
--

Simba was in triumph! His first hunt! While he was dancing his victory dance, Nala started digging in with great hunger. It didn't take long before she laid back with her bloated belly...

The Next day Nala discovers her meal has added to her weight. She was now:
11111.title: Hunting for food.

111111.content:
"Hey Nala," Simba said when the female cub emerged the next morning, then he got a good look at her and stared.

"Hey Simba," Nala replied, then caught him staring, "what're you looking at?"

"You Simba replied, "you're so fat."

"I am not," Nala replied, but she knew she was lying, "I'm just a bit chubby."

"You're, fat," Simba said, "in fact, I reckon you're so fat you couldn't race me."

"I bet I could," Nala replied, "I bet I could still beat you."

"You're on," Simba said, "race you down to the waterhole."

"Get ready to lose," Nala replied, but inside she was worried, she knew Simba was in better shape than she was.

"Ready," Simba asked when Nala reached him, and when she nodded, they crouched, "on you marks, get set, Go!"

The cubs were neck-and-neck for a few paces, but Nala's weight started to get the better of her and she began to fall back. Simba soon disappeared, but she kept on going until she was exhausted and had to sit down.

Nala knew she'd lost, but it didn't make it any better when Simba returned, and said, "give up fatty?"

"Don't call me fatty," Nala growled.

"Fatty fatty fatty," Simba said in reply.

"Shut up," Nala said savagely.

"Make me," Simba taunted, "come on fatty, come and get me."

With a roar, or as much of one as she could muster Nala charged at Simba, but the prince was faster, always keeping one step ahead of the light coloured female, till she had to flop down again.

Simba took full advantage of Nala's exhaustion, running on ahead, then circling back around to catch the female with a surprise leap, knocking her over and pinning her, "fatty Nala fatty Nala."

"Shut up," Nala said struggling, "just shut up okay."

Simba fell silent, but didn't let Nala up, and between the female cub's weight and her exhaustion she couldn't manage to dislodge the male cub, who was grinning at her.

There was a throat clearing noise behind the cubs, and then someone said, "is that really any way to treat a friend?"

Simba whirled, and Nala, relieved of his weight struggled to see the mysterious speaker.
111111.title: Taunting

1111111.content:
"U-uncle Scar," Simba said when he saw the dark lion, "what, what are you doing out here?"

"I was taking a stroll," Scar replied, "not a usual activity for me, I know, but one I'm given to occasionally." When neither cub seemed to want to speak, he said to Simba, "you know that really not good behaviour, to bully a friend just because she's a little plump."

"But..." Simba began.

"After all," Scar said, cutting Simba off, "what would your mother think if she knew you were acting so, unbecoming of a future king."

"Unbecoming," Simba asked.

"Certainly," Scar said, "after all, a king should treat others with respect, don't you agree?"

Hanging his head a bit in shame, Simba said, "um yeah."

"Good," Scar said, "now you two play nicely, understood?"

"Yeah," Simba said, then turned to Nala, "sorry about teasing you."

"Ah, it's okay," Nala replied, "I actually kinda like being big."

"Really," Simba asked, "weird." Unbeknownst to the cubs, Scar had also heard this, and filed it for future reference.

Simab was still deciding what to do now, when , seeing Scar's retreating back, said, "hey, uncle Scar?"

"Yes Simba," Scar asked, turning to regard his nephew.

"Can we come with you?"
1111111.title: A friend

1111112.content:
Both cubs froze when they saw themselves staring up at a trio of hyenas. "Oh look Banzai," the female said "looks like we got us some snacks, tasty ones."

The last two words brought Simba out of his shock, and he shouted "run," before darting off.

Nala tried to follow Simba but with her weight she was no match for the hyenas. "Simba," she called desperately, "Sim-aaah!"

Simba stopped when he heard Nala's scream, but was so frightened that for a few moments he couldn't decide what to do.
1111112.title: Nasty Surprise

11111121.content:
For a brief while Simba considered going how to try to warn his father and the rest of the pride, but quickly discounted this, it would take to long and the hyenas would be able to do what they wished with Nala. No, the only answer was to try to help her alone.

It took, Simba a few moments to conquer his fear, but he did it, and then went back to watch, only to find the hyenas disappearing with Nala, so he began to chase after them.

Simba kept up the pursuit for quite some time, until the hyenas disappeared in the dark area his father had warned him to stay away from. He was worried for Nala, and wanted to carry on after the hyenas, but then he though that now he knew where the Hyenas were, he could go and warn the pride about them.
11111121.title: Out On A Limb

choices: A rich lady who spoils her.
111112.content:
Nala got up, but only for a moment as she wasn't able to lift her body so easily. Suddenly she heard the others screaming. Man was in the jungle and they had cages and guns. Everyone ran for the safty area, but Nala could barely get up again. She ran, but it was only a trot. It wasn't long before the men arrive and shot the gun. The pack that was at the rear saw her fall, but from the sound they heard knew it was only a tranquillizer. Simba wanted to go back for her, but his mother grabbed him by the back and carried him away.
"We can't just leave her."
"I won't lose you too. We can only hope she is safe. Men don't usually hunt lions unless they are going to keep them alive. She'll be safe, so we can only hope she finds her way home.
Nala slept for some time, but she finally awoke in a most unexpected place.
111112.title: Poachers

1111121.content:
Nala awoke to find herself in a cave of some sort, but a very straight one, "where am I?"

"You're in a zoo," said a voice behind her, and Nala turned to see an adolescent lion, "who're you?"

"I, I'm Nala," she replied, "where's aazoo?"

"What do you mean where's aazoo," the lion asked, "you don't even know what a zoo is?" When Nala shook her head the lion rolled his eyes, "oh, I don't believe..."

"Paruza, what going on in there," asked a female voice. the lion turned to look for a moment, before picking Nala up by her scruff and making his way towards the voice, "well?"

"Mail delivery," Paruza said as came to the lioness, part putting, part dropping Nala to the floor, "or rather 'female' delivery."

"And you took into your head to question her," the lioness said, not even having to guess at the lion's actions

"Well..." the lion began.

"Out," the lioness said, not unkindly, but firmly, "out, now." the lion stared for a few moments before retreating. Looking down at the cub, the lioness said, you'll have to excuse Paruza, he's a good soul deep down, but quite brusque." When the cub didn't seem to want to say anything, she asked, "oh, I'm sorry, what was your name?"

"Nala," she replied.

"What a beautiful name," the lioness said, "mine's Huruma." When the cub again seemed lost for words, she asked, "did Paruza tell you where you were?"

"Aazoo," Nala replied, "except I don't know where Aazoo is."

"Aazoo," Huruma said, then understood, "oh no little one, it's not Aazoo, it's 'a zoo', rather like saying, a cave or, a tree, you understand?"

"Sorta," Nala said, "is it big?"

"Not very, no," Huruma replied, but it's safe, if a little boring." Nala didn't say anything to this so she asked, "shall we go and meet the others?"

"Um, okay," Nala said, but then seemed to realise something, "did anyone else come in today?"

Huruma was silent for a moment, biting her lip, she knew this would come eventually, but that made it no easier to deal with, "no-one else came in today."

"So when are the others coming," Nala asked.

Huruma was silent for a few more moments, before replying, "Nala, there's no easy way to say this, but if a ny of your friends and family were coming here, they'd have come today."

"But no-one..." Nala started to say, "no, no, it can't be true." As her eyes welled with tears, she turned to Huruma, "they're coming aren't they, they have to."

Huruma felt her own eyes begin to well up, but managed to hold them back just long enough to gather Nala in her paws and lie down clutching the cub to her, "I'm sorry Nala, I truly am, but they're not coming."

"No," Nala said, crying into Huruma's fur, "no, no, please no."

"I'm sorry Nala," Huruma said, "I truly am, I just, I just wish there was something I could do for you."
1111121.title: Far From Home

11111212.content:
Nala fought back her sobs and glanced at Huruma. "Miss Huruma... is there any way to escape here?"

Huruma's eyes widened, as if the question had surprised her. "Well, Nala, I..." Her voice trailed off as she became lost in her own thoughts. "There is one way."

Nala, with tears as blue as the sky flowing down her face, looked back to Huruma. "Really? How?"

"I've heard rumors." Huruma explained. "I've heard of lions and lionesses who ate too much for the zoo to be able to properly feed them. But the zoo has a surplus, and that healthy stuff just won't stuff you." Huruma pointed to her belly. "Do you see my belly, Nala?"

Nala shook her head. "N-no."

"Exactly." Huruma agreed. "The zoo food is meant to be healthy and won't cause weight gain."

"If that food would make fat, we'd have been out of the place ages ago," a male voice called. Paruza strolled in and addressed the pair. "Those humans eat like kings, though. I've caught a few glimpses of the staff's fridge, and that thing's loaded with all kinds of fattening, processed human foods. If we could just--"

"Paruza!" Huruma interrupted. "You aren't seriously suggesting that we steal food from the zookeepers, are you?"

"Well, do you have any smarter ideas?" Paruza retorted. "Three lions could easily take one of them..." He eyed Nala for a moment. "Even if one of them is a cub."

"But the fridge is in the staff lounge!" Huruma argued. "It could be dangerous for us all, especially Nala."

"I don't hear her complaining!" Paruza noted. "What do you think, Nala?"

Nala gulped and prepared to make a decision. "Well, um, I think that...
11111212.title: Pulling Your Weight

choices: noticed this sancutary wasn't your typical sanctuary
everything is normal, Nala makes friends
111112122.content:
Nala sniffled,still trying to cope with the fact that she was in this place called “a zoo”, with no family or friends she was very frightened and lonely. “umm miss Huruma we could try” said Nala still trying to cope with her harsh truth, “okay hunny,but if it fail you promise to give up this idea of stealing food and help find an actual way to escape” Huruma gave Nala a sincere smile as the three lions begun their ascension to the edge of the habitat, once at the edge all looked at awe at not one of them saw this before, Huruma and Paruza usually stick to the center of the habitat so this was completely new to them as well. The lions were looking at nothing but a wall that was a least ten feet high, much higher than any of them could jump all they could see was all these tourist with great smelling food as Nala and the rest of the lions begun to drool from the aroma. The lions crept back into the center of the Habitat not knowing how to scale that wall and even if they did they would be spotted once one of them got out. “this was indeed a failure” state Huruma in a annoyed tone, “so, Paruza what's your next big idea?” while thinking about what to do next and how to get back to where they belong, none of the lions realized that big changes were about to happen.

Nala, Huruma, and Paruza, didn't realize, but, their conditions got worse as all the animals in the zoo begun to feel the strain of neglect for the zoo was in some economic hardships and didn't have the proper funds to feed all the animals or pay the employees correctly, Nala's stomach growled, breaking Huruma out of trance as she looked around like something was off as she opened her bony mouth to say “hey were is our food?” not knowing or realizing human troubles they thought something had happened and this was more frighting for this mean that their time is running shorter with every day. Meanwhile in the office of the administrator of the zoo, an important figure was shouting out things like Jail time and neglect to the soon to be previous zoo owner. The lady who was saying these things was not a very tall woman she was about 4”11 brown hair and eyes it seemed as if she probably always put her hair in a bun. She wore her WWF and P.E.T.A badges with proud as this woman was on a mission to save these starving animals. “by the end of the day your animals will be in sanctuaries all across the country and you will be shut down” empowered as she said that the sleazy zoo owner didn't hear a word of it as he was still trying to work off a hangover.

As the paperwork was done and filed, men all over the zoo begun tranquilizing all the animies for shipping, thankfully Nala and the other lions weren't to badly hurt, on the way don't Huruma hit her head a bit but she was out cold anyways. As all the lions were in cages and taken to a place in south Carolina called “Dan's sanctuary, this seemed like a new adventure for the lions but this just made Nala even further from her family and in a new environment that she doesn’t even know anything about, as the lions still slept off the tranquilizer another smaller animal watched the group, it was Dan's new golden retriever puppy only six weeks old and as energetic as the energizer rabbit. Nala was the first to come around once she did she...
111112122.title: ...we should at least try."

1111121221.content:
Nala awoke in a habitat about twice the size of the one at the zoo, at the edge of it. Through the bars of the cage, she could see another habitat near the lions' which contained a small golden retriever puppy.

A young-looking woman was feeding the puppy a peculiar substance. It appeared to be regular dog food, but she had added a sauce onto it from a bottle that read "Gainup."

Instantly after eating it, the puppy had gained at least twenty pounds and began to grow a belly. He seemed pleased by this, however, and barked in excitement.

The women then walked over to Nala and offered her a piece of beef with the same sauce on top of it. Although Nala enjoyed being a fat lion, she was not sure that the sauce would be good for her. She eventually decided to...
1111121221.title: Dan's Fattening Sanctuary

choices: Truly give in to the voice
Try to resist the voice (slim chance for that to happen...)
11111212211.content:
She decided to accept the food. She ate it, and almost immediately afterwards, she wanted more of it. And she got this voice in her head. 'When they give food to you, eat it. It's good for you to eat the food, bad for you to refuse. Always eat up. Don't make them think you don't like it. It's good to gain weight, too. You should be excited by it. Show them you like it. Show them how you live every second of it.'

She didn't really think about it, thought. She just knew it was right, somehow. But she really didn't know if she should obey or disobey this voice.

"There you go. Eat up. That's a good girl! You need the food to grow into the big lioness you should become!"
11111212211.title: ...accept the food

choices: Henry returns with a variety of meats.
1111122.content:
Nala awoke to find herself in the lush green jungles of Africa again, but she could sense it wasn't home. As she looked around she didn't recognize any of the trees or rocks. There weren't even any other animals around, let alone her family. She became certain she was somewhere else when she came to the end of the new home which was fenced with a metal fence. She tried climbing over it, but the barbed wire at the top kept people from sneaking in or out.
Feeling saddened she secluded herself by a nearby tree and watched the clouds float by, imagining they were her family slowly going further and further away. Her isolation was broken when an old, ugly lady with too much makeup on came by her cage. She spoke in a most disturbing voice that Nala could only mean she was her captor now.
Nala would've growled in fury at her, but after all she had been through she felt fatigue and hunger kick in, keeping her silent.
"Oh, you poor dear. Henry!" she shouted at a nearby man dressed in a white uniform. "The poor thing is starving. Give it something to eat."
"Yes, mam'" he responded.
"How dare you! You know to only address me by my last name!"
"Yes, Miss Bumblesbee."
"That's better. Now feed the thing a few pieces of steak and then hurry up. I have so many things to do and you can't be lollygagging all day."
She began marching off leaving Henry and Nala alone. "Sorry, girl, she's a witch I know. I'm actually a veterinarian, but she closed down the animal hospital I worked at. I was able to get this job here because you came and she needed someone to take care of you."
Nala felt a warmth from the human that was far different from the icy sensation she got from the ugly human earlier.
"Let's see what she got you to eat now." he said as he pulled out a drumstick almost entirely bare of meat. "THE OLD HAG!!! She has no feelings of others. She brought you because of a stupid fad to own wild animals and she doesn't even know anything about you. She thinks she could feed a lioness like yourself. This couldn't feed an ant. Probably a little something she had left over after she was eating last night."
Henry looked over at the little lioness and saw her larger than normal stomach, which gave off a soft growl.
"Hmm, you look like a big eat too and I bet you haven't eaten since before you were captured. Don't worry girl, I'll get you some food, just you wait."
Nala watched him walk off and even though she couldn't understand a word he just said, knew she had at least one human she could count on.
1111122.title: Life of Luxory

11111221.content:
Henry soon returned with some large steaks. Chucking one it, he saw Nala approach it, then after a few moments, begin to eat it, though at the speed she was going 'scoff' might have been a better term, she was eating like it was going to be taken away.

"You really are hungry aren't you, cub," Henry said, then dropped the other three steaks he was carrying not far away, "well here's the rest of it."

As soon as Nala finished one steak she began on the second, but only got about half-way in before having to stop, completely full. Looking around, she saw she still had over two and a half steaks left, and smiled, this was the life, all the food she could eat and no-one to tell her not to. Soon enough, the meat in her stomach began to digest, leaving her torpid and tired, and she didn't even attempt to fight it as sleep took her.

O!n waking, Nala looked at herself and smiled, her recent large meal had added yet another layer, albeit fairly thin, to her already outsized body. Remembering the rest of the stakes, she looked at them, suddenly feeling hungry, and so began to eat.

Finishing the rest of the second steak, she took the time to look around.
11111221.title: Chow Down On Cow

111112211.content:
Nala didn't look around far though, as her stomach was still far from full, and craving more. Finally she gave in to her hunger, and started on the third steak.

Nala was starting to feel full by the time she finished the third steak, but she still had some room left, and so started on the fourth. Unknowingly, Nala's binging was only going to help her achieve her goals faster, for each time she stuffed herself, she stretched her stomach that much more, including this time, when she managed to finish almost a quarter of the fourth steak before having to stop.

Finally stuffed, Nala lay down, trying to find a comfortable position, though as digestion took place this mattered less and less, because she was feeling more and more tired, and she finally fell asleep.
111112211.title: Eating Big

choices: She tries to walk it off
She tries to sleep it off
11111222.content:
Henry returned shortly with a wide variety of meats.

Nala was so hungry she didn't even bother smelling the food before digging in.

"wow, easy girl!" Henry had planned for the food to last out the afternoon, but by the rate Nala was eating it it seemed like he might have to go get more in the evening.

A bloated Nala rested after devouring all the meats Henry had brought for her.
"You sure love food don't you?" Henry said petting her head. Even though Nala was only slightly overweight now, Henry thought it was wierd seeing a cub at this state. what kind of pack had she used to be living with? did she miss them?

Nala didn't think much about her family currently as she was too bloated and tired to have her mind work properly. She tried to get up, but felt a pain in her belly. She would have to wait for meal to sink before she could do any drastic moves.
11111222.title: Henry returns with a variety of meats.

111112221.content:
Nala felt odd when she woke the next morning. At first she couldn't figure out why she felt odd, but when she opened her eves and looked back at herself, she realised she was bigger, fatter, than she had been yesterday.

Nala struggled for her feet, which was slightly harder now, and looked back at herself. Her sides weren't any bigger than they had been, but her belly was, hanging down a fair bit more than it had been.

This got Nala thinking, she wanted to be fat, but she also wanted to be mobile, and remembering she'd had slightly more trouble she'd had getting up, decided that she was going to gain weight only on her terms, and she'd start by getting rid of some of her last meal's effects.

Nala started by pacing out the boundaries of the enclosure, getting a feel for its size, before breaking into a lope, then a full-out run. It wasn't long, though, before she was exhausted.

Not long afterwards, Henry appeared, unceremoniously dumping a good-sized lump of meat in the enclosure.
111112221.title: Exercise

1111122212.content:
Even though Nala had decided to keep her weight in control, she was feeling very hungry and scoffed down all the meat in one sitting. Her belly poked out, but she wasn't exactly full yet. Nala glanced askingly at Henry, who seemed to get the point and brought Nala another piece of meat. Nala started munching on it, and slowly but surely finished all of it. She was feeling so full she felt a little uncomfortable, but in a way she liked the feeling. Her huge meal made her sleepy, and she drifted off.

We continue...
1111122212.title: Eat

choices: Try to get back to her family
111112222.content:
Nala decides to sleep off her meal, which isn't hard to do, seeing as all the food made her drowsy. A few hours later, Nala awakens from a dream of hunting down and eating an entire herd of gazelles.

"Too bad it was just a dream," she says, and gets up. Even though she is able to stand, she hadn't left the floor entirely.

"Wha?" she mumbles, looking down at her belly. She lets out a sharp gasp, as her belly was resting on the floor. The variety of meats she wasn't used to eating coupled with the nap had caused her to gain a large amount of weight.

Nala pokes her belly, causing it to ripple slightly, sending a warm feeling through her body. She begins to rub her belly and her thoughts turn towards her previous home. Should she go back? She was growing to miss her family. Then again, if she stayed, she could fulfill her desire of becoming a fat lion. What should she do?
111112222.title: Bad Idea

1111122221.content:
Nala couldnt help but feel her belly drag on the ground, she just loved the sensation. It was safer in here, no hyenas, no mothers to boss you around, just do whatever you want to do. And you wanted to get FAT.

When Henry returned he couldn't help but jump a little at how the little lioness grew over her nap.
"Well, looks like it might be feeding time *gulp* again." Henry said as he grabbed another asortment of meat from the "meat locker" where he stored all the meat and food that he bought for the lioness.

Jumping up and down slightly, causing her fat to jiggle and wobble like never before, Nala couldn't wait for her next meal, and once she got her maw around them she just tore into the meat like never before. Her belly grew out farther and farther, her sides growing out while here legs were becoming plump and her rump was becoming large. Even her tail became thick at the base while another chin was added.

After finishing the meal, she then took another nap on her large bed of a belly.
1111122221.title: Hungery lioness

11111222211.content: To say Nala was obese would certanly be an understatement, she had become a blob of her former self. After a week Nala lost all ground clearance, her belly constantly touching the ground and was actualy pushing her up a little bit. Her sides stretched out about six inches more from both sides and her chest jutted out past her front legs. Her legs had plumped up to the point where they sagged out and threatened to cover up her very meaty paws. It wasn't like she needed to move anyway as Henry just hand fed Nala after the second day. Nala's neck was swallowed in fat and formed three chins that sagged onto her meaty chest. Her cheeks plumped to the point where she could just lean her head to one side and it would form into a pillow. Nala's tail was so fat that she had a hard time keeping it up, it now resembled a large sausage with a roll at the base. Her butt was somthing to see, almost as wide as her, it billowed out into nice and firm cheeks, some might say they resembled a little like small water filled beach balls.
11111222211.title: Princess of Fat

choices: Feed Nala all the food in the meat locker
111112222111.content:
Another week had gone by slowly it seemed, which Nala enjoyed during her feasting
as she now has become a gluttonous blob of rolls, jiggling blubber and flabby fat.
The young and little Nala cub wasn't so little anymore as her fat size had
increased more. Her form had spread out wider and bigger in all directions by
several feet, she was now the fat size of a hippo. A four ton hippo to be exact.
Nala was so fat that her roll covered legs engulfed her pudgy paws deep into her
bloated leg fat, her belly had lifted her up more to a height level to where
Henry could now stand up and feed her at a level with his chest, her front of
Nala's chest oozed out further in front of her which meant Henry had to lean up
against her to feed her, her sides her wide as a hippo was long- as she was long
as was loaded with bulges and jiggly flab and rolls, her back had fattened up
over the level of her head to a domish height of four feet but had lardy and big
bulges itself, the fat that used to be between her widespread hindlegs was now
behind her had swelled out more to continue her blobish and round appearence on
all sides of her, her fat rump swelled bigger to the size of large beanbags
and were easily jiggled and bouncy atop the fattened low backend of her abdomen,
her tail was starting to become a fat blob with a few more rolls but bulged out
now thicker at the base against her fat and wide rump but got less thicker as
it got to the tail end where her tail tuft rests like on a wobbly shortened
tail, upon and around her mass of neck rolls had now thickened and three more
jiggly rolls added while her back had fattened up it pulled her upper neck rolls
upward as well in steps also the lower part of her neck rolls sagged downward
over her front bloby chest to leave the last first neck roll from her fat
fore shoulders to spill out and lay on the ground, Nala's face was rounder to
meet out to the wideness of her neck rolls and sag down below her head some.
111112222111.title: A Week Later

choices: Nala awakens in a nature preserve.
1111122221111.content:
Beside getting fat Nala was also extremely lazy now. It wasn't her choice, but her fat body was impossible for her to move under her own strength and eating so much made her sleepy.
As it turned out, a case the police were on had finally led them to the rich lady that had purchased Nala. As a result she lost her entire fortune, but this was also big news for Nala. Henry was told them about Nala and though they didn't believe him at first that she was fat beyond belief they could only stare when they saw her. After a little discussion with them Henry was disappointed that they couldn't return her to the wild yet, but glad that they agreed to move her to a more spacious location. Her old one had become quite small for an animal her size. Moving her was easier said than done as they had to get a crane to lift her off the ground and put her on the back to a large truck all the while she dreampt of food. Henry wasn't entirely sure what kind of place she'd end up at next, but he promised her that she'd be by her side as long as it took for her to find her way home.
1111122221111.title: Moving Nala

11111222211111.content:
Nala awoke in an unfamiliar white room, which was also quite cool, though she could only feel it on her nose. Her vantage point revealed little, so she tried to change position, but she was far too fat, and all her struggles did was set her bloated body quivering slightly.

Further examining her situation, Nala discovered there was a tube taped to the side of her muzzle, and so she sucked at it wondering what was going to come out. What came out was a thin, light brown soup that tasted slightly of meat. At the taste, her stomach rumbled hungrily, and so she sucked greedily at the tube, little knowing that the liquid was specially medicated to keep her healthy while reducing her weight.

Time passed, and Nala's weight dropped dramatically, not as fast as she'd gained it, but still quickly. After two months, she'd gone from immobile, to merely chubby, and while this was good for her health, it was less so for her attitude, losing the weight she'd prised so much had made her moody and depressed.

Finally, after three months, an exit from the room appeared in what had been a dead end until now. With nothing else to, she decided to explore it. She was only a few steps through the new hole when there was a bang her, and she turned to see the hole closed, blocking her off from her temporary home. For a few moments, she pawed vainly at the blockage, before turning to examine the new world in which she was trapped.
11111222211111.title: New Captivity

11111222211112.content:
Nala awoke to find herself resting under a tree, but not one she remembered being in the enclosure. Looking around as far as she could, her surroundings confirmed that she was no longer in her enclosure, but a much larger area. For a few moments she was interested enough to try exploring, but any effort was is vain, she was so fat her paws no longer touched the ground, and in any case she could barely move her legs for their blankets of fat.

Several days passed before Nala's paws were able to reach the ground, and several weeks before she was able to walk around without her belly dragging on the ground. In that time, and with nothing else to do, she explored the enclosure. It was easily five or six times as big as her last one had been, but far less lush. In addition, the people keeping her put the food up on poles and trees rather than just feeding her hand-to-mouth, so even more time passed before she was thin enough to climb up for a decent meal.

Three months passed before Nala was finally deemed healthy enough to move.

Nala was just relaxing under a tree, having taken the third morsel of the day when she felt a sting in her shoulder. Looking down she saw a tranquilliser dart in her should, which she plucked out, but her vision quickly faded as the tranquilliser took effect. When Nala awoke she looked around to see where she was.
11111222211112.title: Bigger Enclosure

111112222112.content:
One morning, there was a commotion at the other end of the enclosure, the end rarely used, which struck Nala's curiosity, so she decided to have a look. This took a while, due to her comparatively massive weight, and so, by the time she had reached the site of the commotion, the human, presumably Henry, was long gone, and the cheetah cub he'd dumped in was almost recovered from the tranquillisers.

Although still a little wobbly, the cheetah cub approached Nala, and with the air of one conducting an experiment, pushed a paw into her fat, and gasped at how far in it sank. After this was done a second time, she croak, "hey, stop it."

Surprised, the cheetah cub came round to Nala's head, and asked, "you're alive?"

"Yep," Nala replied, "aren't you?"

"I sure am," the cheetah replied, "but I mean, you're so, fat."

"Uh-huh," Nala said, "good food here."

"As may be," the cheetah said, "and a little weight doesn't hurt I'm sure, but all of this?"

"I like it," Nala said, "maybe you would too if you tried it."

"Highly unlikely," the cheetah said, "by the way, what's your name?"

"Nala," she replied, "yours?"

"Epesi," the cheetah replied. He though for a moment, then said, "so what's to do round here?"

"Eat," Nala replied, "sit around, get fat."

"No thanks," Epesi said, "I think I'd rather run myself ragged than get to be a fatty like you."

"Hey, don't knock it till you've tried it," Nala said.

"I don't want to try it," Epesi said, then got a calculating grin on his face, and disappeared from Nala's view. A few moments later, he pushed his paw into her side, "like that?"

"No," Nala replied, but this, for some reason, only made Epesi do it all the more, "stop it."

"Make me," Epesi said, removing both his paws for a moment, before jumping up onto Nala's back.

"You'll pay for it one of these days," Nala said, "just you wait."

"Oh I will," Epesi said, "I'll be waiting, and I'll probably be doing it a long time."
111112222112.title: Nala Get's Company

1111122221121.content:
The first few days with Epesi were truly hard for Nala, what with the cheetah cub constantly reminding her of her weight. She wasn't idle though, thinking of a way to get the cheetah back for his teasing. Unfortunately, every plan she came up with required overwhelming him first, and there was no way to do that in her current state, so she had to lose some weight.

The days that followed were in a sense even harder, Nala had to both lose weight and keep her plan secret from Epesi. She was helped by the fact that the cheetah cub never gave up his teasing, hardening her resolve.

Progress was slow, but it was there, oh so slowly Nala's belly went from dragging along the ground to not even touching it. Finally, with her belly merely down to her shins she decided to implement her plan.

At the next meal, Nala said, "Epesi."

"Yes fa-!" Epesi began before Nala barged into him, knocking him down. "-aaii," he continued as he felt his ankle twist, "what was that for?"

"You were going to call me 'fatty' again weren't you," Nala asked.

"Well, yes," Epesi said, now, can you please get up, I think I twisted something."

"Gladly," Nala replied, rising. Epesi tried to copy her but had real trouble because one ankle was twisted, useless.

"What did you do that for anyway," Epesi asked.

"You were always calling me fatty," Nala replied, "so I thought I'd give you an idea of what it's like."

"By twisting my ankle," Epesi asked nastily.

"It'll come right," Nala replied, "you just won't be doing any exercise for a while, now eat up."

"No way," Epesi replied, "if I'm going to be lame I don't need to..."

"Oh but you do," Nala replied, knocking Epesi over almost gently before lying on top of him, "now eat."

Epesi wasn't hungry, but he could feel the weight of Nala's belly pressing down on him, so he ate as much as he could, then she stuffed even more in till he was moaning. After this, he found as comfortable a position as he could, and as his digestion made him torpid, fell asleep.
1111122221121.title: Long Road To Revenge

11111222211212.content:
Epesi spent the next week under Nala's tremendous girth. It wasn't only cramped for him, but even if he didn't get a sprained ankle it was impossible to even exercise under the massive lioness. He spent most of his time lying on the ground trying to get comfortable. Whenever meals came Nala moved to hide Epesi from view so that Henry didn't see he was stuck under her and each meal after she ate her fill then pushed his face into the meat. He then was forcively munched down the meat until he was full, but Nala was never satisfied with even a scrap of meat left, let alone several complete steaks. She forced him to eat it and left him with an overstuffed stomach. The first couple of days didn't reveal any change, but by the end of the week Epesi had a bulging gut that went down to his ankles if he could've ever stood up. It was also at this point that he discovered his added girth had given him enough room to pop out from under Nala and to his freedom. His ankle was also much better and he was ready to run again.
"Nice try Nala, but your plan didn't work as well as you wanted."
"Think again. I knew you'd get away sooner or later, but you'd have to become like me, you'd have to become fat. And when you reach a certain level of obesity you will soon discover going back isn't possible, epescially in this case."
"Liar, you slimmed down yourself."
"Up to this, but inside I could feel stomach yelling for food. Each day it yells for more and once you give into it you might not be able to escape it and with the food we eat here gain weight is no problem."
Epesi didn't say another word and ran off. He didn't want to believe what she said. He looked at himself and saw his fattened body. His larger paunch and meatier legs. Looking in a lake he saw his neck had layers as well. He was disgusted at this and hated Nala for it. He was ready to run, but suddenly...
11111222211212.title: Fattened to Freedom

111112222112121.content:
...he realised he was feeling tired. Not sleepy tired, but run a long way tired, the result of his underexercised muscles and extra weight. Well he'd lose it soon enough he told himself, he'd show Nala he was made of tougher stuff than she was. Of course, he realised, feeling the weight of his body, it would probably take a while, but he'd get there in the end.

Nala chuckled to herself watching Epesi try to exercise, no matter how hard he tried, she thought, he would never lose the weight now, there was just too much of it, and soon there'd be more.

Epesi worked relentlessly over the next few days, struggling to control his hunger, and exercising to exhaustion, but successes were small.
111112222112121.title: Lost Condition

1111122221121211.content:
One week passed, and then two, and slowly but surely Epesi's weight began to diminish. This wasn't to say thinness didn't have a price, for it did, the cheetah became more and more curt and short tempered.

Epesi's determination fascinated Nala, but his foul mood was almost unbearable, and so, as the end of the third week approached, the obese lion cub knew she had to make a choice shee could either put up with her cheetah companion's moods until he was thin again, and hope things would improve then, or try another ploy to make him fat, and this time one that couldn't fail no matter how hard he tried.
1111122221121211.title: Step By Step

1111122221121212.content:
A week passed before Epesi knew he was in trouble. No matter how hard he worked, he never seemed to get anywhere, and this left him drained, both physically and emotionly.

Nala had also noticed the change in Epesi, and was worried, not about the fact that he wasn't losing weight, but about the fact that he was almost killing himself trying to do so. Finally, she could take no more, and approached the cheetah, who was resting after yet another grueling exercise regime, "Epesi."

"What 'dyou want Nala," Epesi asked, bitterly, "come to crow your superiority over me?"

"No, not at all," Nala said, "I just wanted to talk to you."

"Go ahead then," Epesi said.

"Well, you've been going on like this for a week now," Nala said, "you've barely lost any weight and you're an emotional wreck, maybe it's time you finally accepted the obvious, you're never going to be thin again."

"Don't you ever say that," Epesi growled, "I will be thin again, I will."

Nala had been taken aback by Epesi's sudden change, but then changed herself. "Look around you," she replied, "this place is tiny, there's no where to go, and no reason to go there, there's no reason for you to be thin." With that, she turned, and waddled off.

It was Epesi's turn to be taken aback. What Nala had said had never occured to him before, and even though his brain sought to reject it, he knew he had to consider what she'd said. Finally he had to admit it, being thin was never going to be more than an intellectual bonus in here, so would it worth spending the time to get there?
1111122221121212.title: Losing Hope

111112222112122.content:
...he smelled meat. He'd been so angry at Nala that he'd lost track of time, and now lunch had arrived. He wanted to ignore it, but his stomach was growling, and the smell was making his mouth water.

Finally unable to resist his hunger, Epesi moved over to the feeding area, shooting a poisonous glance at the smirking Nala, before looking at the meat. Close up, it was even more alluring than it had been at a distance, but in the back of his mind was the need to get thin, and eating too much would definitely set him back.
111112222112122.title: Free Meal

choices: he gives up and waits to be feed again
1111122221121221.content:
That little voice in the back of his mind telling him only to nibble however was overpowered by the large booming voice in his fattened belly screaming at him to eat and leave not 'even' a nibble.

He tore into his food like he hadn't eaten in days even though it was only hours. He attacked the meat with such starving speed that the smug Nala briefly wondered if his cheetah speed had transfered from his leg's to his mouth as she too began to resume her meal.

Minutes later the young cheetah lying down panting after it had devoured the several steaks in record time. The meal already showing itself on him as his stomach protruded a fewe more inches to either side. If he were to stand no doubt his gut would brush against the ground as it moved side to side. It hadn't shown anywhere else yet but that would come later after digestion.
1111122221121221.title: Scoff it down

choices: He doesn'r run much before collapsing in exhaustion
He managaes several laps round the pen
11111222211212211.content:
A few minutes later he struggles slowly to his feet. Episei actually found himself tired from as little effort as standing took. He shot another heated glare at the fat lioness who was smiling at him with a 'I told you so' look.

"What are you looking at." Growled the fattened cheetah.

"Oh nothing." Said Nala coyly. "Just a fat little cheetah in denial." Her voice turned serious."Just accept youll never be skinny again. Trust me youll be a lot happier when you embrace your fatness like I did

"I WILL!" The cheetah shouted. "I will never be like you. I'm gonna be normal again and then I'm gonna find a way to escape this place."

"Uh huh." said Nala "Keep telling yourself that till your to fat to move." She then lay her head down and went for a sleep til the next meal.

Episei shook his head turned away from her and began his run.
11111222211212211.title: He try's to run

111112222112122111.content:
Epesi made a good start on his running, but it quickly tailed off as the cheetah's larger size and lack of condition both gained in his week under Nala's domination took its toll. Indeed, he soon went from running to jogging, before dropping to staggering, barely able to keep upright.

Perhaps Nala was right, he thought after he'd recovered slightly, perhaps he was destined to end up like her. It wasn't a thought he liked though, and so, strugged on, though it was obvious to everyone but him that he wasn't doing any good. Finally, he had to accept defeat for now, lying down. Of course, without his constant concentration on a task, digestion took its toll, and he was soon asleep.
111112222112122111.title: No Way In Heck

1111122221121221112.content:
He awakened to a smell overpowering his nostrils. He had smelled in many a time since he got here but it seemed as he got bigger the smell became stronger.


He opened his eyes and saw the source of the intoxicating smell was his mid day meal. Several thick steaks just lying there waiting for him. To thew left of the meat the only other occupant was already halfway through hers and showed no signs of being full.

Again he got the unpleasant sensation of his stomach growling painfully. It wasn't enough that he had eaten the same amount just two hours before but he now felt again like he hadn't eaten in days. His brain was telling him that he didn't need to eat the steaks right now just because they were there. Back home he was lucky to get one steak's worth of meat a day and his stomach didn't growl then.

His stomach however seemed to become a lot more vocal than in Africa and seems to think it's in charge now. It was churning and growling very loudly which was giving the fat and torpid young cheetah the worst hunger pains any big cat had ever had.

He couldn't give in less be just like Nala.

Yet those steaks were calling out to be eaten.

What should he do.
1111122221121221112.title: He smells food

11111222211212211121.content:
As he was mentally debating whether we should eat or not the rest of his body seemed to have made the decision for him. He waddled back over to the feeding area and set himself down in front of the meat before he even realized what he had done.

"Good to see you're coming round." Said Nala as she polished off her lunch.

Episei blinked in surprise at the statement as he realized were he was. He looked over the food in front of him. The pile of succulent meat just tempting him to eat. To get fatter till he, like Nala said, couldn't move.

He hated to admit it but since he got all this extra weight he'd been a lot warmer than before when he was his near skeletal cheetah self. Also laying down on the ground was infinitely more comfortable now he had a pillowy layer to cushion him.

He tried to deny it but a part of him was slowly starting to like being fat. Of course the much larger part of him was still set on being thin but was fading as progress towards that was diminishing.

Nala looked at his roommate with interest. He seemed to be fighting his hunger but losing.

She smirked as she watched the cheetah begin to attack his meat again. 'Soon he'll love being fat just like me'.

The young cheetah paid her looks no mind as he ate like nothing else mattered. Mostly because liked Nala he was starting to believe that nothing else 'did' matter
11111222211212211121.title: Give in and eat

111112222112122111211.content:
The two fat not so wild cats heard footsteps approach them. It was their human carer Henry walking towards them with their next meal.

Nala licked her lips in anticipation. She looked over at her Episei and smiled when she saw in look at the meat with wide fearful eyes.

Henry put the meat inside right infront of their noses. It was significantly larger than their normal seven steak with three additional in each.

"Growing cat's need more food and I have noticed youve gotten bigger since you got here." Said the human. Refering to their heigh not there weight before he left.

Nala wasted no time digging into the pile of steaks. All the while keeping an eye on the reluctantly porty Cheetah.

He looked up at the tower of meat with mixed feeling. This was a test. If he gave into his stomach which was screaming at him to eat then he'd be just like Nala. Though he must admit from the weight he had already put on that being fat was not as bad as he first thought.

Or he could ignore his stomach and control how he eats rather than stuff his face like he had been doing which always left him sleepy and to full to excercise.
111112222112122111211.title: Next meal. Episei's final choice

choices: after the meal the two talk
1111122221121221112111.content:
It was at that moment that reality finally kicked him for the cheetah. He stood up and looked over himself. Fat hanging off every part of him. His belly still laying on the floor even though he was standing. He looked up at the pile of meat and realised he no longer looked at them with disgust but with delight. Finally he came to a conclusion that the lioness came to on his first day here.

'I'll never be thin again' He thought. He looked over at Nala who was still tearing into her food but still managing to give him a warm and knowing look.

He nodded and looked at the meat and with the first smile he's had in weeks began to devour the steaks with happy gusto.

Nala looked at her 'room-mate' and was pleased to see he was digging into his meal with a happy look on his face. He'd finally accepted the fat part of himself and could now move onto 'bigger' things. Mabye now they could be friends.
1111122221121221112111.title: Listen to his stomach

11111222211212211121112.content:
Once Epsi finaly realised his fate he quickly let himself go to say the least. Now that he was incouraged to rest and relax, the little cheetah wasn't so little any more.

Under one of the trees in the inclosure sat two bloated once wild cats, Epsi and Nala.

Before, Epsi was quite obese, now he was truely massive and weighed more than a morbidly obese full grown cheetah. His belly oozed out two feet to each side and pushed the cheetah's bloated front legs off the ground. The skin was stretched along the belly to the point that it distorted the spots. Epsi even began to form a very meaty chest that pushed the white tuff of fur on his chest into his face. A large roll of fat replaced the cheetah's neck and pushed his large grape fruit sized cheeks up, making his short muzzle even shorter. Epsi's large rear even covered his rear paws and stretched over a foot to each side. It also started to swallow his tail, that was as thick was as a human fore arm.

Next to him was Nala, who now looked more like a gigantic blob of yellow pudding. Her stomach was now eight feet wide and pushed under all four legs, which were covered in two feet of flab, making her completly immobile. Nala's back rose up above her head and was pushing her ears down. Her head was even sinking into her fat neck a little, giving her a cushon that completly surrounded her head. Her even meatyer chest, about the size of two large bean bags filled with water, also made for more cushoning. Although her butt swallowed up half of her tail, it was still poking out, it was even a half a foot wide, making the small tuff of fur on the end look miniscule in side.

Though the continuous feeding was fun and all, the two cubs were becoming board.
"Nala, it's been a week sense I decided to get fat like you" Epsi said "and I can understand why you want to get fat, but after you get to a point there isn't much anything else to do."
"You do have a point" Nala replied, "but there must be somthing we can do."
11111222211212211121112.title: Letting Himself Go

111112222112122111211121.content:
It was then that a sound reached their ears that they hadn't heard in weeks.

They turned their gaze and watched as the enclosure door opened and another young exotic animal walked in before the door slammed shut bejhind it making the animal jump in surprise.

Nala and Episei looked at the animal which had yet to notice them before turning their gazes to each other and smiled knowingly.

They suddenly realised that for the past several weeks that what had been entertaining them was the contest challenge of one trying to get the other to give up. Episei on getting thin and nala to stop encouraging him to get fat. Since Episei finally admitted defeat their was nothing to do.

They hoped what this one put up as much fight as he did before he gave up cause they weren't going to be leaving this enclosure for awhile. If ever again.

The animal turned and saw them. Making it gasp in surprise. They got a good look and saw it was
111112222112122111211121.title: Another Pet

1111122221121221112111212.content:
"Are you sure putting it into a confined space with predator cats is the best idea maam?" Said Henry the carer.

"Of course it is." Said the lady of the manor. "My little sweety's would never hurt anything. Look at them arn't they precious." She gushed.

'Oh they're precious alright' Thought Henry as he looked at the two obese feline's. Not that he could say he found them disgusting since he deliberatly feed them many times what he was told to everyday to make up the guilt of having helped in their captivity. Yet it wasn't particularly pleasent to see to young animals one of which should be near skeletal fat enough to use their stomach's as pillows.

Then again that was a plus since he wouldn't have to worry about finding animal bones in the enclosure later.

In the enclosure the new resident backed away from the two senior ones in terror.

"P-p-please d-dont eat m-me" Cowered the young...
1111122221121221112111212.title: A differant kind of animal

choices: Epesi decides to talk to Matu alone.
11111222211212211121112121.content:
"Relax, with all the food they serve us here you'd hardly be considered an appetizer to us." replied Nala, though he didn't seem to believe her.

"Ma, always said never believe a cat cause they just wanna eat you up." he replied.

"Don't worry, even if we wanted to eat you we're beached whales. We couldn't chase you left alone move beyond a waddle. What's your name anyway. I'm Epesi and this is Nala."

"I'm Matu." he replied. "And Ma always said that you should never judge a cat's appearance. They can strike like lightening."

Suddenly, Nala released a belched and little Matu bolted away.

"He's not going to be so easy to fatten up." said Epesi. "He's afraid of us and I doubt he'll want to make himself appear more appetizing to us."

Nala added, "He's not going to be as easy as you and he appears to be quite a bit more energetic. He'll be much more difficult to fatten if he run laps like that."

"Well things were getting boring. We'd best decide the best way to handle him."

"And so the Circle of Fat begins again." joked Nala.
11111222211212211121112121.title: The Circle Of Fat

choices: Have 'fun' at Nala and Epsei's expense
111112222112122111211121211.content:
It was only minutes after their first meeting with their newest roommate that the blobular duo heard the familiar sound of lunch.

Well technically it was the sound of their enclosure bing opened but that was the sound they associated with food now. Ordinarily they would have got up and wandered over to their bowls were Henry put food in from outside, but since theyve long lost theyre ability to move the carer saw no danger in just walking in anddumping the steak in front of them and, if need be, hand feed them when they couldn't reach the steak's on the floor past their pillowing flab. It wasn't even remotly dangerous since they also associated Henry with dinner and to bite him might mean no more food.

The pile's had certainly grown. 10 steaks each piled right in front of them, glistening with fat and looking all to irresistable. Too both of them this time. Henry had barely put them down before the two cat's started devouring them like they were air.

Off in the corner he'd backed himself into Matu watched in a sort of morbid fascination as the two obese cats gorged themselves on more meat than he'd seen any lion or cheetah eat at once.

Henry watched the two for several seconds with a sort of guilty look before turning back to the door, he left for but a few moments before bringing in a third load of food. Causing the young wild pig to gape a little.

A tower food was placed in front of him, no where near as big as the other two but it was not limited to meat. Root's berry's, and other thing's he'd been eating before he was captured where laid in front of him as well as the five steak's.

"I didn't know what you'd be eating this time of year so I gave you a bit of everything." Henry said with a smile, as if this animal could understand him.

He was interupted by a sort of growling a mewling sound. Both animal and man turned and looked at the source of the sound.

Epsei and Nala had finished their meat.....sorta. They had reached the limit that either could reach on their own, Epsei couln't reach the last two and Nala the last four.

Matu looked at them curiously as they struggled against their fat futily to reach their breakfast, they tried pawing themselves foward but their limbs just bounced back into their same unmovable position.

"*sigh* I better go feed them. Bye" Henry said before going over to hand feed the carnivore's.

Matu watched wide as the human picked up the steaks and held them up to the big cat's mouth's and let them eat right out of his hand's. They even licked his hand's desperatly for what was left on them and his only response was to laugh slightly at the ticklish sensation.

Henry stood up, pulling a sanitary wie out and giving his slobber cover hand's a clean.

"Well. See you at lunch." He said before leaving.

Matu watched the human go before turning back to Nala and Epsei. Those to had every oppertunity to bite the human but didn't. Instead they actually begged him to feed them, they couldn't even reach those hunks of meat inch's away from them. That's when he saw clearly what they were.They're feet didn't even touch the ground, they could hardly eat by themselves.

They were.....helpless.

He smiled as he dug into his first steak.

Oh he was going to enjoy this.
111112222112122111211121211.title: Realisation

111112222112122111211121212.content:
Later that night when all had fallen asleep, Epsei's eyeshot open.

He looked from side to side as best he could. Next to him Nala snored away, her head nestling into the fat beneath it like a pillow.

Satisfied that his friend wouldn't wake up Epsei scanne for his latest room mate.

What he saw didn't surprise him in the least.

Matu was wide awake, staring at the two feline blobs across from him with terrified eyes. Clearly to scared to sleep should Epsei or Nala decide he was a 'midnight snack'.

"You alright?" Epsei whispered. The warthog just pushed back further against the cage.

"Stay away." Said Matu nervously. "I won't be eaten!"

Epsei rolled his eyes. It was time to straighten this mess out.

"Look Matu, we already told you, we can barely move a few steps, heck Nala can't move at all! And I'm gonna be the same way before long."

Matu didn't relax for a second. "Yeah right. My Ma saw my Pa get killed by a Lion. Pa managed to butt it over a cliff, it was almost dead when Pa found it at the bottom but it still break his neck with its one good paw. Cat's aint never helpless."

Epsei stared at the young Warthog for a second before coming to a decision. "You don't believe me? See for yourself." With that Epsei gave a pained grunt and began to rise.

Matu dashed to another corner as he saw the cheetah rise. Shouting all the way. "I KNEW IT! I'M NOT GONNA LET YOU....Eat...me?" His cry's dulled as he got a good look of the now standing Epsei.

The look on the cheetah's face was one of pure concentration, if he had no fur you'd see the skin was red and flushed like a bodybuilder after lifting a bar bell overhead. Matu could see the blubber that despite Epsei standing up still pooled on the floor, Not to mention Epsei's feet (the only barely visible part of his legs left past the overhanging fat) were shaking and buckling under the strain. The weight was simply to much for the young cheetah to bare.

Then he stepped foward.

Matu swore he never saw so much happen at once. Every inch of Epsei's fat jiggled from the slight movement of the step like someone was violently shaking it, it pulled him in every direction possible and actually caused him a little pain as the fat hanging over his face from his back and sides slapped him.

Then he collapsed with a huge thud on the habitat floor, out of breath and sweating like he ran across the savanha and back...twice.

Nala stirred in her sleep but did not awaken.

Epsei, still breathing hard looked up at Matu who now had a stupified exprssion on his face.

"Now do *wheeze* believe *gasp* your safe?"

Matu was still astonished. "Wha...? Wh, what happened to you?"

Epsei smirked. "The same thing that happened to her." He said indicating Nala. He yawned as his eye's drooped.

He mumbled out the last words "And the same thing that's gonna happen to you." With that he was out for the count.

Matu's eyes widened in horrwe. 'Happen to me!?'
111112222112122111211121212.title: Proof

choices: Nala dreams of non-stop eatting for years
111112222112122111211122.content:
The two bloated and blob cats thought about what to do over lunch and dinner, that night Epsi finally
broke the silence besides them gorging on their stacks of fatty meat. With Henery having had hand
fed them both of course.

"Ugh, I think I might have an idea, if you'd like to hear it."
Nala turned her head some making her flab of her entire body wobble and jiggle in a slow
motion. "Well, sure. I'd really like to hear this idea of yours."
"Alright," Epsi begun, shifting himself a bit to face her. "we could have an eating contest."
the morbidly obese cheetah cub smirked mischivously at his plan he'd thought up.
He'd enjoy to see Nala much fatter. "We both see who can eat the fastest and who can
eat the most of those meats the human feeds us. The looser gets half his food, the
winner gets the loosers half of food and more to eat... which gets more fatter than the
looser."
At first Nala looked at Epsi with wide and shocked eyes, then grinned. "Yes, an eating
contest sounds like a good idea." She giggled in delight, sending her flab into rippling
waves all over her body which tickled her since her belly was spread out on the ground
like a bed under her. But the rest of her body had started to catch up the more she
ate. "Let's do it. Starting tomorrow morning."
Epsi smiled and nodded. "Okay, tomorrow then. Good night and have wonderful
dreams."
Nala would have nodded but her thick neck around her head prevented her from
doing so. "Tomorrow. Good night." She knew she'd have dreams alright, dreams
of eatting tons of food and getting all the more fatter.
111112222112122111211122.title: An Eating Contest

111112222112122111212.content:
When reality outside of his bowl faded in again for Epesi, he was disgusted. Despite his best efforts, he'd again given in to his hunger, he'd never be thin at this rate.

Aware of how much damage this meal would do, he rose and tried to run it off, but as before had to give it up, and again fell asleep to the sound of his stomach dogesting it's large meal.

A week passed.
111112222112122111212.title: In Real Trouble

1111122221121221112122.content:
The past week hadn't been any better than last.

All he'd been able to do in the way of excercise was run as much as he could, but each day the distance was becoming significantly less and less as with run was turning into a quick waddle. He was barley able to make it a lap before he fell exhausted. Then when feding time came he was just as helpless to resist his stomach's wish's as he had for a while now.

Right along with Nala he would polish of every scrap of meat then lick the bowl clean much to her grinning satisfaction.

Though he must admit the extra padding was more comfertable when he lay down he'd much rather have his speed back.

Since Nala no longer had to diet to get him to gain weight she had balloned as well. She could only waddle now when she decided to move Which she rarely did. Her belly dragged across the floor was the main reason for her lack of movement. Her laziness being the other.

Yet despite her it restricting her movement Nala seemed to really enjoy her fat. She could be seen snuggling deeper into it when she wasn't teasing him and she never complained about the cold which was coming with the autumn month's.

Mabye being fat wouldn't be so bad.
1111122221121221112122.title: Fading hopes

11111222211212211121221.content:
Mabye he should give being fat a chance. You know just to see what the big fuss was about

Yeah that's it he'd let himself get really fat. See what it was like so he tell Nala how bad it was without her argueing that he really didn't know what it was like to enjoy your fat.

So when the next meal came he adopted a happy look as he dove into the steaks with gusto. Appearing to enjoy devouring them much to the delighted look on the fat lion cubs face.

He internally smirked. When his plan worked then not only would he be able to get her off his back about being fat but mabye he could convince her that it was better to be thin.
11111222211212211121221.title: A fattening plan

111112222112122111212211.content:
A week passed after Epesi set his plan in motion. Even now he still wasn't sure about it, but he'd gone ahead with his plan anyway, and he was showing the results. The cheetah's belly was hanging down almost to his ankle and was twice or more times as wide as it had been, and nor was that the only change, for his neck had developed rolls which were all of thewm now wider than his head, even though that was not hanging with fat as well. his legs had grown considerably as well, his hips and shoulders almost as wide as his belly, and splayed out from its pressure and their size, and even his tail was now twice as wide as it had been, hanging limp against muscles now too weak to lift its weight.

Nala, watching from afar, wondered what had happened to Epesi, was his apparently newfound appreciation of weight natural, or part of a cunning plot. Not that it mattered really, he was acting nicer to her now than he ever had before, and with all that weight on there was no chance he was ever going to regain his original shape ever again.
111112222112122111212211.title: Plan In Motion

choices: Epesi only lost a little weight
Epesi let a lot of weight
1111122221121221112122112.content:
Next morning Epesi woke up very drowsy. Last night he had had a very large meal and hadn't really taken it to thought. When finally came to, he tried to move. When he tried to move, he couldn't. He strained to get at least even one toe to touch the ground, but couldn't. He tried to get off the thing he was laying on, but couldn't. 'What happened?' he thought to himself. He looked down to find he was laying on a big furry soft thing that wasn't letting him get off it. Then he realized what it was. "OH MY GOD!!" he blurted out. This woke Nala (who had still been sleeping), and she looked over to see Epesi rolling back and forth on his huge gut trying to move but hopelessly failing. She waddled over to him (she hadn't exactly become immobile yet) and smirked. "What did you think was going to come from eating all those steaks?"
"You're lucky you can still move! How is that anyways?"
"I don't know, but I think your lucky. Besides, if you didn't want to gain weight, why did you start eating so much?"
"I wanted to be able to tell you that being fat sucks and you wouldn't be able to argue back since I knew what it was like."
"And look where it got you. Just except it. You're never going to he thin again."
"I WILL!"
"yeah right you can't even move, how are you going to exercise?"
Epesi wanted to reply, but couldn't think of anything to say. He watched as Nala waddle away to eat breakfast. He felt his stomach growl, and admittedly he was hungry (more like starving), but he go to eat it. He would have moaned or something to get Henry's attention, but Henry was long gone and hadn't seen Epesi and he knew Nala wouldn't help him, so he had to sit there for the rest of the day. "At least not eating will help me to slim down." He sat there for the rest of the day and all night which felt like a year. Next morning he was still there and moaning in hunger. Nala felt bad for him so she brought him a steak (she still wasn't immobile yet but it did take her a while).
"Why are you bringing me this?" asked Epesi as he began eating.
"I couldn't just sit by and watch you starve to death."
"Thank you" he managed to get out while he finished off the steak.
"By the way, how badly do you want to lose weight?"
"More than anything in the world!"
Nala thought about this for a moment. She really wanted to be fat and Epesi didn't. She knew how much he wanted to be able to move on his own. She thought of an idea that would help both of them.
"How bought this," she began, "I bring you some food until you're thin enough to move. Then I'll help you lose weight by eating the food you don't want. That way I'll get fatter and you'll get thinner."
"But It will take forever for me to be able to move again. And even then I'll only be able to make a slow waddle type thing."
"Then we'll just have to rely on you eating less for the most part."
"Okay then, but there has to be a catch. You wouldn't just start helping me out of pity."
"The catch is that you stop bugging me about being fat. I like it so don't ruin it for me."
"Okay. Hey, could you bring me another steak?"
"Why? I thought you wanted to lose weight."
"I do, it's just that I haven't eaten in a whole day except for that steak you gave me, so I'm still pretty hungry."
"All right."
So Nala brought Epesi another steak and then after he ate it, she pushed him (with some difficulty) over to where Henry left the food. The next day...
1111122221121221112122112.title: Worst Idea Yet

11111222211212211122.content:
No, he though, no, he could do this, he could resist his hunger, he would be thin again, no matter what Nala said. Nevertheless, he was hungry, and tried to think of a way to deal with it. Finally, he decided he had to eat, but so he wouldn't be tempted to gorge, he'd take one slice of meat and eat it in the far corner of the enclosure.

"Finally hungry then are we," Nala asked as she saw Epesi make his way over to his bowl, "tuck in."

Epesi didn't reply, seemingly preoccupied, and Nala saw him pick up a single steak, and head for the far corner of the pen. Well it seemed she'd been wrong, Epesi really was working to be thin again.

Nala was considering whether to try another way of plumping Epesi up, when her stomach rumbled, interrupting her train of thought. The cheetah had taken but a single steak, leaving the other two in the bowl, and after more than a week of strictly regulating her own weight, the lion cub was quite hungry.
11111222211212211122.title: Planning To Slim Down

111112222112122112.content:
Despite his new condition, the week spent under Nala had left him much heavier, and fairly stiff, the cheetah perservered with his exercise, despite his body's protests. Of course, he was no where near as fit as he had been before, but that would come later, for now he just wanted to exercise as hard as possible.

When Epesi finally laid down he was pleased with his effort, he'd managed a total of five laps of the enclosure, and while it wasn't muck for a fit cheetah, it was definitely a good, start. Finally allowing himself to relax, he let his digestion take over, and was soon fast asleep.

Epesi woke to a noise at the edge of the enclosure, and out of curiosity, went to look. As it turned out, the next meal had arrived. He was about to tuck in, when he realised that Nala wasn't with him yet, and so he thought about giving her some of him meat, both so he wouldn't eat as much, and so Nala couldn't trick him like she had done the last time.
111112222112122112.title: Soldiering On

11111222211212212.content:
After a fewq minutes of lying around, Epesi decided that he'd better do something about the large meal, and so rose to his paws, or tried to.

"You'll never make it," Nala said, watching Epesi struggle to rise, "you're going to have to accept it."

"'ll m'ke it," Epesi slurred, still struggling. Finally, he managed to stand up, but wasn't about to go any further, because his stomach had already begun to digest his meal, leaving him feeling even more torpid than normal. He tried to take a step forward, and almost fell over, so he waited a few moments before trying to take the next one.

It took a while for Epesi to get used to his condition, then when he was confident walking, he tried running. This proved to be a mistake, as he'd only taken two steps when he fell over. He rose again, but only managed three steps before falling. He tried several more times, but never managed more than six steps before falling over. Faced with an apparently insurmountable task, he finally gave in, and lay down, falling asleep in moments.

Epesi awoke with a grunt as someone shook his shoulder. Looking over, he saw Nala, and asked, "What d'you want?"

"Dinner Time," Nala replied, "come on."

At those words, Epesi's now large stomach began to rumble, and so he rose and made his way over the the food. He was disgusted to find himself in even worse condition now, the last meal had added yet another layer of fat to his body, but this was washed aside as he smelled the meat.
11111222211212212.title: Not Going To Make It

111112222112122121.content:
It was overpowering him. It wasn't like he was in a trance. Nor was it like the food was flying down his throat as if by magic. A more accurate statement would be that it was like someone had shoved his head into the food and wouldn't let him up for air.

Nala was quite impressed at his voracious eating. Even she tended to come up for air for every mouthful but it really did look like his head couldnt move from the bowl. His eyes were actually full of fear as he seemed to realise what he was doing but couldn't stop.

She understood that though. She did want to get fat but when she originally started gorging she had that same expression when she realised how much she was eating all at once. Mabye he'll get used to it like she did. It was clear that his mind was resisting but his body was embracing the new lifestyle. You know the spirit is willing but the flesh is weak.

She knew he was miserable but at the same time she really wanted him to get fat like her. All that fat he had at the moment made him look really cute and if they were going to be spending their lives together in this enclosure then she at least wanted to spend her life with someone who she could be friends with.

She just had to find a way to get him to make him happy while making sure he kept gaining weight
111112222112122121.title: The flesh is weak

1111122221122.content:
Nala smerked to herself as she thought of the ultimate revenge for Epesi, and the fact that Epesi hasn't been here for long gives her an advantage. Thankfully it was lunch time already and time to put her plan into action.

Henry had already put the large meats into bowls, and while Epesi was exploring his new world, Nala took a few steaks from her bowl and put it into Epesi's. She then stuck her head into the bowl and began eating it. Because of her flab, the only way she was able to bring her head down to the ground was to roll forward on her belly, and that left her rear legs hanging in the air. Epesi laughed at the sight before looking at his meal and eating a steak or two. Then after a few minuets, Epesi began pushing against Nala's side again, but instead of complaining, Nala gasped.
"You havn't eaten all of your food?" she asked.
"Yah, so?" Epesi asked.
"Well, if you don't eat all of your food" Nala warned "then the creatures that brought you here are going to hurt you and rip off all your fur."
"Realy?" Epesi said a little frightened.
"Yah, I didn't want to get fat at first and I went through it. So I ate my food and delt with it." Nala replied "besides, you can always work it off later."
Epesi nodded saying "thanks" before looking at his food and began eating. It was amusing to watch too as the cheeta gorged himself on the meat.

At the end of the meal, Epesi was on his back moaning, the Cheeta's stomach was as large as a small mellon and the skin over it stretched tight.
1111122221122.title: The Plan to Fatten Epesi the Cheeta

11111222211221.content:
Epesi knew he was in trouble as soon as as he awoke. Lying down he didn't really feel his increased weight, but as rose he did, and looked back at himself. He hadn't put on a lot, but his waist was definitely less prominent now.
