This worried Epesi, because although he hadn't gained that much, it was quite a big gain for a single meal. What was even worse was the fact that it'd happen again and again, unless he did something about it, but then, what could he do?
11111222211221.title: Morning After

111112222112211.content:
Epesi spent some time examining the fence, and came up with two possible solutions for escape, either dig under it or jump over it. He disregarded the first solution quickly, his relatively lanky frame would require a large hole, but given the weight he'd gained after a single meal he didn't have that long.

The second solution, jumping over the fence also turned out to be a dead end, he just couldn't jump high enough to get over the fence, and he couldn't find anything both large enough to help and light enough to move. Dismayed, he made his way over to Nala, and plopped down.

"Something wrong," Nala asked, sensing Epesi's depression.

"There's no way out," Epesi replied, "I can't think of a way out."

"Neither could I," Nala said, trying to comfort him, "getting depressed wont help you though, you've just got to learn to accept it."

"But I don't want to," Epesi said, "I want to go home, not stay here and get fat like you." With that, he began to push his paws into Nala's side.

"Hey, stop it," Nala said, but he didn't "just stop it will you?"

After a few more moments, Epesi did stop his his paws, and said, "sorry, I just needed to get rid of some tension, and that was the best I could do."

"Well try something else next time," Nala said.

"Yeah, maybe," Epesi said. He tried to relax, but couldn't and so rose and began loping, then sprinting around the enclosure.

While Epesi was out, Henry arrived with the cub's meals. Nala briefly considered repeating what she'd done last time, but decided against it, the cheetah had enough to contend with for now, and he didn't need her petty revenge as well, although if he continued to poke her, she'd probably reconsider. "Hey Epesi," she called, "lunch."

"Yeah, okay," Epesi said, slowing down from his sprint. He was just about all-in anyway, and a meal would provide at least a temporary reprieve from his depression.
111112222112211.title: Try to escape

111112222112212.content:
Epesi tried desperately to think of a way to escape, but could come up with nothing. So wrapped up was he in thinking of escape though, that he didn't notice another meal being served till Nala called him over, again having given him some of her meat.

As with the last meal, Epesi was too full to move afterwards, although he was only uncomfortably full this time rather than painfully, but he nevertheless lay down afterwards for a nap.

On waking, Epesi examined himself again, and was alarmed to find that he no longer had a waist at all, his body simply went straight back, not even tapering, which meant that as well as the added weight, his thighs were rubbing slightly against his belly.

As alarmed as he was though, he knew that he could get rid of it with exercise, so with that in mind he began to sprint around the the enclosure.
111112222112212.title: Settle in

1111122221122121.content:
Epesi remained diligently fixed on his goal of running himself ragged and losing weight. As the days passed though, no matter how hard and fast he ran, he nevertheless continued to put on weight, though at a slower pace than when he'd first been brought in. What he didn't know, and neither did Nala for that matter, was that he was managing his time badly, he gained weight during his after-meal naps and that if he just waited for his stomach to settle before attempting to exercise, that he might actually achieve his goal.

Nevertheless, Epesi continued to do his utmost to lose weight, even after his belly began to hang down bellow his ribcage and stick out wider than than his hips. If course, the increased weight did ave an effect, slowing down the cheetah, and decreasing his stamina, but he nevertheless remained determined.

Nala was fascinated by Epesi's determination, even in the face of obvious failure. Not that the cheetah's determination didn't have other downsides, he was now more disagreeable and moody than when he'd been brought in, and finding this repelling, she tried to think of ways to reduce it.
1111122221122121.title: Never Surrender

1111122221122122.content:
For the first few days afterwards, Epesi remained diligently fixed on his goal of running himself ragged and losing weight. As the days passed though, no matter how hard and fast he ran, he nevertheless continued to put on weight, though at a slower pace than when he'd first been brought in. What he didn't know, and neither did Nala for that matter, was that he was managing his time badly, he gained weight during his after-meal naps and that if he just waited for his stomach to settle before attempting to exercise, that he might actually achieve his goal.

Nevertheless, Epesi's failure to lose weight was demoralising him, and so, as the days passed, he ran less and less, which only speeded up his gain, and consequently left him even more depressed. Nor was his situation helped by his new eating habit of devouring his meat as though he were eating an enemy, for while this wasn't problematic on its own, Henry observed it, and assuming the cub was hungry, slowly began to increase his portion, though this was offset by Nala's observation of such, and her consequent stopping of tricking the cheetah cub into having some of her meat.

As Epesi stopped exercising and began eating more his weight ballooned, giving him an ever larger belly and chest. Not that the cheetahs torso was the only affected area, for his limbs, once lean, now began to show extra padding, and even his tail and head were affected. Nala also noticed the changes, and revelled in them, in her opinion her friend grew more appealing with each passing day.

Her opinion wasn't shared by Epesi, for with each passing day he grew more withdrawn, as though he was appalled by his very reality. This worried Nala, for although she found the cheetah's ever-increasing size appealing, his worsening mental state overrode this appeal. Realising she'd gone badly wrong with her plan to make her new companion more pleasant, she tried to think of was to correct her mistake.
1111122221122122.title: Resistance Is Futile

11111222211222.content:
After a week, Nala's plan was working, especialy when Henry would come and check on them, slightly enforcing the fear that Nala placed in Epesi. Of course, giving Epesi some of her own food has decreased her gain.

Still, Nala has grown quite a bit, as her belly spread out a little more and began to push her up along with pushing her legs further apart. Her chubby legs were certanly packing on some pounds as the fat prevented even the widest of waddles, forceing her to shuffle her feet to get anywhere. Her fat haunches were so thick that it hung over her bloated paws, completely hiding them under normal cercumstances, while her front paws were too bloated to even wiggle. Nala's fat back had several rolls formed on it and arched upwards, even her fat neck was pushing against her ears slightly. Nala's butt was certanly almost big enough to fit a curled up skinny version of herself in each cheek. Even the lionesses tail three times thicker than it was originaly, too fat to bend without assistance, and because of gravity it arched down with the tip dragging on the ground.

Not to say that Epesi has not been suffering the same fate either. He has packed on plenty of pounds after fearfully eating all he could and then some. Epesi has been trying hard to keep in shape, but after stuffing himself silly he would imediatly fall into a nap. Although after the nap he would try and run a few laps, but each day the number of laps would decrease while the number of pounds increased.

Epesi was going to do his rounds, but he was getting quite round himself. His belly was dragging on the ground and his haunches several inches thicker with fat. A nice second chin formed on his face while his cheeks made him look a bit cuter.

With all his effort, Epesi walked as fast as he could, his flab wabbling with each step, but it wasn't long before Epesi was panting and sweating.
Epesi sighed as he said "That's it... I"
11111222211222.title: Nala's Revenge

111112222112221.content:
"...can't go on," Epesi said, "I just can't."

"Something wrong," Nala asked, making her way over ponderously.

"You betcha," Epesi said in a scorning tone, "look at me, I'm huge, fat, disgusting."

"You don't look too bad," Nala said, "kinda cute in fact."

"Kinda cute," Epesi asked,"all this?"

"Yeah," Nala said, "nothing wrong with being huge."

Epesi looked at Nala like she was crazy, before something finally clicked, "you set me up didn't you?"

"Yep," Nala said, then grinned, "you teased me when you first came in, so I thought I'd get my own back."

"So they 'don't' rip your fur off if you don't finish your meat," Epesi asked.

"Don't know," Nala said, "I never have any meat left."

Epesi was silent for a moment, then said, "you can have most of mine then, because I'm going to get rid of this lot, starting now."

"Okay, I'll have it," Nala said, "but I don't think you're going to get rid of that lot now, you're just too big."

"Just watch me," Epesi growled, "maybe you can stand it, but I can't."
111112222112221.title: Secret Revealed

1111122221122211.content:
For days after the outburst, Epesi worked hard to lose weight, eating less and exercising more. The problem was, like most cheetahs, he wasn't patient, and so, while he was losing weight slowly, it wasn't fast enough for him, leaving him feeling depressed.

None of this would have been so bad, but for the unfortunate habit Epesi had developed of comfort-eating, and one such meal, along with the nap afterwards, would set him back several days. At first this wasn't a problem, because even with his comfort eating the cheetah was making headway, but as time passed, he was doing more and more eating and less and less exercise.

Nala watched this process with shame, she'd want to get Epesi fat to stop him teasing her, but this was going too far. The problem was, she knew, Epesi would get mad if he found out she tried to help him.
1111122221122211.title: One Step Forward Two Steps Back

111112222112222.content:
"...can't go on." After a few moments, repeated, "I can't go on like this." He was almost in tears, though they wouldn't help him.

He didn't get round to further bemoaning though, because at that moment, Nala called, "Epesi, dinner."

Epesi struggled for a moment, he didn't really want to eat anything more, but his stomach contradicted and overrode this idea, and so, full of self-loathing, the cheetah cub made his way over to the feeding area, too wrapped up in his own sorrow to catch Nala giving him some of her meat.

After the meal, as per usual, Epesi tried to work off his dinner, but as per usual he failed, his weight and torpidity forcing him to quickly give up and sleep.
111112222112222.title: Sleep It Off

1111122221122222.content:
The scent of his next meal alerted Epesi it was time to eat again. Nala quickly was about to add a few more steaks from her own dish to his, but saw that Henry had begun feeding him more. She guessed he saw his increased weight and decided to give him an equal share to her own. The pleased Nala greatly since it meant she didn't had to share her food and they'd both gain.
Epesi sorrowfully dug into his meal, only ever stopping to breath before digging in again. Nala was quite surprised at the weight he was putting on.
"Before long he'll be as big as me." thought Nala. "I bet his state of mind is making him gain more. He thinks he'll get fat if he eats so much that is what is happening. Must be the same as me, but I want to get fat. Maybe it is time for me to tell him the truth. After all what good is getting fat if you don't enjoy it, though I'm enjoying him porking up alongside me."
Nala was thinking of telling Epesi the truth after they ate. She didn't want to tell him before since he might stopping eating if she did. After he ate he let himself digest as usual before trying to walk again. He barely made a few yards before tiring and laying down. She thought of telling him now, though she may want to wait a little longer and see if he changes him mind on obesity on his own.
1111122221122222.title: Slave of Food

11111222211222221.content:
Nala could tell Epesi wasn't enjoying being fat like she was, so at the next meal, she said, "you know, if you don't want all of that, I'll have some."

"Why," Epesi replied, "one of us'll have to eat it."

"Exactly," Nala said, "and I can tell you're not liking being big."

"Not like I have a choice," Epesi said, "anyway, I though you didn't like being fat."

"I didn't used to," Nala lied, "now I guess I'm used to it."

"Why're you offering to help me," Epesi asked.

"Well..." Nala reconsidered a moment, then went on, "it's kinda my fault you're fat in the first place."

"Come again," Epesi asked, "I don't think I got you."

"Look," Nala said, "remember when you first came in, you teased me and I didn't like it?"

"Yeah," Epesi said, "so?"

"So I kinda wanted to shut you up," Nala said, "I gave you some of my meat every meal, and that story I told about them ripping you're fur off, that was made up."

Epesi took a while to digest this, then said angrily, "you did this to me for revenge?"

"Look, I just wanted you to stop teasing me," Nala said, "I didn't figure you'd get so miserable and all."

"Well I'm not teasing you any more," Epesi said, "there, happy?"

"Not really," Nala replied, "look I'm sorry about it okay, but I'll make it up to you?"

"How're you going to do that," Epesi asked suspiciously.

"I'll help you get thin again," Nala said.

"Really," Epesi asked.

"Yeah, really," Nala said, "but you have to promise me one thing."

"What's that," Epesi asked.

"Promise me you won't bull me when you're thin again," Nala said, "I actually kinda like being fat, so don't spoil it, okay?"
11111222211222221.title: Revelation

111112222112222211.content:
Epesi considered, Nala's suggestion. He didn't like being fat, but he didn't really like those around him being fat either. Finally though, he said, "okay, I promise I won't bully you about being fat ever again."

Nala smiled and said, "cool, you finished there?"

"Well..." Epesi said, looking down at his meal, of which he'd eaten less than half, "...actually, it's kinda hard giving it up..."

"You want to get thin again don't you," Nala asked.

"Yeah," Epesi, then pushed his bowl towards Nala, "yeah I do, here you go."

"You might want to do a bit of running as well," Nala said.

"Running," Epesi asked, the said, "I can barely walk."

"True," Nala said, "but everything helps."

"I suppose there's that," Epesi said, but felt his stomach gurgle, whether with hunger or digestion he couldn't tell, but it seemed to sap at his strength. "Not now though," he said, and lay down, ready to have a nap.
111112222112222211.title: The Pact

choices: Epsei starts to like being fat
He puts in more effort to lose weight, and gives nala more steaks.
1111122221122222112.content:
While it was true that 'everything helps', That would only be true if Epsei actually did 'anything'.

While it was true that Nala had pitched in in eating his steaks, that had only slowed his weight gain down, but he 'was' still getting fatter.

He just couldn't bring himself to run anymore, everytime he'd stand up he would almost immedialty 'thump' back down and stare off into space with a disheartened look. Like he had given up completly.

Nala kept encouraging him to at least try to get up, which he did before he thumped back down. It wasn't like she could do anything more than give encouraging words since tthe addition of 5 more steaks to her diet had sapped most of her mobility from her. She was upset about the pathetic state of her room mate but with her feet actually starting to lift off the ground from her massive stomach pushing her up she was powerless to help him.
1111122221122222112.title: Failure

11111222211222221121.content:
"You know what Nala?" said Epsei "What?" replied Nala. "I'm tired of excersizing,I'm still getting fatter and this is just torture,come to think of it,I kind of like this softness,and,like you said,these rolls,they are kinda cute" Epsei said,while grabbing his rolls and slightly shaking them.

"I may as well get fat with you Nala" said Epsei

Nala was ecstatic to hear this,she was going to have someone to get fatter with!

She then said "Well when Henry comes,I'll give some of my steaks to you,that'll fatten you up"

When Henry came and gave them the steaks,Nala give most of hers to Epsei.
11111222211222221121.title: Epsei starts to like being fat

11111222212.content:
Nala licked the humans hand in both affection and in desperation as she finished the steak he hand fed her.

It had been a full year since Nala had been kidnapped into a life of gluttony and laziness. With nothing to do in the small enclosure she could do nothing but eat and grow fatter and fatter.

She was now a full grown lioness, and would have been the queen of pride rock with her best friend Simba as her husband by now, but suffice to say even if this mountainous feline would somehow get back to Pride rock her new attitude and appearance would make her the least likely candidate to be anything but a useless fleshy lump.

Now the average weight of a full grown female lion is just under 300lbs, which is enough for a human to be classed as quite fat.

Well now you know that fact then consider this, Nala weighed enough to make another female Lion classed 'morbidly obese' look skeletal!

Her belly flowed out in every direction by more than several feet and took up significant space in the habitat and pushed her up from the ground several feet, enough that Henry had to reach up to hand feed her. Her legs were so packed with fat that she couldn't wiggle her toes even if her leg's werent covered from thigh to paw by overhanging fat.

Her tail was as thick as a human torso and less than half visible since her back fat was also doing the same thing to it that it was doing to her legs, heck she could barely see since it was also hanging over her face...and to the sides...and her head was perpetually rested on her fantastically distended belly.

If you had to guess her weight, you wouldn't be able to of course but to say she was about a ton would be a good guess.....if she didn't pass that mark a while ago.

Every day the lady of the house ordered Henry to increase the amount he was feeding Nala, to witch he reluctantly complied. He hated to do this but when he protested madame came up with docterined evidence that linked him to the poaching. He'd be done even if he was the one who informed the police, and the sentence for poaching was not a pleasent one.

He may have hated it but he had no choice but to pamper to the ladies obsession with obesity.

The woman he was talking about, known only to her servents as madame smiled watched happily as her prize lioness was gorging herself once more on the meat she was made to eat seven times a day for a year. The results of which pleased both females human and feline immensely.

"She's coming along quite well..." She looked at the ground next to her. "Don't you agree Dipsy?"

If the dog could have shuddered at the name she would have, but gave a simple yap at her owners question. Not that it meant anything but it pleased the woman non the less.

'Dipsy', or diane as was her real name was a medium sized poodle who was another product of her owner's fascination with extreme weight. Not to the degree of Nala in terms of proportion though. She could still still up and when her owner allowed her to walk she could do so with a reasonable waddle as he stomach only brushed the floor when it was moving from side to side.

She looked over at Nala's cage with some 'morbid' fascination. "At least that fat lump took that stupid humans attention of me."

She hated what that aging biddy was doing to her, she remembered being the fastest dog in her litter before she was taken by Madame and feed no less than 4 meals a day. She wasn't even allowed to walk about unless unnoticed, a servent always carried her.

Then again Diane was also somewhat jealous of Nala, ho could that fat feline actually be enjoying this. No one enjoyed what that monster woman was putting them through.

Alfredo the parrot was annoyed that he could no longer fly, or even fit into the cage what he had so love.

It came as quite a shock to herr when Richard the pet mouse begged for no more cheese, then rolled to the other side of his cage using his perfectly spherical shape.

Amanda the Calico had given up when the cooks commented that her stomach dragging across the floor kept the floor clean.

The less said about the master of the house the better.

Yet this Lioness was visibly delighted with her obscene girth.

'I need to know why' thought Diane. Resolving to solve the mystery later tonight.
11111222212.title: She's not the only one

choices: Diane leaves Nala to dream about getting bigger.
After a year of Henry feeding Nala.
111112222121.content:
Night had came, everyone was going to bed to sleep for the night just as Nala's feeder,
Henry had just finished feeding the last pile of fatty steaks. Which she took with a
gluttonous hunger. Diane made sure to check that everyone had gone to bed for the night
as the plump poodle went to the back door. She barely fit throuh the dog door that had a flap
on it, but she made it outside. Then Diane proceeded to head to the habitat encloser cage
where the mountain-like blob of lioness was. She wondered if the fat lioness lump had
gotten any fatter from the day's feeding, coming upon the enclosed cage, from the moonlight
Diane could just make out the huge blob form within the caged encloser. If the humans
didn't expand the cage out more, this fat lump would soon be oozing out through the cage
chain link fence that makes up the encloser with her fat and likely also bulging over the top
as well.

"Hey you fat lump, can you hear me?" asked Diane, sitting down just a foot away from the
caged encloser of what she made out to be Nala's front.
A sudden movement sent Nala's blob of a fat body into motion, wobbling and jiggling all over
and from the moaning, it sounded like fat immobile lioness enjoyed it. Nala's body
undulated and shook like a jello mold but the flab of rolls flopped and bounced against
each other. "Yes, I can hear. Who is there?" Nala asked, then a deep rumbling came from
within her. "Oh, sorry, my big stomach is digesting that large meal I had earlier."
Diane blinked. "Okay. I'm the maddams' pet poodle. I want to ask you something."
"Ask away. I'm not going anywhere." Nala replied, and gave a shake to herself, causing her
flab and blubber to jiggle all the more. She even tried shaking her tail but couldn't, her tail
would only shake if she shook her entire body.
Diane gasped at the sight, she had never seen anyone so fat before. "Tell me, why do you
enjoy being fed and delight in getting fatter?"
Because of her fat face and fat face cheeks the size of large beachballs, Nala could
only manage a small grin. "Its really a secret of mine but I'll tell it to you anyway.
Its the pleasure of feeling my body growing bigger and fatter, I have a gluttony for food
and a desire to never stop. And I have a fondness for the human that feeds me. Like
a relationship. Not a love relationship, like a close friendship."
Diane couldn't help but be stunned at Nala's words but she did ask. "You like the
human called Henry?"
Nala tried to nod, which sent her fat face cheeks and many neck rolls into a wobbling
and rippling motion. The neck rolls making wavy motions like ocean waves. "Yes,
I do... In fact, I'd rather have him feed me ALL the fatty meat he has and keep on
feeding me all day."
111112222121.title: Telling of a secret

choices: The wall broke from her ever-expanding bulk before it could be resized
The adjustments proceeded accordingly, except for one small problem...
1111122221212.content:
"This... is a problem." Henry said, hand resting upon the lionesses side.
"I don't see how. She just needs a larger enclosure" replied the lady standing beside him. Nala had... well, to say that Nala had grown would be an understatement of the highest magnitude. Her fat pressed against the chain link fencing of the enclosure, her mass of rolls and billowing fat rising out of the cement walls below like some lovecraftian horror would rise from an ocean deep. An ooze of a creature, the rumbling noise of the lionesses stomach could not only be heard but felt by those who stood near. Her corpulence, pressing against the fencing, was clearly taking a toll on the enclosure.
"And who will you get to build that enclosure who won't say anything? I don't know how to build, and I doubt any of your employees do either." Henry said, throwing his arms up in exasperation.
"Oh, darling, do calm yourself. I promise you, I will solve all of this quickly and eloquently enough." She said, waving her hand as she spoke in a dismissive manner. Meanwhile, Nala was certainly enjoying everything about this current situation. Even feeling the chain link fence press up against her flank was enjoyable, to a degree. But there was one thing missing from this situation- food. She let out a low whine, demanding to be fed. The lady gave Henry one look, who proceeded to go and get the utensils needed to feed the ever-growing lioness.
1111122221212.title: Patience Rewards

choices: Henry climbs up to Nala's fat head, begins feeding Nala the food in the tankers.
The formula kicks in again, causing Nala to fatten until she is a hundred tons.
11111222212122.content:
The workers got to work on taking down the chain link fence that was around Nala's fat lioness blob body. If one had to guess, someone might say the ever-feeding and fattening lioness was currently at or around twenty to thirty tons of soft, doughy and malleable mass of fat flabby rolls, blubber and lard. And it seems that Nala thoroughly enjoyed all of it in pleasure, even especially when Henry would feed her and give her body massages. Once the workers got the chain link fencing removed, they shocking watched as Nala's contained malleable flab of a lioness body flowed out from it and jiggled, wobbled and undulated as if she was a jello mold of her own. Her rolls flopped and slapped against each other, giving Nala great pleasure which the lioness blob roar-moaned from. Once her fat settled into place, she was pressing up against other chain link fences of other enclosures.

The workers there had to get a heavy-duty hundred ton crane, get the thick straps under and around Nala, lifting her out of her once used enclosure. Henry looked on in amazement at the amount of flabby fat rolls that hung, spilled off of her and what rolls of flab was still pooling out on the ground. So they had to lift her somewhat higher that none of her flabby rolls were touching the ground. And as they held Nala's lioness blob mass of a body and took her to the new location, she jiggled easily all the more and all over her lioness blob body. They could hear the roar-moans that Nala was making in pure pleasure. Fortunately for Nala, the madame of the mansion had ordered one of her scientists men to make a formula serum for Nala that would always keep her a hundred percent healthy no matter how much weight she gains. But as a side effect, she gain more fat rapidly than she used to. Henry had reluctantly gave Nala the formula serum back half a year ago. Once the crane had brought Nala to her new area enclosure, much more of a savannah land of her own but still with high concrete and chain link fencing surrounding it, the crane set her down on the grassy ground. And Nala had been placed at the very center of the new area. So Nala had more space and room to grow bigger and fatter in for miles around.

Getting that done, they got the thick straps removed from Nala, then Henry had to wait for the food to arrive from the mansion. When the food did get there, the lady madame surprised Henry with hundreds of large tanker semi trucks, all pulled up and backed up so the rear's of the cylinders tanks was facing Nala's front. But unfortunately for Henry, he had to climb up the lioness blob's many rolls just to get up to the cavern of neck rolls that her fat head blob had sunken back into, with her back fat higher up making Nala appear like a large hill from afar, with other bulges and leg rolls at her sides, with her paws deeply sunk into them and a mass of tail rolls with her tail tuft also deeply sunk in it, between her rump cheeks. From inside the cavern where her fat head blob rested, both chin rolls and thick bloated and widening face cheeks flowed out, pouring down her front, on top of her lower neck rolls, down her fat chest. The chin rolls pushed her face cheeks farther apart as they went down, widening to spill and pool out in a widening radius out in front of her like liquid lava. All of Nala's flabby fat rolls seemed to ripple and jiggle constantly in slow motion but would do more so if she tried to move a body part or someone was giving her body massages. Her wide bloating face cheeks laying on either side of her mass of pooling chin rolls on the ground, looking like inflating blimps.

With a resigned sigh, Henry begun to get to work on feeding Nala. Well knowing that they had switched from just hand feeding Nala to vats with hoses just to get the lioness blob's hunger fed. It lastly all day, of course. During the night was the only time Nala allowed herself rest from feeding, only to start up again the next day. But she wasn't fed at a fast rate, currently Nala's feeding required a medium and gallons setting.
11111222212122.title: A vast land, more food for Nala, the lioness blob.

choices: Actually let's see what Nala or Henry are dreaming about.
111112222122.content:
Unfortunately, Diane wasn't able to get the chance to ask Nala such a question, as the corpulent poodle noticed that the obese lioness was no longer in her enclosure anymore. At first, this made Diane concerned for Nala, despite not knowing her well enough. "I'm wondering if Henry moved her? He did look worried about that poor girl." Diane thought, speculating on such a theory, as she remembered the subtle look on Henry's face, despite not fully understanding Human language.

////

And speaking of the male Human, Henry was inside a large large trailer made specifically for carrying large animals. Currently, he was looking back at the obese blob of a lioness that was Nala, as her corpulent bulky frame jiggled ever so slightly within the moving trailer, which was pulled by a Dodge Ram 1500 truck.

Although they were both inside a trailer being pulled down the highway, Henry was surprised that the sound of car engines and howling wind wasn't enough to wake her up, as he then just noticed something odd while looking at the immobile Nala; she had this giddy happy-looking smile on her plump lioness snout, her fat cheeks making said smile more pronoun.

"Huh? That's odd. Why is she smiling like that? Lions don't actually smile....do they?" Henry thought to himself, obviously showing signs of fatigue from the months of planning and conspiring behind the fat Noblewoman's back, both to fully eradicate any evidence that would have him incarcerated for poaching, and to liberate the corpulent lioness from becoming a gigantic blob of fur.

However, during the many amount of times he spent with her, Henry began to notice something.....odd, about Nala's behavior toward him, almost as if she was actually falling in love with him. "Okay Henry, you might be losing it here. I mean, a lioness falling in love with a human? Unless she was a girl who was cursed to become a lioness, there's no way that could happen." Henry thought, obviously skeptic about the whole concept.

But then again, Henry remembered how many times Nala would show a great deal of loving affection towards him, which varied from Nala wrapping her pudgy forepaws around him in a big hug, to nuzzling him on the face with her chubby cheeks, to even giving the human multiple licks on the face and hands, since she could still the sweet meaty juices on his hands.

Although he promised himself to help Nala, but for some weird reason, Henry couldn't help but admit that the obese lioness did look adorable with all of that fat on her, as he slowly approached and gently scratched the top of Nala's head and thought, "Though you seem to be enjoying yourself, having all of that inside of you. *Sigh* If only I can somehow understand what you're saying....maybe then I can ask you why you seem to love being fat so much."

But as the fatigue began to set in, Henry let out a yawn, indicating how tired he was. With nowhere else to sleep in the trailer, Henry slowly began to lay down on Nala's fat rotund body, feeling how soft it was in combination with her fur. From there, Henry simply closed his eyes and drifted off to sleep.
111112222122.title: Like Thieves In The Night

choices: A completely different mansion, which wasn't owned by the fat Noblewoman.
Actually, she was in another location instead.
Actually, she was in another location instead (alternate version).
1111122221221.content:
Finally, after a long 12 hours, Nala was successfully transported away from the obese Noblewoman's manor estate, as the sun slowly rose over the horizon. But as the sunlight crept into the trailer's interior, it shone upon Nala's fat face, causing some annoyance at first. However, feeling that it might be morning already, Nala slowly opened her eyes, letting out a long yawn from her plump snout, adjusting to the brightened atmosphere.

However, as she slowly scanned her eyes across her environment, the rotund lioness realized that she wasn't in the fat Lady's mansion. But instead, she was now laying around in.....
1111122221221.title: Moved To An Unknown Location

choices: An obese but younger woman in her mid-20s
An immobile but younger woman in her early 20s
Actually, it was somebody completely different.
11111222212211.content:
However, as she slowly scanned her eyes across her environment, the rotund lioness realized that she wasn't in the Fat Lady's mansion anymore. But instead, she was now laying around in a completely different mansion, which seemed somewhat.....different than her previous residence.

Suddenly, just as she was becoming adjusted to the large manor standing before her,Nala could feel her corpulent frame being slightly lifted up off the trailer floor, catching her a bit by surprise, gasping from the unexpected lurch in movement. Although whatever was moving her made her blobby lioness body jiggle wildly, Nala could see that she was being moved out of the trailer interior and into the vast mansion in front of her.

Along the way, whatever was carrying her ran into several bumps, making her flabby rolls slap and flop against each other, her body wobbling like a big jello gelatin mold, which slightly made Nala feel a bit ticklish. Shortly after entering the manor's wide double doors, she felt someone or something touch the left side of her large rotund body, moving it's way up until it came into view.

From there, Nala noticed that it was revealed to be none other than Henry, her caretaker, as he turned his head toward the morbidly obese lioness and said, "Hey there, girl. Had a nice nap? Sorry if I scared you there, but we had to move you away from Miss Bumblesbee's home." Despite the human's reassurance, Nala simply had this confused look on her fat face and snout, unable to understand what Henry was actually saying, as she continued to be carried down the wide and vast manor hallways, unaware of her new unknown owner.

After an hour, the two finally stopped in a large comfy-looking room of sorts. From Nala's fatty point of view, the room was lavishly decorated for someone who must be as big as her.....or,possibly even bigger. But the 2,050 pound Nala didn't have to wait for long, as her answer entered through another pair of double doors to the left side of the room, which came in the form of...
11111222212211.title: A New Mansion, A New Owner

choices: "Hiya, 'little' brother! I've missed you since sooo much! *childish giggle*"
"Hello, dear cousin. I see you've made your way back home safe and sound."
Actually, the immobile young woman dias something else instead.
111112222122112.content:
To Nala's surprise, it was actually another human. Though unlike her caretaker, the rotund lioness quickly noticed that the human was female, and looked to be a little younger than Henry, who was in his early to mid 20s. However, the one thing that Nala became quickly aware of was the female human's fat bulky form, being carried by what appears to be some sort of heavy-duty floating platform hovering just a few inches above the ground. She had long blonde hair put into theses swirling curls, with bright blue eyes, and fair but slightly pale Caucasian skin.

In physical appearance, the female human must be weighing a total of 1,000 pounds, about half the weight of the corpulent lioness. Her chubby feet were completely swallowed up by an excessive amount of leg fat, along with displaying her morbidly obese butt the size of your average leather couch, a large belly the size of half a car, and breasts the size of large yogaballs. Her arms were covered in a good amount of body fat on her arms, hands, and fingers, just enough to still be somewhat mobile, while her face had these fat baseball-sized cheeks and a fat double chin, with a developing triple chin on it's way.

Currently, the large rotund woman was wearing a large hot pink bellydancer outfit, with the puffy pants and pink bra-like top, along with some extra large accessories made for a lady of her size, wearing it around her right arm and loosely around where her thick neck was. From there, the immobile woman had the platform hover over toward Nala and Henry, approaching them just as the rotund lioness saw two obese maids waddle into the room via the wide double doors on the left side of the room.

Then, Nala noticed Henry slowly approached the large immobile woman of obesity, where she then spoke toward the caretaker and said.....
111112222122112.title: An immobile but younger woman in her early 20s

choices: Henry is shocked and surprised by the size of the lioness he sees on the cams
Henry is given the lion language communication device then sleeps on Nala
1111122221221123.content:
"Go ahead and feed your lioness, Henry. She must be practically starving from her long trip." She giggles. She motions to her two obese maid servants. "Give him the carts of food. Hippo meat for her, cut in juicy slabs. She should enjoy it."

The two rolled forward two big wheeled carts of the hippo meat food, of course the meat did also have fat on it too, but to Nala it looked irresistable and she could probably
glutton on the hippo meat all day. Her stomach size had too, increased along with her fat body blob size. And the two maid servants wheeled in a total of ten food carts to let Henry feed the fat lioness blob. They could actually hear her stomach growling hungrily through the thick fat of her belly.

With a nod of thanks, Henry began his task of feeding Nala the big slabs of hippo meat, which Nala took in with well practiced gluttony. Henry still had to reach up to hand feed her though, not that he minded. It took an hour before the first food cart was emptied and Henry switched to the second. It wasn't that Nala ate fast but the fact that she didn't bother to chew her food and instead just swallowed each slab of meat down to get it where it was needed. Yet, Henry was still reluctant to excessively feed her so much like he'd done back at Miss Bumblebee's mansion. However, a part of Henry's mind began to think how much more adorable Nala would be with more fat on her. And the way she licked at his hand sent pleasant shivers down his spine.

"I got to hand it to you, Henry. You really know how to pick a female. Anyway, I also wanted to tell you that I've found a way for you to be able to communicate with your fat lioness. Its a lion language communication device that I made. To tell you the truth, I've also got my own fat lioness blob out in the backyard. She must be a bigger blob than your lioness. Because she's a literal mountainous blob of flab and rolls, so much so, that I've had to make automated mechanical feeder arms for my lioness. I've also got several live cams set up that show various areas of her body, including a close up view of her fat blob of her head which is back deep in her mass of neck rolls. You gotta see them after you're done. Then I'll give you your lion language communication device." The immobile young woman explained while she watched Henry feed Nala the big slabs of hippo meat.

A nod from Henry showed that he listened, but didn't stop from feeding Nala one bit though he took his time. Letting his lioness fat blob enjoy the meal. The feeding of hippo meat slabs took most of the day until the evening when the sun was starting to set on the horizon. All ten food carts were now empty, Nala got her fill for the day as was now sleeping off her gluttony induced meal while the food she ate digested noisily.

Henry wiped the sweat off from his forehead and let the two maid servants take away the empty food carts. At least he now had time to explore the area inside the mansion and also the back yard. But a huge fat lioness blob the size of a mountain was hard to believe. "Okay. I'll take you up on that viewing of your lioness. But a lioness so fat that she's the size of a mountain is hard to imagine let alone believe." He said as he and the immobile young woman went through the mansion towards the Viewing Room with live cam monitors.

"Then, Henry, you will be surprised and shocked. This is the real deal. I'm not joking at all. You will certainly be amazed by her shere size. I just hope your lioness will become as much of a glutton as my lioness." The immobile young woman rode of her floating platform, giggling, her own fat wobbling and jiggling.
1111122221221123.title: The woman gives Henry meat to feed Nala

choices: Casually greet Nala, hoping to get a reaction.
Gently grabbed her attention by giving her some hippo meat.
Actually, he did something else entirely instead

Shortly after the young immobile woman had left, Henry was given the Lion Language communication device, which looked very similar to a Bluetooth headset in concept and design, as he inserted the device onto his right ear, then pressed the button on the side to turn on the headset.

From there, to his surprise, the communication device worked like a charm, as he began to hear Nala's voice for the very first time, all while the rotund lioness moaned slightly out of pleasure from consuming the hippo meat she was currently devouring in front of her plump feline snout, licking her chops in the process.

However, despite his amazement, Henry became a little hesitant as he slowly approached her, wondering what he should say to the blubbery lioness. And yet, many theories formed within his conscience like "How should I greet her?" "How would she react?" "Would she be scared, curious, or just continue eating?" Needless to say, Henry knew he had to make a decision, as he.....
11111222212211232.title: Testing, Testing.....

choices: Nala gets fed by hose and giant vat
Both lionesses are moved outside, given the rapid weight gain serum and fed more
111112222122113.content:
....for Nala, it was a shock to see another, more fatter blob of lioness of a beige color, similar to Nala's fur color be carried in by two Fork Lift's on a platform but even so her flabby fat was spilling over the sides, back and front of the platform and sagging down to a few inches off the floor, swaying and wobbling, before stopping in front of Nala. The other fat lioness blob's rolls and entire body jiggling and undulating like a large jello gelitan mold. Slowly, the other lioness blob was lowered to the floor, her fat that was sagging downward spread outwards around her then the platform was removed out from underneath her. Her rolls and body jiggling and wobbling for a good hour. Though much fatter, Nala could slightly see the other fat lioness blob's fat head, even her head was a blob of flabby rolls and was sunken back into the ringing mass of rolls that was her neck, making her fat head look like it was back in a deep cavern several feet, while her face wide and fat bloated cheeks and chin rolls flowed out from that large cavern of neck rolls, spilled out from the entrance and spilled down the other's fat flabby front to spill and pool like a small pool of liquid lava out in front, her wide bloated face cheeks flowed out on both sides of the other lioness blob's chin rolls. Her sides were wider than Nala's, legs fatter and more packed with rolls on both fore and hind legs, her back seemed like it was piled high, half way to the ceiling with bulges and rolls, her tail was nothing but a mound of rolls piled on top of each other while the other lioness blob's rump cheeks bloated out like two twin elephants behind her. "Why hello, my names Sajala." she spoke out from the deep cavern of neck rolls. "Welcome to the Feeding Mansion." Sajala chuckled, causing the blob mound of her entire body to jiggle and wobble like a jello gelitan mod of her own, rolls undulating as they slapped flopped against each other. "As you may have guessed, my curret beautiful weight is at an incredible 8,500 pounds. And I love it, all of it. You can bet that I'm not going to stop either. Oh, yes, I'm going to get fatter and fatter, every day." The four and a half ton lioness blob paused as she was fed by a human feeder of the mansion, eating rather gluttonously on the fatty slabs of hippo and whale meat, though the feeder has to climb up and crawl into the neck roll cavern just to get to Sajala's fat blob head.
Nala watched in fasination and growing interest, as she also wanted to get fatter too as a deep rumbling and growling came from her own belly, her belly fat billowing and jiggling from her larger stomach's rumbling. It caused Nala to cry out for more food. Then came Henry with food of the same what Sajala was being fed and he proceeded to feed Nala as well. And she took it greedily as a food glutton would. Her flabby fat jiggling and swaying on her head and on her neck rolls as Nala was fed and ate. This was something like what she had dreamed about, constantly being fed, eating during the day then getting much more fatter during the night as her large stomach digested all the delicious food she had eaten each day. Perhaps now she could live her dream. But as she get bigger, she would need a more constant way of being fed during the day, perhaps like Sajala had been doing. Cause she really needed, wanted to catch up and maybe perhaps get bigger and fatter than even Sajala was.
Both lionesses ate their fill of food until it was night after the sun had set, their bellies full and waiting for them to go to sleep to digest all the food they had eaten. Nala spoke up first. "Nice to meet you, Sajala. So your fatter than me, but just wait, I'm going to catch up soon. My name's Nala." She said as she did her best to settle down for the night on the floor. Both of their feeder's the other human and Henry left to maybe sleep or go talk to catch up on things. "I've a dream to become the fattest lioness in the world. So I guess we could call this a Feeding Competition?" Nala asked, licking the fatty juices off her fat muzzle and what she could reach of her face fat bloated face cheeks. Her tongue had gotten wider and longer as a result of her gaining.
"My my, a dream you have indeed, Nala. But yes, it can be Feeding Competition. I think I'd enjoy it. By the way, there is a scientist human here that is working on a lion language communication device so our feeder's can understand our language and we understand their's. Plus he is working on a rapid weight gain serum, at first it was for me.....now I think he'll include you too. So just think, we'll be able to gain weight faster during the day." Sajala licked the fatty meat juices off her fat muzzle, nearest chin rolls, neck rolls and face cheeks as well.
"Alright, let the Competition begin tomorrow. Wow, so I could finally tell my human caretaker my love for fat, food and desire to get fatter. And the rapid gaining serum sounds like it'd be a wonderful help to getting fatter." Nala commented, licking over her nearest chin rolls and neck rolls, trying to get all the fatty juices she could.
"Yes, a great help. They may have to end up moving us outside so we don't damage the house if we get any fatter. And they may have to start feeding you with a hose and giant vat too like they had been with me ever since my fat head sunk back into my own mass of neck rolls. Heh, but that was my own doing. Perhaps you should try it out, if you want to catch up to me that is." Sajala smirked best she could, as she gave Nala a suggestion. "Anyway, good to meet you. Good night." Sajala said, thinking just how much fatter she'll be by tomorrow.
"Oh, yes, goodnight Sajala." Nala said, thinking of the pleasure of being fed by a hose and giant vat all day as well as the result of getting fatter like Sajala. But like Sajala, Nala too fell asleep so her and Sajala's stomach's could digest all the food they ate today. She just wished Henry would love her more like the affection Nala had been giving him. What they needed what that lion language communication device, then that boarder could be finally crossed.
Both lioness blobs slept while their stomach's loudly digested the mass of food that had been consumed, their bodies jiggling and wobbling slightly from their stomach's digestion movements. Seems even the slightest movements will get their bodies in a jello gelitan mold motion. With smiles of pleasure and delight upon their fat faces.
111112222122113.title: Another fat lioness blob, bigger than Nala

choices: Nala was only stuffing her huge belly
Nala was getting fatter as she ate
11111222212212.content:
With a lurch, the feel of being slightly lifted made Nala gasp out in surprise. The moving making her fat lioness blob body jiggle wildly, her flabby rolls slapping and
flopping against each other, her body wobbling like a jello gelitan mold. She felt herself being moved out of the large trailer interior backwards and outside outside.

"Alright, now set her over in the center." A voice called out. It sounded like her human caretaker Henry.

Out of the mobile large trailer now, Nala could barely see a vast wide open grassy plain like a savannah. This had to be another place to keep her. And yet,
she could make out high walls of some sort in the far distance. There was also a source of water, a small lake nearby, big enough for a herd of hippos to be in.
On the platform, even her flabby furred fat oozed and spilled over the sides, front and back and hung down to a foot off the ground, the flabby flesh jiggling and
swaying with both the movement of her being moved and her own body movements. But oh, she wished they'd hurry up cause she is hungry again, very hungry.
The moving of the seven ton lioness blob of fat took an hour until the moving stopped and she was lowered back to the solid ground which caused her sagging
flab to at first bunch up then spread out as the platform was slowly removed out from under her. That slow movement did cause her a good deal of pleasure,
she was greatful to feel her fat firmly laying on the ground again. Her entire fat lioness blob body jiggled, undulated and wobbled for several minutes.

"It looks like we'll make good use of this larger encloser. Its the size of ten football fields. Plenty enough room." Henry spoke up, walking up to her.
"Alright, now I hear that your hungry again." Wishing again that he could understand the lioness's own language somehow and if she understood him.
"But this time I've got a surprise for you. Something that will let you feed constantly all day, taking breaks as you want, especially all during nights."

Nala could only reply by opening her fat plump muzzle, ready to be fed, actually by any means possible. The fat of her muzzle jiggling too, her round
bulged face cheeks wobbling and bouncing.

"Well, if your so needing of food..." Henry lifted up a clear long hose that was as thick as a fire hose up to her opened muzzle and placed it into her muzzle,
making sure the nozzle went all the way in. "...then I won't disappoint." With that, he moved away to set the panel control for Nala's type of feeding, actually
having it sence when she was hungry and automatically give her food, but having it take breaks in her feeding for Nala to gradually get used to this new
kind of feeding. Breaks at night for her to sleep. While the food itself in question is of a pasty hippo fatty meat and whale fat mixed together. But for dessert,
he'd have it automatically switch to giving Nala a flow of passion fruit jello gelitan in hopes that the lioness blob would enjoy the passion fruit but in a different
form as a dessert. So without any further time wasting, he turned on the giant vat which was massive itself at a whopping container able to hold three
million tons of food. In fact, the giant vat itself was right outside of the high wall where they had brought Nala in with the large semi truck and trailer with its
long clear hose going from Nala's fat muzzle, down her fat front and all the way on the ground to where it was outside of the encloser. There was a whirring
sound and the pasty food of hippo fat and whale fat being pumped through the hose at a medium speed in a gallons of amount, then into the hungry Nala's
awaiting mouth, the paste filled her round face cheeks until Henry heard Nala gulping loudly. Like she was all willing to feed in this way, to feed her gluttony
and desire to get far more fatter from it.

Henry watched the lioness blob feeding, hearing the loud gulping sounds coming from her and the jiggling motions her entire fat body was making as she
fed on the fatty food flowing through the clear hose and into her. It was hard to say if her stomach was still at its regular size or it had grown bigger also
to accomedate her hunger but Henry was watching to make sure that he had set the vat's control panel right and accurately. But as he watched, was it
him or was she already getting fatter as she ate?
11111222212212.title: Enclosed grassy plains, room to fatten more

choices: On second thought, let's see what Henry's dreaming about.
Nah, Screw it! Let's go with both of them!
1111122221222.content: Now then, before we continue on with the story; Do you want to look inside the dreams of Nala, or Henry, or both? After all, this IS an interactive story, so choice is basically one of this genres' core elements. So, shall we proceed?
1111122221222.title: Looking Inside One's Dreams

1111122222.content:
She sat down on her rather large rear with her belly resting on the ground in front of her.

It was time for trying to get back. She missed her family. Nala got up sending jiggles through her stomach rolls and looked over her surroundings. She could see a fence in the horizon marking the rich ladys land property.

There was no way she could jump over it. Not in her current state.

She waddled over to the fence.
1111122222.title: Try to get back to her family

11111222222.content:
The fence was far high for Nala to jump in her current state, but it didn't go right down the the ground, and while it was too low to crawl under, she could dig under it. This decided, and managing to ignore her stomach, she began to dig.

It took a good deal of time, but finally the hole was big enough, Nala figured, to squeeze through. She sat a moment, resting, then jumped down into the hole and tried to come up on the other size of the fence.
11111222222.title: Digging Deep

111112222221.content:
Nala hadn't really dug a big enough hole, and for a few moments it looked as though she was going to be trapped under the fence, but she persevered, and eventually managed to wiggle her way free.

Now that she was out, Nala realised she didn't actually know which direction the Pridelands were in, and wandering around lost was not to be advised, but she had to get away from here, and so picked a direction.
111112222221.title: On The Outside

111112222222.content:
Nala didn't find out till it was too late that she hadn't dug the hole properly, digging far more than necessary out of her side, and not enough out of the other side.

The result of this was that while it was quite easy to get down into the hole, when Nala tried to get up the other side to freedom, she just managed to slip her shoulders through the hole before her belly, wedged against lip of the hole, halting her progress.

No matter how much Nala struggled she couldn't move an inch forward, and as she quickly discovered, she couldn't get enough grip to reverse, and even turning over proved to be impossible, like it or not, she was stuck fast.

Soon Nala was feeling drowsy, and despite her extremely uncomfortable position, fell asleep, and so failed to hear the approaching figure.
111112222222.title: Stuck Fast

1111122222221.content:
On waking, Nala found herself, not still stuck in a hole, but in a cage barely a few lengths to a side. Looking out, she saw she was in a cave of some sort, but with no entrance.

After a while, Henry came in carrying Nala's meal. The cub wasn't much good at judging human expressions, but she didn't need to, because he said, "the lady was not happy with you trying to escape, so you will be in there for a few days until your enclosure had been modified."

Modified, Nala wondered, how were they going to modify it. She didn't wonder for long though, as the aroma of the meat quickly fired her hunger, and putting all other thoughts out of her mind. And nor could she think of much afterwards, as her huge meal made her sleepy.

During her few days in the cage Nala put on even more weight than she would have in the enclosure for the simple reason that the cage was too small to allow much exercise, so the cub mostly slept, an issue helped by the fairly dim lighting.

Eventually Nala was released back into the enclosure, but when she wen't to the boundary she saw how they'd modified it, they'd placed some sort of stone boundary under the fence, so she'd never manage to dig under it, or at least not be able to dig fast enough the keep up with her increasing girth.
1111122222221.title: Henry comes

11111222222211.content:
Nala quickly grew used to life in her new enclosure, with an emphasis on 'grew'. The little lion cub was not so little any more, as her belly was beginning to drag on the ground, and the combination of her weight and the size of her belly restricted her movement to little more than a mincing waddle.

Henry did his best to help keep Nala healthy, but Miss Bumblesbee wasn't prepared to spend any money, so he did the best he could with shifting her feeding location every meal, though this didn't help much as Nala simply spent half an hour or so walking to the new location, before scoffing her meat.

Neither of them were to know that big changes were on the way though, as the police had been investigating the matter, and as soon as they had confirmation, swooped on the property, and siezed the lion cub as being illegally imported.

All Nala was aware of of course was that the'd suddenly been removed from the familiar environment of the enclosure, placed into a cage, and was being taken somewhere else.
11111222222211.title: Growing Bigger

11111222222212.content:
Although Nala didn't know it yet, other provisions had been made for her besides the modifications to make tunnelling almost impossible. Henry had suggested to Miss Bumblesbee that because lions were social animals, keeping her alone in the pen was cruel and that she should have a companion.

Unfortunately, lion cubs were hard to find and dangerous to capture, and Miss Bumblesbee simply wasn't willing to pay the price the poachers were asking, so she decided on something less dangerous, either a cheetah or a leopard.
11111222222212.title: Companion Coming

11112.content:
"Aren't we a bit small to go out hunting," I mean, yeah, it's great, but everything's going to get away."

"You got a better idea then," Simba asked.

"Yep, Nala replied, "why not go exploring?"

"Exploring, now," Simba asked, "why?"

"Why not," Nala asked, "I mean, sure we aren't going to see loads of zebras and wildebeest, but do you have any idea what comes out at night?"

"No," Simba said, "do you?"

"No," Nala replied, then grinned, "but I wouldn't mind finding out."

"When you put it like that," Simba said, then grinned himself, "let's go."
11112.title: Go Exploring

choices: it was the gentle summer breeze
111121.content: They walked slowly through the night towards the waterhole. The night is beautiful, the stars are shining bright, the moon is high. Nala is enjoying the walk to the waterhole. Suddenly they hear some noises
111121.title: Waterhole

1112.content:
Nala stared at the the bushes for a few moments, before saying, "hello, who's there?" The bushes froze, and a moment later, a dark lion emerged, "S-Scar?"

"Indeed," Scar replied.

"Wh-what were you doing," Nala asked nervously. Scar may have been Mufasa's brother, but out here tonight, he seemed sinister.

"I was contemplating," Scar replied, "but tell me young lady, what brings you out at this time of night, surely it's well past your bedtime?"

Nala looked down, embarrassed for a few seconds, before replying, "I was hungry."

"Were you now," Scar said, approaching Nala, and patting her more-than-ample side, "well it seems to me that you've been one very hungry little lady recently."

Nala gasped when Scar touched her, then asked, "you-you won't tell my mother will you?"

"Oh don't fear," Scar said, "I can keep a secret if you can, and one that note, I did hear your little 'desire'." At this, Nala looked acutely embarrassed, so he went on, "oh don't worry, it's nothing shameful, just a little unusually, and if it really is your desire, I think I can help a bit."

"You-you can," Nala asked, surprised.

"Oh indeed," Scar said, "I usually have a little meat left over to finish at my leisure, but I can do without it if it's going to a good home."

"Do you have any now," Nala asked?"

"I do," Scar said, "and I'm sure I could share it, if you would care to dine with me?"
1112.title: An Unexpected Helper

11121.content:
Nala looked back at the cave where the pride slept. She'd be in serious trouble if her mother found out about this, but if she was careful, "you won't tell mum about this will you?"

"Don't worry," Scar said, "my lips are firmly sealed."

Okay," Nala said, still slightly nervous, "where is it?"

"This way," Scar said, and made his way back to 'his' cave with Nala in tow. Going to a secluded corner, he dragged out a part-eaten gazelle carcass, and put it in front of Nala, "eat up."

Nala immediately tucked into the carcass, scoffing it down as Scar watched. Soon enough, she stopped eating thought there was still quite a bit of meat on the carcass. "Finished," Scar asked.

"Yeah," Nala said, "I'm kinda full now."

"Only 'kinda'," Scar asked, raising an eyebrow, "you know, if you really want to get fat, you have to eat as mcuh as you can."

"You think I should have more," Nala asked.

"Every little bit helps," Scar said, running a paw almost daintily down her back, "tuck in."

Nala wasn't totally sure it was a good idea to continue, but did so anyway, her mouth forcing her stomach to accept even more, until she finally had to stop, completely stuffed. "There you go," Scar said, when she'd stopped, "much better."

"Well, yeah," Nala said, then tried to get up, but winced, "but how am I supposed to get home?"

"Allow me," Scar said, bending down and picking her up be the scruff. Nala clutched at her bloated stomach and groaned, as the dark lion carried her back to the cave, placing her almost daintily against her mother's side, "Good-night Nala."

"Night," Nala squeaked, then winced as her stomach protested.

Nala woke late the next morning to find Simba already waiting for her. "What kept you," he asked.

"I was tired," Nala replied.

Simba shrugged, then asked, "coming?" Nala almost said yes out of instinct, but something reminded her of Scar's offer.
11121.title: Accept

111212.content:
"Not right now." Nala replied. "I was actually thinking of going somewhere else today."

"Fine, but it better not be eating. I mean you look like you've been eating since I last saw you."

"Whatever, I've got better things to do than listen to you."

With that Nala walked away. She creapt through the savanna and made her way to Scar's place. She didn't want anyone to see her or it might alert her family and she didn't want her uncle to get into trouble. He was already under suspicious of treachery. When she made it to the cave he lived in she gave one last look behind her before she walked in. One the way down she caught the scent of freshly slaughtered gazelle and sure enough she found three dead ones on the ground. She saw they looked quite plump.

"Ah, I was hoping you'd come. I went out hunting and managed to kill a few gazelles. Unfortunately, I'm already full, but I don't want to let these go to waste. Since you are trying to put on some weight, would you like to eat them?"

Nala looked at Scar. She didn't know if he actually ate his fill already, not that it matter, but the gazelle did look tastey so she bit into the first one and filled her gut. She managed to eat her way through the first then laid on her back to rest.

She belched and said. "That was good. I don't think I could eat another bite."

"But there's still two plump juicy gazelle left for you to eat... and I insist you finish them."

Nala was getting nervous. She still had a little room, but it wasn't enough to fit in two gazelle. She heard some growls that she believed were hyenas. She heard rumors of him having relations with the hyenas, but she didn't think it was true. Feeling frightened she didn't know if she should ask to leave or eat.
111212.title: Scar

1112121.content:
"But I really am full," Nala said, "please, I have to go."

Scar considered detaining Nala forcefully, but decided against it, if he kept her too long, one of the pride would make the connection between him and her. "Okay," he said, then smiled slightly, "but remember, this is our little secret, and if anyone finds out we could both be in big trouble."

"Don't worry, I won't tell anyone," Nala said, "and, um, thanks."

"Oh that's alright," Scar said, "and if you ever want that little bit extra, you know where to come."

"Sure do," Nala said, "bye."

"Farewell Nala," Scar said, then when the cub disappeared, said, "I hope to see you again soon."

As Nala bounded through the grass, her full, fatty belly swinging a little more than usually, she considered where to go now, whether to go home, or go out and search for Simba.
1112121.title: Reluctant Farewell

11121211.content:
Nala decided she ought to go home, Simba could be anywhere by now and going out to search for him would probably get her into trouble. With that in mind she headed for Pride Rock, hoping to sneak in like she'd never been away.

Alas it wasn't to be, for she'd only been there a few moments when her mother Sarafina asked, "Nala, where've you been?"

"Um..." Nala replied, thinking desperately, "nowhere, just nearby."

"Just nearby," Sarafina asked, "how nearby?"

"I always made sure Pride Rock looked bigger than an ant-hill Nala replied truthfully, but still fidgetting with worry.

"And did you find anything interesting," Sarafina asked.

"Not really," Nala replied, "I got a bit of stomach ache."

"And serves you right for being such a greedy-guts," Sarafina asked, "you'll know better now won't you?"

"Yes mum," Nala replied dutifully.
11121211.title: Going Home

111212111.content:
"Would you like a bit of food now though," Sarafina asked. She doubted Nala would, but she thought she'd ask anyway.

"No thanks," Nala replied, "I just want to go and have a lie down."

"Well, you do that," Sarafina said. Nala nodded and smiled at her mother, before making her way up to the main cave to sleep off her recent meal. Sleep came quickly as well, for the meal had been large, and digesting it would take some effort.

When Nala awoke later, the sky was somwhat darker.
111212111.title: Sleeping It Off

choices: She arrives at Scar's to eat the two gazelles.
She arrives at Scar's and finds there's more food there now.
1112121111.content:
Nala awoke several for several hours, but the sweet scent of a fresh catch caused her to stir. She got to her feet, though she felt it take a bit more effort than normal. When she opemed her eyes she could see her gut wasn't as large as it had been before her nap, but now it wasn't crammed with food. Instead it had a new layer of fat added thanks to the fat gazelle she got from Scar. Taking a moment to look the rest of herself over in a puddle she could see that the rest of her was thickening out too. She could even see a slight roundness in her face. She did her best not to look pleased, but she could hardly believe how beautifully fat she was becoming and so fast at that. She could hardly await her next meal as it was already being divided between the other lions.

When Nala reached the food she looked at her portions with disgust on her face. There was such a meager amount that she could eat through it without satiating her hunger that increased the more she looked at it.

"Hello, dear," Sarafina said as she approached her daughter. "The hunt didn't go so well today, but we managed to find enough food for everyone. I made sure to get you a larger chunk since you didn't eat earlier."

Nala thanked her mother for thinking about her and began eating her food. When she finished she looked at the remains of the catch, but it had already been picked clean. Nala had no choice, but to wait until she got a chance to get away. She figured those other gazelles were still with Scar and just the thought that they could all be hers made her mouth water. Time passed as everyone finished their meals and eventually turned in. Soon Nala saw her mother do the same and once she was certain it was clear, she snuck away and made a v line to Scar's place. She didn't care about the dangers of wandering off alone or what might happen if she was found missing and the consequences that were sure to come. All she wanted to do was eat and eat and eat and grow fatter and fatter.
1112121111.title: A Light Meal

1112122.content:
Nala looked nervously between Scar and the gazelle carcasses, before making her decision, "okay, I'll try."

"Good girl," Scar said removing the first gazelle carcass and bring in the second, "eat up."

Nala began to eat again, but although she started out alright, she soon slowed down as she filled up the last spaces in her stomach, eventually groaning, quite literally, to a halt about a quarter of the way in. Seeing this, Scar said, "oh dear, full already are we."

Nala, clutching at her stomach and not wanting to try and talk, just nodded, and mumbled. "Perhaps a little 'too' full," Scar said, "well, I guess you'll have to sleep it off." With that, he picked her up, and as she clutched at her stomach, took her deeper into his lair, placing her on a small ledge, several feet off the the ground, far too high for her, in her current state to even attempt to jump, "you just rest there."
1112122.title: Stuffed

11121221.content:
"Scar," Nala called as the dark lion walked away, "Scar please," but there was no response as the male left her sight. Cold, uncomfortable and alone, the female cub pondered her situation.

For a while she'd trusted Scar, trusted him to help her, but not now, not ever. Of course, she couldn't tell anyone either, because that would just get her into trouble as well, so she'd just have to avoid him from now on.

Of course, none of this was helping her now, but then, nothing could help her now she was stuck here, unless, unless she could get rid of her recent meal. Spurred on by the thought, she turned to the corner and tried desperately to throw up, but it didn't work, her meal was a solid lump in her belly.

Nala tried to think of other ways of helping her situation, but before she came up with anything, her meal began to digest, sapping her energy and leaving her tired, which quickly took its toll, and the female cub was soon asleep.
11121221.title: No Way Out

111212211.content:
Nala was still fast asleep by early afternoon when Scar approached her. He smiled at her for a moment, then gently shook her, "wakey wakey."

"Mm," Nala murmured, "wha'?" Blinking several times, she looked around to find the source of the interruption "Scar?"

"Time to get up little lady," Scar said, "you've been asleep for some time."

Nala walked over to the edge and looked down, "can you um, can you help me down please?"

"Certainly," Scar replied, carefully lifting the cub off the ledge, but instead of placing her on the ground, carried her back to his cave, and set her down near the remains of the gazelle carcass she'd been unable to finish before. "Are you hungry," he asked, letting her eye the carcass.
111212211.title: Scar wakes her

1112122111.content:
Nala wasn't sure she wanted the rest of the carcass but her belly did, rumbling in anticipation. "Oh it sounds like you are, Scar said, setting her down in front of the carcass, and herding her in so she couldn't escape, "well the only thing to do with a hunger is feed it, so go on, tuck in."

Nala paused for a few moments, unwilling to be coerced into eating, but then her stomach rumbled again, telling her that it was the eating, not the freedom of doing it that mattered. Trapped and hungry, Nala finally gave in and began to eat the carcass.

Time passed and Nala slowed down, becoming comfortably full. Finally when the carcass was almost finished, she turned to Scar and asked, "can I go now please?"

"You can if you want," Scar said, "but you know there's just a little bit left on the carcass, it seems such a shame not to finish it, don't you agree?"

Nala looked between Scar and the carcass several times, before sighing, and devouring the last of the meat, "there, can I go now?"

"Run along," Scar said in reply, nudging Nala towards the mouth of the cave. Finally free the female cub ran off towards Pride Rock, only to come face-to-face with...
1112122111.title: Afternoon Tea

1112122112.content:
"Um, not right now," Nala said, "maybe later eh?"

"Maybe," Scar said, "are you sure though, I'd hate for it to go to waste."

"I'm sure," Nala said, "now could you please put me down?"

"Very well," Scar said, setting Nala down, "run along then."

Nala went a few paces, before looking at the carcass, and asking, "you don't mind if I come again tonight do you?" She still wasn't sure she trusted Scar, but the meat was almost too good to resist.

"I shall be waiting eagerly," Scar said, "now go on, you don't want to make your mother worried."

"Nala" Sarafina said when she spotted her daughter, "where've you been all day, you haven't been out with Simba and I haven't seen you."

"I was just exploring nearby," Nala replied, "I wasn't in any danger or anything." She gave her mother an innocent smile, but it faded when she saw her mother's expression, "sorry."

Sarafina's heart softened when she saw Nala's reaction and so moved over and embraced her, "I'm just glad you're okay, now come and have lunch."

The memory of the carcass in Scar's lair flashed in her mind as she began to eat, but she forced it out, she could go and visit the dark lion later if she could sneak out.

After lunch, Nala was fit to burst, having scoffed down a lot of meat while her mother was talking to the other lionesses. The large meal left her feeling tired and bloated, and so, instead of going exploring with Simba, she lay down to nap, though she was asleep for longer than she'd intended for night had already fallen by time she awoke.

After a few moments Nala remembered Scar was waiting, but then paused, if her mother found out she was gone, she was going to be in serious trouble
1112122112.title: Not Now

11121221121.content:
As Nala was trying to decided, her stomach, now empty, began to rumble, and so she decided to risk an excursion. SLowly, carefully, she made her way outside, and then quietly said, "Scar?"

"Right here," Scar replied, causing Nala to jump.

"Scar," Nala said again.

"Indeed," Scar said looking at her for a moment, before looking past her, and saying, "and I see the pride has left at least some meat around, so you have a choice of where to dine, right here, or in my lair."
11121221121.title: Midnight Meeting

choices: Nala gets full and asks to leave.
Nala eventually falls asleep while eating.
111212211212.content:
Nala thought it would be less stressful to be around Scar outside his den where she wouldn't be at his mercy entirely, but she also knew that if for any reason anyone else in her family noticed she was gone or decided to take a midnight stroll it wouldn't be hard to miss her. And if that happened it'd get to her mother and she'd never let her go off on her own again till he lost every pound she strived to get since she began. Despite holding danger greater than a strict diet Nala's mind was urging her to go where she'd not be seen by others.

"I'd like to go to eat in your den." said Nala is a low voice to Scar who she was getting less comfortable around all the time.

"As you wish," he replied in his devilish tone.

Upon arriving Nala thought every sound she heard might be a hyena's laugh, and she began breating harder from the stress.

"Relax, young one. Nobody will find out about this. You are safe." Scar ensured her. He seemed to misunderstand Nala's fears, but she figured he knew. Still his words were strangley calming. She took a last deep breath and kept moving.

When they finally reached the room where she had eaten her last meals she was shocked that her gazelles were gone and now she was given an entire hippo. Besides the bite and claw marks where it had been killed it hadn't even been eaten a little. On top of that it was a big one at that, several tons to the young cub, even after all her meals.

"Yes, I know. I wanted to give you a big surprise when you'd come, but the best thing I could find was this little fellow. I hope you don't mind."

"You don't expect me to eat this alone do you?"

"I didn't know you were ready to tackle a whole hippo by yourself. I was going to join you, but if you insist."

Nala knew he was twisting her words on purpose, but she was already here and her stomach was rumbling in anticipation. She began on the hippo, ripping off big chunks of it and swallowing it into her large stomach. Scar laid down and silently watched Nala progress. He watched her work vigorously eat, her past fears gone by her eating focus. He stared at her stomach that had been getting bigger every time she finished a meal. He body had also been plumping up a lot with his 'assistance.' He wondered just how big she'd get after this meal.
111212211212.title: Into the Belly of the Beast

1112122112121.content:
Swallowing another chunk of the hippo's caucous gasped for breath. She was so tired from her long day and her full stomach made her sleepy, not to mention it had to be dark by now and everyone would be worried about her.

"Thanks for the meal," she told Scar. "I better be getting home."
