Nala thought back to when she'd told Simba to run away, the first serious step she'd taken toward her current state. She wanted to slap the stupid cub she had been back then for ever having second thoughts. She'd grown into a debauched, gluttonous tyrant (as well as a mountain of a lioness), and she was incapable of imagining a better life.

Okay, well, maybe it could get a little better. "Scar?" she said questioningly.

"Yes, my darling?"

"Do you think I'm beautiful?"

She knew that her mate loved her for her mind, for her long-sought (if only recently achieved) remorseless cruelty, for her nearly perfect selfishness. But he rarely said anything about her body, and when he did, it was all irritatingly vague. Nala had worked hard to become what she was, physically as well as a mentally--though there could be no denying that it had been highly enjoyable work, for the most part--and she wanted to know that Scar loved the whole package. The question seemed to shock him. She wasn't used to catching him off guard.

She pressed on. "I'm serious. I know how you feel about my personality, but I want to know what you think of my body."

"Your body thrills me," he replied, without even a moment's pause. "It's a physical manifestation of everything I love about your mind, a testament to everything you've done and sacrificed and become to get this far. And it's beautiful, too. When you were a cub, I feared that I would find you disgusting as you put on weight, and that I would just have to pretend once you became my queen, but you've only grown lovelier." There was no hint of an edge to his voice, no audible cues that he was working any kind of an angle. Nala didn't think she'd heard him speak so candidly.

"Did you really plan all this out that far in advance?" she said wonderingly. Scar laughed at that, and licked her closest roll affectionately.

"Nala, my love, I've been planning some form of 'all this' since the very first time you ate with me, though I admit that I didn't seriously start considering it until you left and came back."

"Oh? And why's that?"

"Because once you abandoned your family for purely hedonistic reasons, I was confident that you could make it the rest of the way."

"And just look at me now," Nala said with a smile. "You've absolutely ruined me."
1112122112122111112111211211112121.title: Apotheosis

11121221121221111121112112111121211.content:
Nala and Scar may not have ruled well, from an outsider's perspective, but the only perspective the couple cared about was their own, and they thought they were doing great. They had no heirs and no way to maintain any sort of order past their own lifespans. They lived from moment to moment in each other's company, ruling the pride with iron paws because Scar enjoyed the feeling of power.

What Nala enjoyed more, of course, was eating, and Scar took pains to keep her always full to near-bursting, for no matter how large her appetite grew, her body grew apace, turning her into more of an obscene, formless blob with each passing day. Scar had never seen anything more beautiful.

The two of them lived long (and, in Nala's case, full) lives, and when they finally passed away together, the new stars that appeared in the night sky had a sinister glow. They may live on only in infamy, but the pride would certainly never forget them.
11121221121221111121112112111121211.title: Happily Ever After

choices: "Allow him to be with us. It was an accident after all, was it not?"
"No! Guards, seize this lion so he may be tried! Today, he shall pay his due!"
11121221121221111121112112111121212.content:
A lion, head lowered, walked up through Pride Rock to the essential throne room. Pacing inside, he gazed up at Scar and said,
"You may not recognize me, uncle, but it is I: Simba. I have come to ask if I may be forgiven by you and my people so that I may at least live among you. I am not worthy of the throne, after the atrocity I committed, but I am here to ask if I may join those of lower-born rankings. Please, my uncle, will you forgive me?" Simba asked Scar, a great pain visible within him.
"Oh, my nephew, I do love you, and had thought you for dead, but I know of what awful thing you have done. Patricide is not something that can be atoned for through simple labor or suffering. But by my grace I may grant you the freedom to return to us as a fellow lion of the pride. However: I wish to consult my queen before all is said and done." Scar said, walking over to Nala. Nala gazed upon Simba, who looked at her with clear pain his eyes, obvious pleading. Something was nagging at her, something familiar, but she brushed it away.
"Oh my most faithful adviser and beloved, what verdict do you bring? Is Simba doomed to be cast from our ranks eternally, or is he to be granted this one pardon for his-vile-crime?" Scar asked, placing a loving lick upon her corpulence.
11121221121221111121112112111121212.title: Simba returns from exile

1112122112122111112112111121.title: more

111212211212211111212.content:
As miserable as she was personally, Nala was a good cub at heart, and she didn't want to disappoint her parents. So she accepted the pitiful portions they gave her, and after a while, she learned to ignore her ever-grumbly belly. What she didn't do, though, was lose any weight. Her hanging stomach was surprisingly resilient, and though it dissipated some as she grew taller, she never actually lost it. Her mother and father trusted her, though, so they didn't accuse her of sneaking food on the side.

One morning, weeks after her diet had begun, Nala woke up to see Sarafina standing over her.

"What is it, mom?" she groaned. "I just had a bath yesterday!" But Sarafina's expression didn't say I'm going to pin you down and bathe you. The full-grown lioness looked concerned.

"You really hate dieting, don't you?"

"...Yeah," Nala admitted after a moment. She winced, expecting her mom to lecture her about knowing what was good for her.

"And you haven't lost that weight..." Sarafina said. "Well, your father and I talked it over last night, and since it looks like your stomach is here to stay, we don't see any point in trying to control your diet."

"You mean...?" Nala, formerly groggy, awoke instantly, hope singing in her chest.

"Yes, Nala. You may eat whatever you'd like."
111212211212211111212.title: New Diet

choices: Nala and Sarafina have a talk
1112122112122111112121.content:
"As a way of apologizing for putting you through all of that needlessly, I found you a nice breakfast." Sarafina picked Nala up by the scruff of her neck and turned her around so she could see out of the den. Nala spied a somewhat familiar-looking expanse of reddish skin just out of the way of the entrance. She gasped and sprinted over to it as fast as her legs would carry her.

Her instincts were spot-on: It was a fully-grown hippopotamus, bigger than the one Scar had fed her what now felt like years ago.

"Is this...is it all for me?" she asked, awed by the prospect of this much food after being denied for so long.

"If you'd like," Sarafina answered. Nala hesitated just long enough to thank and nuzzle her mother, and then she dove at the hippo like the ravenous lion she was.

She may not have lost any weight during her weeks of dieting, but the lack of food had definitely stunted Nala's appetite. She was barely a quarter of the way through the hippo when--horror of horrors--she found herself getting full. Her stomach had puffed out to where it had been before she started dieting, though since she was taller, that meant it was even a little bigger than it had been.

Nala looked behind her. Sarafina was still laying there, forepaws folded, watching her daughter binge. Nala knew that her mother wouldn't be upset if she stopped eating (since Sarafina wanted her to form her own eating habits, not to glut herself past the point of comfort), but stopping now still felt like a sign of weakness. Dammit, she'd eaten this much when she was just a tiny cub! Surely she could manage it now!

She tried to recall what Scar's words to her had been that fateful night. ...Once you free yourself of what you believe is the maximum amount you can eat... Scar had been right before, hadn't he? So this was nothing!

Determinedly, and after a lingering glance at her mother (who just watched silently, a faint smile on her face), Nala dug back into the hippo. It was rough going at first (and she remembered belatedly that the hyenas had had to force-feed her the hippo the first time, to her extreme discomfort), but she persevered. She would show her mother how she really ate!

After a while, Nala got back into her groove, and eating became easier. As before, the pleasure she derived from gluttony eventually overcame the pain of being far too full. Her pace quickened: As much as she wanted to savor the flavor of the first real meal she'd had in ages, her primary concern was eating as much as possible, and in her slightly food-addled head, that meant eating as fast as possible. She scarfed down huge chunks of the hippo and barely bothering to chew. Past a certain point, the distension of her stomach itself, as well as the act of filling it, became pleasurable to her. She remembered, back in Scar's den, wondering what it would be like to have a low-hanging belly. Well, she was far past that now. Her massive stomach lifted all four of her paws off the ground, and the thought that she had once again eaten herself into at least temporary immobility sent a thrill through her.

But all good things must end, and eventually Nala swallowed the last of the hippo meat.
1112122112122111112121.title: NEW New Diet

11121221121221111121211.content:
Since Nala herself couldn't move for the time being, Sarafina came over to where she lay beached.

"My goodness," the older lioness said. "I didn't actually expect you to eat that whole thing."

"You don't sound happy about that," Nala said, a mite defensively. She didn't want to be put back on her previous diet, though if this display of gluttony did get her put back on strict rations, it would almost be worth it.

"I'm not," Sarafina replied frankly. "But you're my daughter, and I want you to be happy. So if this is what you want to do with your life...I'm not going to stop you. You'll be queen someday at any rate, so it's not as though you'll need to keep in shape for hunting. But you do realize that if you keep eating like this, you're going to end up extremely fat, don't you?"

"Yeah, mom. I know." That's kind of the point, she added mentally but didn't say aloud.

"All right," Sarafina said, sounding dubious. "But you'll have to find some way to get your own food. I'll bring you extra when I can, but I have the whole pride to think about, and if you expect to eat like this..." she eyed her massively engorged daughter and the pile of bones that lay beside her "...every day, you'll need to find the extra food some other way."

"Thanks, Mom, and don't worry. I know someone I can ask."
11121221121221111121211.title: Mother-Daughter Talk

choices: Try to find out who it's from
Who cares who brought it? FOOD!
11121221121221111121212.content:
Over the next month, Nala settled into her new lifestyle. She never got to eat quite to the level of the apology hippo (for the simple reason that the pride usually didn't have that much extra food), but she was certainly eating more than most cubs her age. Sarafina, despite her own misgivings about Nala's gain, always made a point of bringing home extra food for her gluttonous daughter. The exact amount of food varied, but Nala always ate it all gratefully.

The young lioness porked out noticeably over the course of the month. Her belly hung down nearly to her knees, even when it wasn't full of food, and the extra girth forced her to adopt a slow, bow-legged walk. Nala wasn't a big fan of walking, since it burned precious energy, but Sarafina insisted that she get at least a little exercise. Nala's mother was hoping that this was a phase that Nala would eventually grow out of, and when that happened, she didn't want her baby girl to have any trouble because of a flirtation with overeating. On the other paw, if Nala didn't decide to stop this nonsense, Sarafina knew that she would become immobilized sooner or later, and she was determined that it would happen later rather than sooner.

For her part, Nala griped but did what Sarafina wanted. A little walking was a small price to pay for her mother letting her gain. The cub was becoming a little dissatisfied with the amount of food she was being given, but she didn't know what she could do about it. It wasn't like Sarafina was trying to secretly make her lose weight; she still got pretty consistently-sized meals. It was just that the same amount of food just wasn't filling her up like it used to.

Part of her was completely thrilled about that. It meant that she was gaining well and increasing her capacity. But the rest of her just wanted more food!

One day, Nala awoke from a nap to see the carcass of a female kudu lying by the entrance of her family's den. She ran over to it, hoping that Sarafina had brought it for her, but her mother was nowhere to be found. That was odd. Sarafina usually stuck around to make sure Nala knew what meat was hers, and, come to think of it, she always brought her kills into the den, and she woke Nala when she had something to give her. So this probably wasn't from her mom, then.
11121221121221111121212.title: A Month Later

Devoured the thing. If the stars wanted her fatter, who was she to deny them?

Nala called out. "Hello? Mom, are you there? Was this from you?" She got up and clambered around as best she could to look around the place.

"Can I eat this? Please tell me I can eat this." She called. A stone clattered to the ground, startling the rotund girl.

"Who's there?" she called, finding herself suddenly stuck onto her back. Nothing but silence responded to her.

After much difficulty, she managed to roll onto her side and subsequently stand back up. Feeling frazzled, she chose to avoid the food (as much as her everything asked otherwise) and continued her search. She sniffed about her den, to find no scent of any living being besides herself and the delicious smell of the food. She smelled several day old scents from her mother and week old scents from her father but otherwise nothing. It was as though the food had simply spawned out of thin air. She returned to the meat and...
111212211212211111212121.title: Try to find out who it's from

choices: It was just a one-time thing
111212211212211111212122.content:
Nala considered doing some further investigation as to the source of the mysterious kudu, but the smell of the meat was just too tempting. With some difficulty, she dragged the carcass further into the den, then flopped down next to it and began to eat.

Her mom had never managed to bring home this much extra meat; she usually got only part of an animal, or maybe a very small antelope, in addition to her normal meals. The kudu wasn't too huge, only about 400 pounds, but Nala was ecstatic about getting even that much. She ate it quickly and without much difficulty, aside from the difficulty of moving to get the last of the meat when she'd already eaten so much. The meal didn't quite immobilize her, but her rounded stomach was definitely dragging on the ground by the time she was done. Content despite not having eaten to her full potential, Nala drifted back to sleep.

Later, her mother woke her up for dinner. Sarafina must have noticed Nala's distended stomach, but didn't comment on it. She just gave her daughter the chunk of zebra meat that was the normal ration for a cub Nala's age, plus the extra leg she had grabbed for her. Nala ate both hunks of meat happily, with no complaints now that she'd gotten a real meal in earlier.
111212211212211111212122.title: Food Is Better than Answers

choices: Increase the frequency of her gifts
She finds a trail of food
1112122112122111112121222.content:
Nala was pleased to find that the kudu wasn't some weird fluke. More carcasses showed up on her denstep, at first a couple times a week, but gradually the frequency of the extra food increased to nearly daily. It always appeared when she wasn't paying attention, and never when her parents were around. She didn't have a clue who was sending it, but then, she didn't really care. Whoever it was, they were a really good person to keep feeding her like this, and if they wanted to stay all secretive about their identity, she wasn't about to ruin their game by trying to figure them out.

Much to her delight, the size of the animals increased quickly, until her mysterious friend was left a cape buffalo outside her den. That meant that Nala soon had no choice but to eat out in the open, since it would have been impossible for her to move an animal weighing nearly a ton. At first the public gluttony embarrassed her, but not many people were around, and anyway, by the time she saw her first buffalo, she was well past caring about what the rest of the pride thought.

She was still mobile, but only barely, and dragging her fat self to the buffalo was hard work. Good thing there were nearly 2000 pounds of meat there to help her get her strength back! Eating it wasn't too hard, thanks to her nearly limitless capacity, and it was the best, biggest meal she'd had in ages. Once again, her expanding stomach lifted her off her feet. She moaned with pleasure at her temporary immobility and increased her eating speed. She was so excited to reach true immobility that she could hardly stand it. No more walks with her mother, no more having to do things for herself...all she would be able to do would be eat and sleep. It sounded like heaven.
1112122112122111112121222.title: More Presents

choices: One day, her mother asks her about her increased weight gain
Things carry on like this for some time
11121221121221111121212221.content:
She never questioned the strange food. However it appeared so late at night was of no concern to her. What was, however, was making sure she was getting bigger and bigger; and that she was. Having grown to now be on the very cusp of immobility, Sarafina had stopped asking her to exercise, disgruntledly accepting that sooner was here rather than later.

Nala continued to feast at late nights. The food had gotten to a point of showing up in daily pairs of two, but tonight saw a third. Nala ate and ate and ate until there was nothing left for her to eat. Sometimes, when she was alone, a piece of food would show up while she wasn't looking. And, of course, Nala always finished it before anyone would see anything. She had stopped caring entirely about what anyone thought about her, her only care left being for her to keep on eating more and more forever and forever. And so...
11121221121221111121212221.title: Where is it coming from?

choices: Try to roll over to it
11121221121221111121212222.content:
The next morning when her mom woke her for breakfast, Nala was displeased to find that she was more or less mobile again. Sarafina said something about how the two of them really must go on a walk that afternoon, so as soon as she left, Nala settled down for a nap, partly to conserve her energy, and partly to give her mysterious benefactor time to leave her a more substantive meal.

When she woke up, it didn't look like there was anything waiting for her at the mouth of the cave, but she waddled over just in case. Sure enough, tucked away where she wouldn't have been able to see it was...a dik-dik, one of the stupid little pygmy antelopes that warned away better game with its obnoxious clicking. Nala ate it in a few mouthfuls, and wondered what the heck had happened. No food would have been less of a disappointment than this tiny thing. But then, much to her surprise, she saw a tommie, a gazelle not much bigger than the dik-dik she'd just eaten, lying several meters away from where she stood.

Curious, she made her ponderous way over to it. No one was anywhere near it, and the pride usually didn't just leave food lying in the middle of the living area. Figuring that she might as well not let it go to waste, she downed it as well. It was hardly more satisfying than the dik-dik had been. But there was an aardvark a few meters further on, and then an impala, and then a warthog (don't worry, no one important!). By the time she'd stumbled down to the oryx carcass that was beyond the warthog, she was well out of Pride Rock.

As she chowed down on the oryx, she felt her paws leave the ground. Her belly had hung lower and lower as she made her way though each successive animal, but this was the first time that day that she had immobilized herself. Immobility was still a fantastic feeling, and ordinarily, she would be thrilled if she managed to get this much to eat, but she suspected that there were more animals further on, and it would be a shame if she wasn't able to get to them.

Sure enough, when she finished off the oryx, Nala could see another carcass lying just out of easy sight range. She couldn't tell exactly what it was, but even though she was stuffed full, she knew she wanted to eat it.
11121221121221111121212222.title: The Gauntlet

111212211212211111212122221.content:
Nala strained her legs downward, trying to get them to make contact with the ground, but it was no use. The several animals she had eaten already that day, combined with the still-not-completely-digested buffalo of the previous day, had swelled her gut to the point where she had no chance of walking until she digested. That annoyed her. Who knew how long it would take until she digested enough to be mobile again? She could see more food lying in the grass down a gentle slope, and she wanted to eat it now, not in a day or two.

But when she noticed that her next course was slightly downhill from her current position, she got an idea. With her big stomach, she was more or less circular, so maybe she could roll down to the carcass. With a grunt, she started rocking back and fourth, trying to push herself to the point where her body would start going downhill from its own momentum. Finally, she managed to flip herself over, and after a moment of pain from having all that weight pressing down on her spine, she was off.

Her journey was more of a continuous flop than a true roll, since she wasn't quite as round as she imagined herself to be. It was a very uncomfortable way to travel: More than once, she ended up with her face pressed against the dry soil. Eventually, though, she thudded to a stop, head-first, against something big and solid. Nala's squashed nose could tell that it was meat, and though she couldn't quite identify the animal, she didn't care. She was stuck, unable to move her head out of the dead animal's flank. And, of course, there was only one way to free herself: eat her way out.

She was a bit dizzy from the trip, but she fought down the feeling. After all, she was stopped pretty solidly now, and there was work to be done. She tore into the carcass like it was her first meal of the day, disregarding the hundreds of pounds of meat she had already eaten. It went down a treat, and her stomach expanded more and more to fit it all in. Nala wasn't worried about her increasing immobility, though: she knew how to keep moving if she wanted to.

What she didn't count on was the hill she was on getting steeper. As soon as she swallowed the last of the wildebeest (for that's what it had turned out to be), she started rolling again.
111212211212211111212122221.title: Roly-Poly Lioness

1112122112122111112121222211.content:
Luckily for Nala, whoever had set out all this food for her had known what they were doing. She came to a stop with another faceplant into the side of a dead animal, obviously a zebra this time. It took her a little longer to get over her dizziness this time, since she had been rolling faster, but once she felt a little better, she ate the zebra with the same determination she'd eaten all the other animals. She didn't even wonder how she was going to get back home, in fact, she didn't even think about her home. All she could think about was the meat in front of her and getting as much of it inside her as possible.

Once the zebra was finished, she kept rolling into more animals, each a little larger than the last. When she came to a cape buffalo, less than a full day after the last one, she had already eaten more than two tons of food in the past twenty-four hours, and she was getting to the point where eating was starting to be painful. Not that she stopped eating when it started hurting, of course. She had trained her stomach better than that.

And the weird thing was that, unlike when she had eaten the hippos, the pain didn't actually feel bad. In fact, as she worked her way through the buffalo, she found, more and more, that the terrible distention of her gut thrilled her in a way she wasn't used to. She moaned and panted and ate faster, either trying to make the feeling go away or make it stronger. The more she overstuffed herself, the more it built, like there was a roaring furnace inside her. It made her feel strangely light and empty even as she was as full as she'd ever been.

To her surprise, the next animal she ran into was actually a hippopotamus. Such a huge beast would have been a challenge for her on an empty stomach, but with the furnace roaring inside her, she felt that she could handle anything. The strange pleasure-pain continued to grow in her mountainous gut until she didn't think she could take it any more. Desperately, she increased her pace. Her useless little limbs scrabbled against her huge stomach, trying to reach the food to shovel it in even faster. For the first time ever, she wished she was being force-fed: she imagined that other people working in concert could feed her a lot faster than she could eat on her own.

Even at the furious pace she was going, the hippo took her a long time. It was as heavy as all her previous courses combined, and eating it took her well into the night. Her senses blurred together after a while, until there was only that white-hot furnace feeling and the desperate, keening need to consume and consume and consume. When she finally swallowed the last bite, she exploded--or, at least, that was what it felt like. All the tension that had been building as she gorged herself came to a searing crescendo and then released. It was all a bit too much for Nala. She passed out.

Once she had been unconscious for several minutes, figures came out of the darkness and dragged her away.
1112122112122111112121222211.title: She rolls into more food

11121221121221111121212222111.content:
Nala awoke, still monstrously overfull, to find her face buried in the side of a hippo carcass. Her memories of the previous day were hazy, but she vaguely thought that she had already eaten the hippo. Oh, well. There was no point in letting good food go to waste, so she started eating again. At first, her pace was slow: She was already pretty full, after all, and she absolutely loved the taste of hippo. Soon, though, the strange, fevered excitement of the night before overtook her once again, and her eating sped up until she was wolfing down the hippo as fast as she possibly could.

It still wasn't enough. She whined as she ate, desperate for more, faster. Unlike the previous night, however, when she had had to resort to some interesting contortions to reach her food, something kept the remaining meat pressed right up against her face, so she needed only the minimum of movement to continue gorging. When she finished the hippo, she experienced the same blissful feeling of relief and then passed out again.

Unbeknownst to Nala, two humans watched her from the other side of a one-way mirror. The female cub really was a curious study. She could have been no more than a year old, and yet during their time observing her, she had eaten herself into being taller than a full grown lion, and nearly three times as wide. They had had lion subjects before, of course, but this hugely stuffed cub with the seemingly endless appetite was something special. She would be perfect for their ________ experiments.
11121221121221111121212222111.title: Science Rules

111212211212211111212122221111.content:
Testing the effects of obesity on wild (not to mention near-endangered) animals was a tricky subject in the scientific community. It was less ethically sticky than testing on humans, but still questionable enough that they'd been forced to move their research to this unpeopled land, far from the prying eyes of animal rights groups.

They had wanted to weigh the female cub upon her arrival, but it was impossible to tell what was permanent weight and what was food weight. Healthy weight for an adult female lion was about 350 pounds, and their subject was more than twice that heavy, not to mention only a year old. Even if it was mostly food weight, the female cub was clearly an outlier.

Their next task, before they could start doing any serious studies of her, was to find out exactly how much the cub could eat. She did not yet seem to realize that she was no longer in the wild, and the scientists preferred to keep it that way until they discovered her capacity, lest her habits change from the realization that she was in a new environment. However, they didn't exactly have many more huge African mammals laying around, so they were forced to improvise.

Synthetic meat was a fairly new development, and the stuff wasn't quite up to the standards of human food yet, but it was easy to make, and they doubted that the lioness would know the difference. While she was passed out, they put together massive piles of the stuff, covered it in something that was as close to the physical composition of hippopotamus skin, and moved the "hippos" into another chamber in their facility, one that had a scale built into the floor. They (or, more accurately, their assistants) moved the female cub into the scaled room, and then kept her knocked out until she had digested all the food that had been in her system. She was much smaller when she wasn't stuffed to the brim. Her heavy paws just brushed the dirt-covered floor, but her belly surged around them. By the scientists' calculations, she was about 200 pounds, not as big as a full-grown lion, but still several times heavier than a cub her age should have been.

They let her wake up within easy reach of the first "hippo." Each pile of synthetic meat weighed precisely three short tons, so it would be a simple operation to find out how much the cub packed away. She attacked the first "hippo" like she hadn't eaten in days (and from the scientists' time observing her in the wild, this was probably the first time her stomach had been completely empty in over a month). To their relief, the cub did not appear to notice that the meat wasn't what it appeared to be. She quickly immobilized herself, but they had been prepared for that: As in the last room, several cunningly-concealed mechanical arms pushed more food toward her constantly.

Nala didn't know where she was. She'd woken up ravenously hungry, and had had what looked like a hippo lying right in front of her face, but it smelled and tasted wrong. Oh, well, she thought. At least it was food. She didn't know how she'd digested that string of animals so fast, but her stomach was screaming at her to eat, and she was never one to disobey her stomach. The meat wasn't bad, just strange, and there was a lot of it, which was the most important thing. It came to her like it knew what she was thinking, which was good news, because she was barely a third of the way through the fake-hippo when she could no longer move.

The previous day's binge had stretched her stomach out to the point where a hippo (or a weird thing the size of a hippo) wasn't a huge ordeal, so she finished it happily...only to find another of the same thing right behind it. Oh, she must have died and gone to heaven!

That weird pleasure-pain feeling she'd been having recently hit her when she was in the middle of the second hippo-thing, and she redoubled her pace. Two hippos was a lot of food, even for her, but the burning emptiness in her chest kept her as hungry as she had been when she woke up. The third fake-hippo disappeared into her increasingly massive stomach, and she was midway through the fourth when her vision exploded into stars and she had to stop eating.

The researchers were stunned. The female cub had managed to ingest nearly ten tons of meat. Even based on their previous observation of her, they hadn't expected such huge numbers.
111212211212211111212122221111.title: Scientific Stuffers

1112122112122111112121222211112.content:
Once the scientists were confident that their subject would not be able to escape, they spent less and less time worrying about making her enclosure look like the savannah outside. While they continued to dress their synthetic meat up as hippos, they stopped hiding the apparatuses that moved the meat around. But even without having to hide what they were doing, feeding the female cub was becoming more difficult as she grew.

They needn't have bothered hiding anything. Nala soon noticed that she was clearly not on the savannah any more, but, just as when she had noticed that the "hippos" weren't what they appeared to be, she didn't care as long as the mysterious food kept coming, which it did, in a seemingly endless supply. Nala happily spent every waking moment glutting herself, and as a result, her weight skyrocketed. Since she ate to her capacity every day, she quickly became too fat to move under her own power. Even then, she never wanted for food. However the strange, cold things that moved her food about worked, she was grateful that they did.

It wasn't their fault that she eventually started having trouble eating fast enough. No matter how quickly food was put in front of her, it took time for her to bite and chew and swallow. The burning, insatiable feeling had become a reality: Nala was becoming physically unable to consume the amount of food it took to fill her up.

Then one morning, instead of waking up to a hippo-thing sitting in front of her, Nala found that the big room was empty, but there was a snake in her mouth, one made of the same cold, gray stuff as everything else in this place. A couple minutes after she awoke, she suddenly found that her mouth was full of the meat she'd grown used to, flowing slowly out of the snake. She swallowed, surprised, only to find another mouthful in place.

The feeling was...weird. She tried to squirm away, but was so hugely obese that she could only barely move her head. She didn't like this metal snake.
1112122112122111112121222211112.title: Start tube-feeding her

11121221121221111121212222111121.content:
It was no better than feeding herself. She sucked desperately on the end of the snake, trying to make the meat come faster, but it didn't.

On the other side of the glass, the scientists noticed that their subject was having trouble with the feeding tube. At first, they assumed that she didn't like how it felt, but after one of them noticed the increased pressure on the tube, they realized the truth. Since they couldn't very well alter the thing while the female cub was using it, they piped sleeping gas into her room.

When Nala awoke, she found, much to her displeasure, that the gray snake was still in her mouth. Just like before, it filled her mouth with meat, but too slowly to be of any real use. Having nothing else that she could do, since the room was otherwise empty and it wasn't as though she could just get up and leave, she started sucking on it again. To her surprise, the flow seemed to increase marginally. She swallowed the new mouthful of meat and sucked harder, and her mouth filled up slightly quicker. She kept it up until the meat was coming as fast as she could swallow.

And then, on a whim, she sucked even harder. Now, the force of the flow itself was pushing meat down her throat, without her having to do anything. Once she overcame her gag reflex (which wasn't too hard, since her body was used to absurd quantities of food), she was free to enjoy the sensation of being stuffed without even having to go to the minimal effort of chewing and swallowing.

God, but she'd missed the feeling of being stuffed tight. This weird snake was finally allowing her to satiate her monstrous hunger again. She had no way of knowing how much she was consuming, but it was obviously going down faster than if she'd been eating normally.
11121221121221111121212222111121.title: Faster!

111212211212211111212122221111211.content: As Nala neared the perfect feeling of total satiation, she started to become concerned. The meat in the snake wasn't slowing down at all, and as she felt the release of tension that only came when she was full, she started to drift off to sleep, only to be snapped back into panicked wakefulness by the fact that more meat was still being forced into her.
111212211212211111212122221111211.title: No Off Switch

choices: The scientists notice what's going on
1112122112122111112121222211112112.content:
Nala moved the metal snake around in her mouth, trying to find some way to shut it off, but there didn't seem to be one. It never occurred to her to simply take the thing out of her mouth, so she just kept dutifully swallowing the meat, groaning and whimpering with pain.

After a while, and so subtly that she barely noticed the change, the awful pain subsided and was replaced by a burning sensation of emptiness, though Nala knew she was far too full to be enjoying this. Nevertheless, she hadn't gotten to this point by being the sort to ignore her stomach, so she desperately sucked harder and harder on the metal snake until the meat was rushing furiously down her throat. After a while, her vision went starry again, but instead of leaving her feeling unfocused and sleepy like it usually did, the furnace feeling was back, stronger than ever. She had to have more.
1112122112122111112121222211112112.title: Endless Hunger

11121221121221111121212222111121121.content:
Scar had been right after all: once Nala got past how much she thought she could eat, there were no limitations on how fat she could get.

Hooked up to the metal snake and constantly being stuffed more-than-full, Nala soon lost herself. She could feel, dimly, that she was growing, and derived some pleasure from that feeling, but she was more concerned with consuming as much as possible, as fast as possible. As a result, she grew fast. Soon, much of her limbs and tail became completely buried under her flab, turning her into a single shapeless ball of fat. Her massive stomach creaked and groaned constantly as it was forced to accommodate an ever-increasing flow of food, and if you watched her--as her scientist feeders did--you would swear you could see her growing.
11121221121221111121212222111121121.title: What Happened After

111212211212211111212122221112.content:
The scientists were surprised by the cub's capacity, but it got them the metrics that they needed about how much food she normally ate. Additionally, it was clear that they wouldn't endanger the cub's health if they tricked her body into losing weight. Heck, if anything, their experiment was going to make her healthier!

When it was next time to feed the test subject, instead of giving her real hippo meat, they dressed lab-grown meat in synthetic hippopotamus skin. Synthetic meat was, for one thing, infinitely easier to procure than actual African game. More importantly, though, the synthetic meat offered a simple way to get the cub to ingest their new weight-loss drug. This particular batch of meat was treated with a chemical that would, if this test proceeded like tests on smaller animals...
111212211212211111212122221112.title: Seriously, Weight Loss??

choices: mor food for his pet (force feeding)
11121221121221112.content:
After devouring about half of the carcass before stopping herself to indulging in the meat that was provided for her by Scar, Nala didn’t want to indulge in front of the sly lion as not to give Scar any indication of her enjoyment. While the young cub munched away on the meat he graciously provided for the young one’s dream to be fat, but it wasn’t the meat that irked him the wrong way it was just how she treated him, even though he was the third in line for the name of king she treated as if he was no more than hired help, Scar wasn’t going to take this treatment that Nala has forced upon him, she was going to become large this wasn’t something that Scar wasn’t going to stop from happening but he was going to stop from happening is this little dance he was having with Nala about who was actually in charge here. A light burp escaped from Nala’s mouth that made her giggle slightly it was good to have some one who knew about her secret that not only wanted to help her reach it but also provided the means to become the biggest she is able to become. Looking at herself with some smugness to her almost like she was proud of what was becoming of her, yet it scared her as well.She didn’t know what to feel, all that she feeling confused her it was feat of what was becoming of her that is what really confused her. She loved food in all of its shapes and forms but the weight that she put on because of what it really meant for her, she didn’t much care for the flub that surrounded her body it felt heavy and not that anyone found it attractive, as her mind about being fat changed she never noticed that the sly lion had plans for the little cub.

　　Scar has seen that Nala has finished gorging her face with the little appetizer he has made for her, yet she seemed worried and fearing for herself, not understanding what made this change in her perspective on her desires, unbeknownst to Nala Scar has called his some of his most loyal hyenas that he had at his command. “my mother is probably worried about me, I must leave for now Scar” the young cub stated scared about what her body was becoming, “My dear leaving so soon there is so much meat for you to devour if you so choose” Scar said ever so keenly looking to get a rise out of Nala to see what she was going to do. “No I must be going Simba must be waiting for me at the watering hole we were suppose to go exploring today and I don’t want to keep him waiting” making any excuse to leave the den of Scar. As she made her way to the entrance of the den there was a hindrance to her progress, two hyenas where there to stop her from going back home. “I had such high hopes for you my child I was hoping you would give into your desires of being nothing but flub, but it seems as if the changes that have occurred in the short time you have been pigging out has made you wary of this life style, you think your in control of your own self, my dear I must say I am disappointed in you and since you won’t make the changes on your own then I will have to make you” the presumptuous Scar slithered behind the scared cub not knowing if she will ever see home again, as a wide grin appeared upon scars face she knew that her once desires will become her nightmare. “now, now little one your mine, but don’t worry I will keep you well fed, obey me or there will be punishment for you courtesy of my friends here” Slyly Scar said putting his claws under the scared Nala’s chin as hyenas growled behind her. Her position wasn’t good she new that food was coming her way but in no way will she yield to scar, she will fight in any way she can.
11121221121221112.title: Nala's decision

choices: Nala falls asleep and has a dream...
The Hyenas want food of their own...
1112122112122112.content:
No sooner said than done, and already happening, the hyenas started to bring the enormous zebra over. Nala was feeling somewhat regretful of her choice, thinking that if she chose to eat on her own she could at least feed herself at a slower pace than how the hyenas are feeding her. She then looked at her overstuffed belly which was starting to surprise her from who enormous it had become. Bring the zebra closer to the ball of cub took a while and Scar was watching them and waiting for them to hurry up, giving Nala the opportunity to feel her girth. She felt her sides which started to sag from compressing onto the ground. Her pudgy love-handles had a slightly stiff yet gooey consistency. She tried to feel more but her arms couldn't reach out any farther than about a good ten inches from the middle. She then went to her belly which felt different; rubbing her stomach was as if she was rubbing a huge smooth rock with fur on it, but a rock wouldn't have felt the soothing relaxation she felt. With little time left before the stuffing, she tried to see if she could reach her paws to the top of her belly. She raised her back for more length and stretched as much as she could but was out of reach by a few inches. Laying back on the ground she noticed the pangs began to lessen and with a grin of encouragement started to wonder how much more she could eat and stuff.

"Well, someone looks excited for her next meal." proclaimed Scar. Nala could now get a better look at the Zebra she would have crammed inside of her. The smell from the carcass was the freshest she had ever scented, and seeing all that meat on the big animal got her a little more excited. She could detect pain in the near future but also a new and bigger gut.

One hyena ripped a piece of meat and brought it over to Nala, who opened her smile very wide and accepted the food. She chewed a few times before the meat was practically mush; the surprising tenderness and delicious flavor made her want to keep chewing and savoring the taste, but another piece hovering above made her swallow. On and on the stuffing continued as did the growth of the cub's belly. About a third of the zebra was devoured and not a single bit on determination left the fat greedy Nala. Occasionally she'd look at her progress, always satisfied with the extension she saw. More and more stuffing ensued with much more joy than pain felt in her stomach, which now seem like a hill that could be found somewhere in the Prideland. Eventually the zebra was finished and the extremely overstuffed, round, fat cub laid there feeling bliss and very very full.
1112122112122112.title: "I am going to need some help."

111212211212212.content:
Soon, Nala was no longer able to swallow any meat in spite of any threats from the hyenas. Scar grinned like the Grinch and said, "Well now ... it seems things are about to get fun."

Now Nala was rolled onto her back and one hyena held down each of her paws and the fifth placed a piece of meat in her mouth ... then crammed it down her throat with its paw. More and more meat was packed into her, swelling her cheeks and neck, but mostly her ridiculously huge stomach. Nala whimpered and moaned and her stomach creaked and gurgled.

Now the entire hippo was gone, except for the bones. Nala was rolled back over and instead of a huge stomach hanging below her, she was perched atop a huge stomach. She was panting and whimpering and it was doubtful that she was even fully aware of anything going on around her.
111212211212212.title: Faster!

11121222.content:
Nala rested on the ledge for a little while, until Scar had disappeared, then examined her environment. She wasn't actually quite as full as she'd made out, and while she was still in no position to jump down from the ledge, she might be lucky enough to find another way down.

It took Nala a few minutes to find what she was looking for, a cleft in the rock that might just be good enough to slow her fall. It would still be a big fall though, and her stomach churned at the thought, but she was decided, and after a few moments of plucking up her courage, jumped.

Things didn't go exactly to plan though. Firstly, Nala misjudged her own preparedness, landing short of the spot she was after, then one of her paws slipped and she half somersaulted, landing on her back, her heavy belly knocking the wing out of her, and her general heftiness leaving her with some nasty bruises.

After recovering for a little while, Nala rolled over and struggled to her paws. She was beginning to feel drowsy as her stomach began to digest its large meal, but it would have to wait, she had to get out of here first.
11121222.title: On The Run

111212221.content:
While at first Nala had been firm of purpose, she quickly fell to mere wandering, as the caves turned out to be more expansive than she'd thought. Finally, she could no longer deny her exhaustion and so sat down to rest a moment, though she jumped up again when a voice behind her said, "and what do we have here?"

"S-scar," Nala said, surpised and nervous."

"Nala," Scar replied, "I thought I told you to stay put."

"Well, um..." Nala said, unable to think of anything to say.

"That was disobedient Nala and dangerous Nala," Scar said, "you might have become lost wandering around here." He thought for a moment, then added, "of course, I can't blame a cub for being inquisitive, or hungry."

"Hungry," Nala asked nervously, but Scar didn't reply, instead picking her up daintily and walking away, "hey, put me down."

Scar ignored Nala's protests as he carried the femasle cub back to the main cave where the rest of the gazelle carcasses were. Dropping her in front of one of them, he pushed her towards it, and said, "eat up, eat until you can't possibly move."
111212221.title: Meet Scar

choices: "I believe she needs a little help fellas."
"Would you like some rest my dear?"
1112122211.content:
Nala didn't like the tone of Scars words. They didn't sound like a suggestion or even an order. They were more like a threat and she didn't want to know the consequences if she disobeyed him. Instead she tucked in and began eating trying to enjoy the meal. She made fast work of the first gazelle caucass and moved to the second. On the second she was starting to slow. Whenever she took a moment to rest Scar moved closer and seemed impatient. Once again Nala didn't question whether Scar was bluffing or if he really had something in mind she just tore off a large chunk of meat into her mouth and chewed. By the time she was halfway done the last of the gazelles she was feeling stuffed. She was glad that she was almost done. Even if she wasn't as stuffed as Scar wanted he couldn't complain if he didn't have anything else to eat and she doubted he had managed to get anything else. With a smile full of confidence she finished up the rest of the gazelle and let out a blech in triumph.

"That was fun," she told Scar as she began walking to the exit. "We must do this again soon."

Of course Nala was refering to "soon" as "never" since she never wished to set foot in this cave with Scar by herself ever again. She had barely gone anywhere when Scar stopped her again.

"I don't believe you heard me clearly," he replied. "I believe I said that you were to eat until you can't move. It seems you'll need to eat A LOT more."

"But there is no more." retorted Nala.

"There's always more..." Scar answered back with a slowly fading voice that made her shiver in fear. In her state of fear he walked into the darkness and soon reemerge dragging in an elephant. She couldn't even imagine how he could move it himself, but she soon saw half a dozen hyenas helping him.

After it was completely in view Nala was encircled by the hyenas and the only opening was towards the elephant. She had no choice but to eat so once again she tucked in and began eating again. With almost two whole gazelles in her stomach already she barely made a dent into the elephant before she became stuffed. She collapsed to the ground and held her stomach to sooth it. Scar walked over to her and then said...
1112122211.title: Stuffed tight

choices: Nala awakens, but she hasn't fully digested yet.
11121222112.content:
Nala was never greater to hear such words. Neither ws her stomach that was now larger than the rest of her body. She didn't care so much that she was still at Scar's mercy as long as he was showing her that now.

Nala tried to reply to him that she would, but all that escaped her throat was the occassional belch. Still, she managed a weak nod. Scar seemed satisfied with her response and carried her off. Nala was nervous that Scar might drop her now that she was so heavy, but his teeth held onto her firmly, but carefully, just like how he had treated her during her meals. He always made sure she ate till she was full then a good portion more. She doubted he was motived just by his goodwill to help her be fat.

After a few twists in the cave she was back where she started on that ledge. This time around she was much too stuffed to move, let alone get down. She had no other choice now but to rest. She doubted she would be able to escape so easily from Scar, but she could hope she'd be hungry when that time came. She knew she'd need all the room she could get when that time came. Slowly her eyes began to close and the last thing she saw was Scar walking away into the darkness.
11121222112.title: "Would you like some rest my dear?"

11122.content:
Nala considered this. The promise of food was a big lure, but there was something unnerving about Scar, and there would certainly be trouble if her mother found out, "um, not, not right now."

"As you wish," Scar said, "maybe in the morning then?"

"Ur, maybe," Nala said.

"We'll see," Scar said, "well, good-night little lady."

"Night," Nala said, making her way back to her mother's side.

Nala awoke a little late the next morning and found Simba already waiting outside. "You coming to explore," he asked.
11122.title: Maybe later

111222.content:
For a few moments Nala considered between going out exploring with Simba, or a rendezvous with Scar, and the promise of a meal. "Uh, no actually," she replied, I've got other stuff to do."

"Like what," Simba asked suspiciously.

"Oh, nothing you'd be interested," in Nala said, and with that, headed out.

For a few moments Simba considered following Nala, just to see where she was going, but then disregarded it, if she wanted to stick around here all day with her 'other stuff', let her do it.

Nala became a little more nervous as she approach the cave widely recognised as Scar's domain, but her hunger, and the memory of his offer drove her on. Finally arriving, she said in a quavering voice, "Scar?"

"Ah, Nala," Scar said, "and how are you this morning?"

"Oh, good good," Nala said, "hungry though."

"I hope you are," Scar said, "I've prepared for this." when there was no reply, he said, "well come on."

Nervously, Nala made her way over to Scar and asked, "where is it?"

"Right here," Scar replied, shifting back so Nala could see her meal, one mostly eaten gazelle and a full, fresh warthog. "I hope you enjoy it."

"I, I'm sure I will," Nala said, looking at Scar for a moment before beginnning to eat. She finished the remains of the gazelle off quickly, then started on the warthog.

Scar watched as Nala greedily devoured the rest of the gazelle, and then started on the warthog, or which she finished nearly an entire haunch before finally stopping. "Full now are we," he asked.
111222.title: Scar

112.content: Before or after Kiara's birth?
112.title: When?

choices: she got strong cravings for large, fat prey!
Simba admired his queen's rounder, softer form.
1121.content:
It wasn't very long after the defeat of the hyenas and Scar, with Simba having taken his rightful place as King of the Pridelands, that Nala found herself to be expecting. She and Simba were ecstatic at the thought of having a cub together, as well as an heir to Simba's throne.

Since a lion's pregnancy lasts for about twelve months, Nala knew she had plenty of time to prepare for the impending arrival of her little one. Besides, other than gathering parenting advice from the other lionesses, all she really had to do was make Simba's and her part of the den cub-friendly.

Sarabi and the other lionesses kept encouraging Nala to rest and take it easy. When they all went out on hunts for the pride, they told Nala to stay in the den and rest or relax at the waterhole, which often meant being entertained by Timon and Pumbaa. Nala had to admit, she felt pretty tired during the early months, and she was grateful to be able to get the extra sleep she needed than have to use up all her energy hunting.

When the lionesses would return from a successful hunt, Simba and the rest of the males all had their fill, as was to be expected. However, afterwards, the lionesses would then let Nala have her turn at the meat-filled carcasses, making sure the young queen had plenty of good, fresh meat to fill her stomach and ensure the cub growing in her belly would be healthy and strong.

As this pattern continued week after week, it was easy for Nala to get used to such prime treatment, and she admittedly got a bit lazy. Lying down or sleeping all day long, and then being pressed to gorge herself on delicious gazelle, antelope, or zebra, quickly began to show itself on Nala's formerly very lean frame. However, being pregnant, it was hard to tell if the slowly growing roundness to her belly was due to excess calories or the cub beginning to make itself known.

As Nala's pregnancy progressed,...
1121.title: Before Kiara was born...

choices: Simba tells Nala that he likes seeing her round
He doesn't tell Nala and decides to tell her some other time
11213.content:
As Nala's pregnancy progressed... It was hard for Simba not to notice how lazy Nala was getting, but instead of getting mad he found it extremely endearing. I mean she does have a baby growing in her belly.

Three months into the pregnancy Simba noticed that Nala had been getting a bit on the heavier side, and he absolutely loved it! I mean yeah he loved Nala when she was strong and lean but he liked her having the extra poundage on her belly. He wanted to see her get fatter even after their cub was birthed. He wanted to tell Nala this but didn't know how.

Four days later he was laying beside Nala while she at a Gazelle. Simba decided to tell her

"hey Nala can we talk?" Simba asked "yes, what is it dear?" she responded looking up from her meal "I wanted to tell you something" he replied "well? What is it?" Nala prodded


How does he tell her?....
11213.title: Simba admired his queen's rounder, softer f...

1122.content:
After Kiara's birth, life in the kingdom has became boring and repetative as the same routeen was gone over and over every day. Eat, watch Kiara, sleep, eat, watch Kiara, sleep, eat, watch Kiara, sleep. The once lithe Nala grew older and larger, a promenent belly hung down about a foot off her frame while other parts of her body have plumped up quite a bit too. All she realy needed to do now was just sit outside of the cave and watch Kiara, but now Kiara seemed to be able to take care of herself now, so all Nala has been doing was sitting there on her fat belly, forming a roll on her side.

Simba came in dragging...
1122.title: Old, tired, and fat

choices: Simba stops his wife stuffing herself
Nala finishes the hippo and relaxes on her fat belly
11221.content: Simba was groaning under the weight of the fat hippo. But instead of helping her husband Nala was trudging towards the hippo to eat it. Simba was watching his Queen stuff herself with the fattest parts of the hippo.
11221.title: Nala's only thoughts: Eating

112211.content:
"Hey, wow, slow down," Simba said as he watched Nala gorge on the hippo. When she ignored this, he made a decision, and muscled her aside from the carcass, "I said, slow down."

"Simba," Nala mumbled around a hunk of hippo before swallowing it, "what'd you do that for?"

"Because you're going to kill yourself eating like that," Simba replied, "and I don't want you to die."

"I'm fine," Nala said, "now let me through, I'm hungry."

"I know," Simba said, "but you're too hungry."

"Pah," Nala said, "no-one can be too hungry."

"Oh yeah," Simba said, slapping at Nala's side, sending ripples through her fat, "I remember when you could pin anyone else in the pride, including me, but now..."

"I'm happy with how I am," Nala said, "now let me though."

"You may be happy," Simba said, "but I'm not, you're seriously unhealthy, and I'm going to help you do something about it."

"I don't want to do anything about it," Nala said, "and I'm getting seriously angry, so let me past."
112211.title: Protected From Herself

1122111.content:
"No, Nala," Simba said, refusing to budge, "I'm not going to let you kill yourself eating."

Nala muttered something Simba couldn't quite hear, then tried to push past him. He resisted for a few moments, before batting one of her legs out from under her and bringing her down. He followed this up by climbing onto her back, preventing her, with her excess weight from rising, "hey, get off."

"No way," Simba replied, staying put, "I won't get off till you agree to lose some weight."

Simba waited longer than he expected to, before Nala finally cracked, and said, "okay, you win, I'll lose weight."

"Good," Simba said, climbing down off her back and allowing her to rise, "come on."

"Where are we going," Nala asked as she followed Simba, barely managing to block out the alluring scent of the hippo.
1122111.title: Standing Firm

choices: Simba tells Nala to stop for the day.
Simba tells Nala to keep at it.
11221111.content:
"Come on Nala!" Simba said happily, greatful that he had made her finally see things the way he was.
"Oh, shut up." Nala snapped, growling.
"Daddy, whats going on?" Kiara asked.
"Um..Kiara, nows not the best time." Simba said.
"No, why is mom dragging the alpha zebra, that is dead, up the hill?" Kiara asked, trying to make her father finally talk.
"Because, because she is trying to lose weight." Simba said.
Kiara tilted her head then shrugged to herself.
"Ok, daddy." She said happily, running off.
Nala growled at Simba.
"This is stupid." She said.
Simba sighed.
11221111.title: Start exercising

112212.content:
Simba watched Nala fill her stomach on the hippo, then lie down to sleep. He wasn't sure she was healthy, but she seemed to be enjoying it, so he wasn't going to try to spoil it for her, though he would go to talk to Rafiki about it.

In her dreams, Nala was still young and fit, chasing gazelles, zebras, and everything else across the plains. The dreams faded suddenly though, as she felt some push at her shoulder. "Mm," she said, emerging from her dream, "wha'."
112212.title: Belly Bed

1122121.content:
"Nala," Simba said, whjen she awoke a bit more, "could I have a word with you?"

"Sure, go ahead," Nala said, then when Simba didn't reply for several moments, added, "well, go on."

"Well, it's about your weight," Simba finally said, "it's getting too much."

"No it's not," Nala replied, "I like it like this."

"Maybe you do," Simba said, "but it's not healthy, I don't think so, and neither does Rafiki."

"So what," Nala said, "you want me to lose weight now?"

"That's the general idea, yes," Simba said, "starting tomorrow morning."

"So I get one more big meal tonight," Nala asked, wondering what Simba was planning.

"One 'reasonable' meal," Simba said, "then tomorrow you start losing weight, agreed?"
1122121.title: Important Discussion

choices: Simba brought a LOT of food...
Simba brought someone over (and a LOT of food)...
1122122.content:
Nala was extremely bloated from her previous meal. The nap gave time for the hippo meat to digest into fat which spread throughout her body making her more plump, but her huge belly took most of it.

"I brought over some zebras for dinner." Simba explained.

A growl came from Nala's stomach, I'm hungrier than ever She thought to herself. Her new weight and form made it more difficult for her to stand up. When she finally did her belly kept its round shape and was only a few inches above the ground. Her sleepy eyes began to adjust and she could see that...
1122122.title: Simba wakes her for dinner

choices: He was repulsed and worried about Nala's behavior...
He liked what he was seeing...
11221221.content:
Nala's eyes widen when she saw that when Simba said ''some'' zebras he meant a big piled of them. She quickly counted them out in her head; after counting 12 enormous, fat zebra carcasses her greedy stomach growled loudly. "You certainly were on a role tonight.'' Nala said to Simba trying to hide her intentions to pounce and gorge herself.

"I figured you'd be impressed." Simba replied, "Me and Kiara already had our fill, so go ahead and help yourself to what you want. I'm going to go lay down." Simba went to the resting area to relax from the hunt. As soon as he passed by Nala began to salivate and walked towards the pile of food. She approached the nearest zebra, settled herself on her bloated belly, and binged aggressively.

Tearing off meat like she hadn't eaten in days, Nala ate quickly to satisfy her intense hunger. She ripped pieces that were too big for her mouth to hold, chew a few times, and swallow the chunks all at once. In no time she had finished off her first zebra and moved to the next one. By then her belly had made contact with the ground, starting to relieve stress from her plump legs and supported her body. She continued to glut ravenously as she did before moaning in ecstasy, chewing and swallowing over-sized bites of delicious meat. Her mind, mouth, and stomach were focused on eating, her gluttonous desire to eat more took over. There was no pain from the gut-swelling that her eating was causing, and if there were she'd be too busying devouring food to notice; all that there was was pleasure.

After eating two more zebras and working on the fifth, Nala had lost complete contact from the ground with the exception of her massive belly. She was eating so fast that her stomach just took in all the food without giving time to digest it. Her gut was almost perfectly round, and elevated her height and extra foot and a half. And still she continued to eat. Simba had been watching her pig out, and throughout the whole time he thought to himself...
11221221.title: Simba brought a LOT of food...

choices: Snuggle up to her belly and sleep...
112212212.content:
Simba had noticed that Nala lately had started to develop a habit of eating a lot. He observed Nala in the past few meals and determined that she enjoyed limitless eating and having a large belly to show that. Watching her feasting on the zebras, growing that enormous belly of hers, and going on and on without any signs of stopping made Simba realize something: he liked it too. He found Nala's ways of finding happiness in gluttony made him happy, and he didn't want to take that away.

Nala was now about to start eating her seventh zebra when she noticed that her belly, which was now hard as a rock and wider than her arms can stretch, was keeping her out of reach of any zebra. She started panting from working so hard to eat so much; her overly over-filled belly made her sleepy. Simba saw that she was about to doze off and began to think about what to do next.
112212212.title: He liked what he was seeing...

choices: Simba pushes Nala to her side and gives her a belly rub...
Simba and Nala fall asleep and wake up the next morning...
1122122121.content:
Simba was enjoying Nala's eating too much to let it end now. He pranced up to Nala who was now taller than he was. Seeing her enormous gut up-close distracted him for a moment; it was bigger than any elephant stomach he ever saw. Remembering his previous intentions, he looked up faced Nala and said,"Are you finished already?" in a sort-of sarcastic tone.

Nala was still panting from pigging out. "I (pant)... I ate (pant)... so much (pant)... already (pant)..." She continued to pant to regain her normal breathing pattern. "I was just so hungry, and you worked so hard to get it all..."

Simba chuckled at Nala's attempt to create excuses for her eating habits. "It's okay, it's alright," Simba reassured, "You should eat as much as it takes to fill up your appetite."

"Yeah..." Nala replied, "I just didn't know you would get so much..." More excuses, hahaha Simba thought to himself. Nala's eyes slowly began to close.

"But hey, you're still hungry aren't you?" said Simba almost as if he was begging her to still be hungry. Nala took a brief moment to think and nodded making Simba grin.

"But I can't reach the zebras, I'm too-" she paused. Simba walked up to her and said "Hey, it's alright. It's good to get your fill, however you want it." For a few seconds they smiled at each other. Simba then brought the remaining zebras closer to Nala and piled them up to match her level of reach. She looked back at Simba who gave a reassuring nod. She looked back at the zebra in front of her: still as fresh as when it was hunted down. She resumed her feasting at a slow pace and chowed down on the fattest parts. She gobbled up whatever could fit in her mouth with a little extra to stuff in. The taste of the fresh meat brought her out of her sleepiness and back at a fast pace. She moaned in pleasure and swallowed alluringly difficult mouthfuls of food. Simba watched her consume half of the zebra in less than ten minutes. He gazed at her cheeks as they where crammed with overwhelming amounts of meat then watch it travel down her throat and add onto the other contents of her stomach; it truly was an intriguing sight to behold. She finished the zebra, leaving five more remaining to be eaten. Simba helped to remove the remains of the eaten zebra as not to disturb Nala's gluttonous dining. She wanted more, more, more to eat, more to stuff herself, more to make her stomach grow, and Simba's encouragement made her want to have more than ever before. Scarfing down on the 8th zebra released great pleasure from over-indulgence as Simba could see watching in awe. She chewed and moaned and chewed and moaned and swallowed all in satisfaction. Her gut swelled trying to make room for the increasing amount of food and for more that was to come. She went on to complete the 9th and 10th zebra, her stomach ballooned into a furry fleshy ball twice the height of simba on all fours and almost as wide as his length.

Nala completed the zebra and was back at where she was, over stuffed and out of reach of the remaining zebras. Taking note of this, Simba took the liberty of lifting a zebra up to her mouth. He needed to stand on his two back legs and use her stomach as support. Nala didn't know what to think of Simba's encouragement and help, all she knew was that she was hungry and very happy for this schmorgesborg and she continued to eat and eat and eat. Around half way through her the 11th zebra she was eating now, she started feeling a little more pain than before. She still felt a lot of the pleasures from overeating and being extremely stuffed, but her stomach began to come up to its limit. She wanted to eat but started to consider quiting now. Simba looked into Nala's eyes and could see the pain she was feeling. Nala looked back into Simba's eyes; they looked at each other for a moment as if they have created a special bond in Nala's gluttonus actions. She regained the encouragement to keep going. Eating through the pressures on her stomach she munched on bigger mouthfuls. Her jaw and throat became sore but Nala proceeded to fill her unquenchable desire to eat. Finally she finished number eleven and waited for Simba to bring up number twelve.

The strains on Nala’s stomach were climbing onto the verge of being unbearable. She looked down on her stomach and was amazed at how much she has grown in so little time. Her gut pushed her high above the ground and it was until now she realized she had lost mobility many zebras ago. Simba brought up the 12th and final zebra there was to offer. Her desires and encouragement once again motivated her to continue to glut. Her appetite and bites were grew even bigger. Her mouth was full of so much meaty goodness she began to swallow in parts instead of the whole thing. It took more determination and brought a more complex mixture of pleasure and pain than anything before in her life, but she managed to finish the last zebra.
1122122121.title: Convince her to continue eating...

choices: Nala grows fatter the next morning...
They both dream about Simba feeding Nala...
1122122122.content:
Simba walked over to Nala's extremely packed and massive belly, which now made her a foot taller them him. Being near the fleshy mound enticed him to smother up against it. His face and side pushed upon her firm and billowy stomach giving him a warm sensation and Nala a surprising shock. She turned her head and saw Simba resting his head on her belly with a sappy lovey-dovey expression. Nala, having become so large that her high suppresses that of Simba’s making her have to look down on him, felt a little embarrassed and looked away.

Simba noticed Nala’s feelings of embarrassment and attempted to recover her from them by rubbing her bloated stomach with his right paw. “Did you enjoy your dinner?” Asked Simba while stroking her side. Nala’s shyness about her new gigantic belly kept her quiet. “It sure looked like you did.” Simba spoke. Nala stayed silent. “I don’t understand what’s keeping you quiet when just now you seemed like you were going to devour that entire pile of food before bedtime.” He patted her stomach as he chuckled and resumed massaging her rubber-like stomach. The belly rub eased some pressure and helped Nala relax. She looked back at Simba and smiled as they both drifted to sleep.
1122122122.title: Snuggle up to her belly and sleep...

11222.content:
Nala looked up when she heard a noise. looking over at the promontory, she saw Simba struggling with something, which piqued her curiosity. Making her way over, she asked him, "something wrong Simba?"

"Hm," Simba asked, looking up, "oh, hey Nala."

"Hey," Nala replied, "what're you struggling with?"

"This," Simba replied, stepping aside to let Nala see what he'd been struggling with. It looked like a green snake, but with a shiny head, and it tail ended under a rock. "I thought it was a snake at first," the king replied, " now I don't think so."

"Anything I can do to help," Nala asked.

"Yeah," Simba replied, indicating the hose, "d'you think you could pull on this while I try to lift this rock up?"

"Certainly," Nala said, picking up the shiny end of the hose and waddling backwards, "now?"

"Hold on a moment," Simba said, walking over to the rock, "okay, now."

Nala pulled while Simba struggled to lift the rock, things resisted for a few moments, then the rock gave way, freeing the hose and sending the lioness back onto her rump, which sent the head of the hose against the back of her throat.

Sitting stunned for a moment, Nala was unable to stop her reflexes as her throat grabbed at the head, and she swallowed several times before coming to her senses. Realising what she'd done, she tried to dislodge, the hose, but it wouldn't come.

Making his was over, Simba asked, "what's, oh..."

"Yef," Nala said, her speech some what muffled by the hose.

"I'll try pulling this end then," Simba said, "maybe that'll help, okay?"

"Yef," Nala said, trying to get in a position where she could really brace herself.

Simba pulled hard at the hose, trying to drag it out of Nala, but stopped when he heard her whine in pain. Making his way over to her, and said, "doesn't look like that's going to work, so I'll go and get Rafiki okay?"

"Yef, go on," Nala said, rubbing her throat.

"Okay," Simba said, "try not to touch anything okay?"

"Yef, okay," Nala said.
11222.title: A Strange Snake

112222.content: Simba had only been gone a short time, when Nala, bored and sick of the hose down her throat made her way over to where is emerged from, and found herself staring at a complex configuration of buttons and dial. She though for a moment, wondering if one of these things would release her, or whether trying anything now would only get her in more trouble.
112222.title: Dangerous Decision

1122222.content: Nala looked uncomprehendingly at the controls for a moment, before making up her mind and banging at them, trying to find the one to release her. Instead, after a few moments, she felt the hose begin to vibrate, and then get stiffer. She was just wondering at what was going on when she felt something pushing at her insides, and realised exactly what was going on, this thing was like an elephant's trunk, and it was beginning to fill her with who knew what. Beginning to panic, she tried to decide how to deal with her new situation.
1122222.title: Bad Idea

11222221.content: For a few moments Nala considered trying to operate the odd controls again, but didn't, doing such had got her into this situation in the first place, and it was unlikely doing so again would help her, so instead she tried to remove the hose by regurgitating it.
11222221.title: Nothing Coming Up

11222222.content:
In her desperation Nala tried to work the controls again, which proved to be a very bad idea. For a few moments nothing happened, then her stomach lurched as she felt to flow actually increase.

Realising her mistake, Nala waddled back, trying to pull the hose out of her throat. This proved to be less than effective, because she'd never been very good at backing up, and her weight reduced an already slow pace to a crawl. By the time she was finally starting to feel the hose go taut her stomach already held a fair amount of the oddly heavy liquid, impeding her movement just that bit further.

Finally, Nala reached the point where the hose was absolutely taut, but it still didn't come out, and reversing any further was just too painful. Like it or not, she realised, there was no way out of her predicament.
11222222.title: Really Bad Idea

choices: Simba and Rifiki continue to stare as Nala continues to grow
They try and do something to help Nala
112222221.content:
Nala looked out over the long grasses to see Simba almost to Rafiki's tree. It would be a bit more time before they returned, and Nala's already portly belly was swelling ever more with ... whatever was coming through the hose. Nala paced back and forth as well as she could, her heavy belly swaying and almost making her lose her balance. By the time she saw Simba returning with Rafiki, her stomach had gained too much weight for her legs to hold off the ground. (It hardly mattered, it had almost reached the ground anyway.) Soon Nala felt the pressure in her stomach spike as it reached its natural limits, and started to become more spherical as it stretched. She whimpered slightly as she felt less and less weight on her paws, and soon they no longer touched the dirt and grass, they just hung limp over the tight, furry sphere.

By the time Simba and Rafiki Arrived, the lowest of Nala's paws was about eye-level with Simba. Both of them just stared in disbelief, mouths hanging open.
112222221.title: Someone comes

11223.content:
...something shiny, which sparked Nala's curiosity.

Rising, Nala made her way over to where Simba was struggling with the object. "What is it," she asked.

"I haven't a clue," Simba replied, indicating the object, which was about the size of a gazelle torso, but oddly shaped, "it was just bringing it back here so Rafiki could have a look at it."

"You want me to watch it while you go for Rafiki," Nala asked.

"I'd planned for that, yes," Simba said, "could you just try to keep the cubs off it?"

"Will do," Nala replied. Simba nodded his thanks then immediately set out for Rafiki's baobab tree. Alone with the object, the queen prowled around it, examining it. Not only was it an odd, shiny grey, but it was cool as well, which was odd for something that must have been in the sun a while.
11223.title: What Is It
