112231.content: Nala batted at the object a few times, trying to figure out what it was, when she accidentally and unknowingly triggered it, and it grabbed at her paw. The grip was weak so she quickly removed her paw, but while the movement had shocked her, as did its sudden release when her paw was removed, she was curious about it as well, what was it, and what was it doing here?
112231.title: Unexpected Effect

1122311.content:
Nala's caution told her not to examine the strange object, especially after its unexpected action, but her curiosity, got the better of her, and she moved in to examine the object again, sniffing at it this time as well as batting it, though the hard, chemical smell was worrying.

Nala was just exploring the middle of the object when she she managed to trigger the grabber again, only this time it was her held held in it rather than her paw. She was too stunned to move for a moment, but then tried to pull her head out of it, but it wouldn't come no matter what she tried, even managing to lift it completely off the ground before it got too heavy for her.
1122311.title: Trapped

11223111.content:
Nala was getting more desperate by the moment as she continued to struggle, desperately trying to pull the object off her head, not even noticing when she pushed several small buttons. Suddenly her problems got worse, as a thin tube shot up from the object forcing its way between her teeth and down the back of her throat.

Nala held still for a moment, wondering what was going on, then redoubled her efforts to free herself as she felt some sort of liquid emerging from the tube. She also tried to spit the liquid out or regurgitate it, but her own body wasn't co-operating, and so she began to swallow the liquid.
11223111.title: Deeper In Trouble

12.content: When shall our tale begin?
12.title: Kiara

choices: they meet a fiend at the watering hole
121.content:
"Kiara, be careful there," Simba said, as he watched his daughter scarf down her meal, "eat it a bit slower of you might choke."

"Oh, come off it Simba," Nala replied cheerily as their daughter mutter something between mouthfuls, "if there's one thing our daughter knows how to do, it's eat." Kiara's appetite was large, indeed it always had been that way, and combined with the King's overprotective attitude, it led to the royal princess being, as her parents called it, chubby, but more truthfully, fat. Not that this was much of a problem, because while Kiara would probably never be in any shape to hunt, Simba's overprotective attitude insured a lack of basic hunting skills anyway.

Of course, even with hunting off the list, there was always the danger posed by the Outlanders, a band of ruthless, efficient killers who, though too weak for an outright war, wouldn't hesitate to kill an isolated lioness, especially such an important one, though that threat was more seen by Simba that by Kiara herself.

After finishing her meal, Kiara turned to her parents, and asked, "mum, can I go down to the waterhole?"

"Only if Timon and Pumbaa go with you," Simba replied.

"Aw, but those two are always going on about eating bugs," Kiara replied, "eating bugs is disgusting."

"You're only going down to the waterhole if Timon and Pumbaa go with you," Simba repeated.

Kiara tried to outstare her father for a moment, but gave up and hung her head, mumbling, "okay."
121.title: Spoiled Princess

1211.content:
"I'm telling ya Pumbaa, crunchy ones are best," Timon said.

"No, slimy ones are," Pumbaa replied, "They're..."

Kiara listen to the irritating argument that her father's 'friends' played out every time she was out with them, "Shut up."

There was absolute silence for a moment, then Pumbaa asked, "is something wrong princess?"

"Yes, you two," Kiara replied, "you're always going on about bugs, it's disgusting."

"There's nothing disgusting about bugs," Timon replied, "perfectly good food."

They're so icky," Kiara replied, "and they're real small too."

"How would you know," Timon asked, "have you ever tried one?"

"Well, no," Kiara admitted, "but they're so, eew."

"Hey, I tried Zebra once," Timon replied, "and you know what, that put me right off meat."

"But Zebra's nice," Kiara replied.

"Not where I stand," Timon said. He though for a moment, then said, "I'll make you a deal, you try eating bugs now, and if you don't like em, I have to eat meat for three days, okay?"
1211.title: A deal

12111.content:
Kiara though about it for a few moments. Initially the thought was disgusting, but that would work to her advantage, getting Timon back for his bug comments would definitely be worth it, "you're on."

"Good," Timon said, then started to walk off, "coming?"

"Where," Kiara asked.

"The bug buffet of course," Timon said, "after all you just took up the challenge."

It didn't take them long to arrive at the buffet, which turned out to be just long lying on its side. "This is the boofay," Kiara asked, incredulously.

"It's buffet actually," Timon replied, "and yep, it's right under that log." He turned to Pumbaa, and said, "would you do the honours my porcine pal?"

"Sure would," Pumbaa replied, sticking his snout under the log, and heaving.

Kiara screwed up her face at the sight of the bugs, "I have to eat those?"

"Yuh huh," Timon said picking up a piece of dry bark and spending a few moments arranging bugs on it before handing it to Kiara, "and for three days of meat I want to get something out of it."

Kiara screwed up her face, but knew she couldn't back out now. Tentatively, she took a beetle, and closing her eyes in anticipation of it tasting awful, bit into it.
12111.title: Bet Accepted

121111.content:
Kiara had expected the beetle to taste bad, but it didn't. The taste was odd, not bad but not really nice either, just strangely enticing. Curious now, she reached for the second bug, a type of grub this time, and this one was tasty. The third one she tried was so sour she spat it out, but the fourth fifth and sixth were all pretty good.

"How was that," Timon asked when Kiara had finished.

"Not that bad actually," Kiara replied, "I mean, they're not very big, but kinda tasty."

"Like I said, don't knock 'em till you've tried 'em princess," Timon said with a grin.
121111.title: Slimy But Satisfying

choices: "...look for the lost city of bugs."
1211111.content:
Kiara kept on going. She found the bugs quite fascinating. Some were sour, some were sweet, and some of them tasted like mini versions of some of her favorite animals. As she grew more daring she began experimenting with the bugs, shoving several into her mouth ate once. It was a flavor bananza as their juices mixed creating entirely new flavor sensations that made her ravenous for more. She scooped up large quantites and began chowing them down like Timon had never seen and made his mouth begin to water. When Kiara ate the last slimy slug, leaving the bottom of the log bear she laid on her back and patted her bloated belly. She was kind of surprised at a few things. First was, she was surprised at the bulge those tasty bugs put on her stomach and Timon explained that just like with their taste they can be quite fattening if you eat too many. The other thing was that she was hardly filled up from that course. Hearing that made Timon scheme a little plan to find more bugs, not just for her, but himself as well and Pumbaa too since he didn't feel like doing a lot of walking."
"If you really want more we could...
1211111.title: Bug Candy

12111112.content:
"look for more logs," Timon said, that is, if you're hungry."

"You bet," Kiara said, "let's go."

"Uh, Timon," Pumbaa said, as he and the meerkat followed Kiara, "are you sure this is such a good idea?"

"Hey, it got Kiara eating bugs," Timon said, what's so bad about that?"

"She's already overweight," Pumbaa pointed out, "I bet Simba won't be happy if he finds out we've been giving her food as well."

"You worry too much my porcine pal," Timon said, "everything's going to turn out just fine, you watch."

Up ahead, Kiara was busy searching for more logs. She hadn't thought before that bugs could be so tasty, but they were. She grinned as she saw a looming in the grass and went over to investigate.
12111112.title: "...look for more logs.

choices: Kiara finds a place full of logs.
Kiara finds some animals and decides to hunt them instead.
121111121.content:
They found the thing in the grass was a log and they knew what that meant, BUGS! They didn't waste a second and turned it over and to their delight it was covered with more bugs than the previous one. It was a sight Kiara would've once gaged at, but she couldn't help but drool at the sight now. The three scarfed all the bugs in sight, stuffing their faces, filling their stomachs, and belching like pigs (though Pumba was a pig in the first place).
What surprised Kiara the most about this though was how fast she was digesting the bugs. It caused her to fatten up faster than usual a little bit, but it was hardly noticable.

Much sooner than Timon and Pumba would've liked they all got up and searched for the next log. It continued like this for some time, but with each log choc full of bugs Kiara got more than her fair share while Timon and Pumba were getting overstuffed from so many bugs and not enough time to digest. It was their tenth log that they reached when the two of them had had it and left Kiara to eat the log herself.
"You know, there's a thing called too much of a good thing and I think we've reached it."
"I don't know. Bugs are pretty tastey after all."

"That's okay. You don't have to. Now let's get some more eats I'm ready for around round." She licked some bug goop off her paws and let out another belch. By now it was getting quite noticable her weight gain. Her gut hung down about three inches lower now and her rear was noticably chubbier. Her limbs were thicker too.
"We're done... for today... you go... ahead."
"Alright." she said as she ran off."
"Weren't we supposed to keep an eye on her?" asked Pumba.
"What's the worst that could happen? Besides did you see the weight she put on. If anything that's the worst we'll get scolded for."
121111121.title: The Bug Busters

121111122.content:
As Kiara got closer she got more excited, this was one big log, and probably with a lot of bugs under it. Looking around, she saw a rock nearby, and climbing up it jumped onto the log.

The problem was, as Kiara soon discovered, was that it wasn't a log, but a sleeping animal, and it wasn't happy about being woken up.
121111122.title: Getting It Wrong

choices: ... that the right thing to do would be to defend her parents.
1211111221.content:
The log - or rather, the lioness - gave a roar of startlement and span around so fast that Kiara had no chance of holding on. She slid off the lioness' back, plopping onto the grass, on her back, and gazing up at the startled - and angry gaze, of her grandmother.

The anger faded quickly though, and Grandmother Sarafina looked delighted. "Kiara! What are you doing all the way out here by yourself?"

"Uh... I'm not alone," Kiara said, once her surprise had diminished, and pointed across the grass. "Timon and Pumbaa are looking after me."

"They are? ... oh." Sarafina's smile seemed to fade a little bit as Timon and Pumbaa approached, chatting as always. "How are you two boys doing?"

"Faantastic, yourself?" Bumbaa said eagerly.

"Just enjoying the fresh air," Timon said, clasping his hands behind his back and grinning nervously. To Kiara, it was obvious he was hiding something.

"Now now, Timon. What have you been up to?" Grandmother said in her gentle voice.

"Eating bugs!" Kiara blurted, grinning, but Timon slapped his forehead. "What?"

"Bugs?" Grandmother said, standing up. "You fed my grand daughter, a lioness, bugs?"

"It wasn't my idea. She -"

"You dared me!" Kiara said defensively.

"Oh, stop your quibbling. Come on, Kiara. If you're that hungry I'll take you home and give you a proper meal." With that Sarafina picked up Kiara by the scruff of her neck, carrying her back towards Pride Rock in the distance. "Bye boys!" She mumbled around Kiara.

"Bye Sarafina! Bye Kiara!" Pumbaa called.

"Don't forget to tell your dad what good guardians we were!" said Timon.

Sarafina snorted. "Good guardians indeed. Kiara... don't they feed you anything at Pride Rock? What made you resort to eating bugs?"

"They weren't that bad actually," Kiara said. "In fact they're all different flavours! You're not going to tell dad... are you?" She swallowed, gazing down at her distended stomach as she was carried along.

"I'll tell him you should be given a proper meal. You're a growing lioness. Simba didn't know the hunger that we all felt when Scar was in charge, but I'll be cursed before I let a growing girl like you go hungry with all the food we have available."

Kiara frowned. It wasn't dad's fault that she was always hungry, and she didn't want Sarafina to be angry with him over it... but at the same time, if she could convince Sarafina to give her extra tidbits on the side of the rations mother and father allowed her, it might not be a bad thing. She decided...
1211111221.title: Grandmother Sarabi

choices: Don't tell her about the food
12111112211.content:
"Mum and Dad think they're doing the right thing by stopping me from eating too much," Kiara said. "They think I'm too fat."

"Mm? They called you fat? Don't mind them, Kiara. They're just worry warts. You'll grow out of it. After all, I did."

Kiara frowned. She didn't know what Grandmother Sarafina looked like when she was younger, but now that she was a royal and other lionesses did her hunting, Mum said, Grandmother had gotten quite large herself. Kiara didn't mind though. It made for better cuddles.

As the sun started to dip below the horizon they Sarafina put Kiara down in her personal den - the one awarded to Sarafina for being the queen's mother. Kiara was tired from all that running around after bugs with a full stomach and so sat on her haunches as Sarafina moved to the back of the little cave.

"What have you got there, grandmother?" Kiara said. As the wafting smell of fresh meat washed over her, she felt her ears prick up and a smile spread across her muzzle.

"Wilderbeast that the hunting party left for me this morning. Care to shar it with me?" she said as she dragged it out.

Kiara's eyes watered. Bugs were nice, but there was nothing like biting into real meat. Now that the grass was long with the rains it was quite a fatty specimen too, and she nodded her head eagerly as Sarafina dragged it in front of her.

"Eat all you like, dear. I won't criticise you for having an appetite," Grandmother said, smiling gently.

"Gee, thanks Gramma," Kiara said, looking up with a grin at her grandmother's gentle face, before ripping out a huge chunk of the meat and swallowing it as quickly as she could. "You're the best."

"You're welcome around here any time, little one," Sarafina said, a little sadly. "I don't get much company these days, after all."

"Really?" Kiara said, swallowing again. "How come?"

Sarafina waved it off dismissively. "Oh... you know. Nala's busy with the hunts, Sarabi's busy with this and that. I suppose I should just get out more myself but... maybe I'm a bit of a private person."

"I'll come and visit you," Kiara said, getting up and giving her grandmother a hug about the neck. "Especially if you provide food like this! Should I come back tomorrow night?"

"Oh please do!" Sarafina said, and her delight was obvious. "But go on, finish your meal for tonight. Have as much as you like. You're going to be a strong lioness one day."

"Yes, Grandmother," Kiara said. "Thank you very much!"

****************************************************

So Kiara ate as the sun set. Any lion or lioness worth their salt could at until their belly was shaped like a bit round ball, but Kiara was even better than the average lioness. She ate and ate and ate until she couldn't possibly eat fit in any more, and when it came time to leave, she found she could hardly take a breath, her body was so full of food! Instead she told Grandmother Sarafina she was too scared to walk home in the dark, and so the plump old lioness dutifully carried her up to the entrance of the great den. Kiara said her goodbyes, then waddled inside, being careful not to step on anyone in the near darkness.

"Kiara!" her mother said, waking up, and Kiara froze. Could mother see how round she was?

"Yes... mother?"

"Timon and Pumbaa told me you went with Sarafina. What have you two been up to?"
12111112211.title: Sarafina's meal

choices: Find Timon and Pumbaa to find more worms
121111122112.content:
"We did lots of talking," Kiara said, which was true - grandmother was lonely after all, a little like Kiara. "She's really nice, you know. You should talk to her more often."

"I know," Mother said, a little sadly. "But I have a duty now as the head huntress, and it takes up a lot of time. We left you some dinner by the way. It's in your corner."

Kiara felt like she was going to be sick. She waddled over, being especially careful, but then as the smell reached her nostrils it wasn't so bad. Still she was too full for now. She would wait a few hours, and eat it at night, after she had digested some of Sarafina's meal.

"Thanks, Mum. Good night."

"Good night, little one," Nala said.

Kiara lay down to go to sleep, but lying on her bloated belly was too hard. Instead she rolled onto her back, rubbing her belly idly as she thought, 'Well... perhaps I can fit a little more in now.'

******************************************************

The next day started with the dawn, and Mother had already left with the lionesses to hunt. Father was out too, no doubt doing his kingly duty - whatever that was - and so Kiara was left alone. Other lionesses were around but they didn't speak to her much, just in case they said something to upset the royal daughter, she suspected. Sometimes she thought she caught them laughing at her because she was fat, but she couldn't prove it.

Thankfully, her stomach was much smaller today, having digested two dinners and a day-full of worm eating over the night. Of course that meant she was hungry, and she wondered what she would do.
121111122112.title: Don't tell her about the food

choices: Invite grandmother Sarafina to help her finish it
Ask to save it for lunch.
1211111221122.content:
Timon and Pumbaa were good company sometimes, but Kiara found that she had really enjoyed Grandma Sarafina's company yesterday, AND the delicious meal she had shared. Instead of heading out into the grass like she usually did, Kiara headed out to Sarafina's den.

The old lioness was still asleep, lying on her side, ear twitching, when Kiara bounded over and placed her hands on Sarafina's ample stomach.

"Good morning, Grandmother!" she shouted happily.

"Hmm? Oh... good morning, little one!" Sarafina raised her head, a pleased smile stretching across her old lioness face. "You came to visit me!"

"Of course... errr... I was hoping that maybe wee coulld... share breakfast?" Kiara suggested, none-too subtlely in her own ears.

"Of course." Sarafina got up and walked to the back of her little cave. "Now, let's see what the hunting party has left me..."

Kiara's eyes nearly fell out of her head when Sarafina dragged out what looked like the leg of a hippo, still quivering with fat. "I alwaysh ashk for the fatty piethes... they tashte sho much better than lean," she said around her mouthful. Plopping it down right before Kiara's nose, she continued with, "Remember, eat as much as you like, dear. There's far more here than I could eat."

"Thank you, Grandma," Kiara said, and tucked in. Just like last time she ate until her stomach was bursting, and sat back, feeling full and satisfied, her stomach bulging.
"Mmm... that was good."

"Oh... you're not finished already, are you?" Sarafina said, shaking her head. "You're just as bad as Nala was as a cub."

"Really?" Kiara said, not really knowing what grandma meant.

"She never finsihed her meals either. Oh well... I suppose I'll have to throw it out for the vultures..."

Kiara looked at the huge leg. It was bigger than her! She couldn't possibly eat it all, but maybe...
1211111221122.title: Visit Grandma Sarafina for breakfast

choices: Sarafine get more food to Kira
Wait to lunch to eat more
12111112211221.content:
Kiara thought for a moment. Her stomach was already full but it could well not hurt to try and eat the rest

<<Grandma could not you help me eat the rest?>>
<<I may well eat something, I'm not hungry and do not need as much food>>

Sara Fine had started to eat. Kiara so when she svelgte the largest pieces of meat.
Kiara Tokke a large piece of meat and swallowed it. She felt it slide down her throat.
She still and eat and eat, she felt it was difficult and swallowing. Kiara looked up at the grandmother who had stopped to eat, and her stomach had expanded.

<<Eat the rest Kiara I am satisfied>>
<<But the grandmother, my stomach is so full ..>>
<<Kiara there is not much left, eat the rest now>>

Kiara continued to eat, she could almost not to swallow, but there was not much left
.
She ate the last bit and felt it slipped down in her many works. Her stomach was hard and totally Stuffed. Kiara thought it was heavy and breathing. She looked at her stomach who bullging out, she had never seen her stomach soooo big. It was huge, so huge that the stomach nearly dragged the ground and she had to lay on his back for enough space.

<<Now you have been a good girl and ate nearly everything Kiara, and your stomach looks great>> Sarah said fine and smiled.
<<I'm sooo full>> Kiara moaned as she scratched his stomach. There was a considerable feeling.
the end
12111112211221.title: Invite grandmother Sarafina to help her finish it

choices: Kiara only gains a little weight
Kiara gains a noticeable amount of weight
121111122112211.content:
Sarafina went out looking for something the already stuffed princess could eat. Meanwhile Kiara took a nap, allowing her belly to digest some of the huge meal she just had.

Kiara awoke to a noise. "Grandma? Is it you?"
"Yes Kiara", Sarafina said, "look what I found for you!"
Sarafina was dragging a zebra into the cave. Kiara was overjoyed: if anything she loved the taste of zebra meat.
"Wow grandma! You're the best! I don't know if I'm ready to eat, though, I've already had way too much today..."
"Don't be silly, Kiara, come on and eat! You're a growing little princess and you need to eat!"
"Are you sure? Don't you think I'm getting a little..." Kiara blushed slightly looking at her big belly "..plump?"
"Not at all Kiara! I think you're in good shape for a little princess like you!"

Kiara started scoffing down big chunks of delicious zebra meat. She soon felt as stuffed as before but she wanted to keep going on, the meat was fresh and juicy. Sarafina watched as Kiara ate. She noticed Kiara's belly looking surprisingly big, but decided it was normal for young lionesses to have a big appetite.

Finally Kiara lay on the cave floor. She had eaten almost half of the zebra, and couldn't possibly fit in another bite. "You must be very tired after such a big meal. Go on and take a nap if you wish to, I'll take you home later in the afternoon", said Sarafina. Despite the overly stuffed feeling in her belly Kiara was feeling very drowsy and quickly fell asleep, looking like a young lioness ready to give birth.
121111122112211.title: Sarafine gets more food for Kiara

1211111221122112.content:
Kiara woke up late in the afternoon. As she rose to her feet, she noticed something was different: she felt heavier than before. Her belly had shrunk, but the food she had digested had turned into fat. Her belly was soft and sagged down a bit more than before. Her sides were wider, and her rear end, too. Overall she had gained a layer of fat.
"Uh oh, what are my parents going to say? They told me not to eat too much and now I've gained even more weight!"
"Hi Kiara, enjoy your nap?"
"Yes, thanks. Oh grandma, thanks again for the meal, it was great! ....as you can see."
"Now now, Kiara, I don't see any difference in you. Come on, let's get you back home before it gets dark."

Kiara and Sarafina walked slowly to pride rock, where Kiara was greeted by Nala.
"Hi honey, good to have you back home! How was your day?"
"Well, I had a real good time with grandma. Can I see her again tomorrow?"
"Of course you can! If it's fine with her. You must be hungry, I saved you some big chunks of a gazelle we ate earlier. You can have all you like, we're not hungry anymore."
"Wow, thanks mom!" Kiara wasn't really sure if she was hungry after all she had eaten that day, but she decided to be nice to her mother and eat up. She quickly finished the remains of the gazelle and fell asleep with a full belly.


Next morning...
1211111221122112.title: Plumped up princess

choices: Kiara stays with her grandma for awhile
Kiara goes back home to eat dinner
12111112211221122.content:
Kiara woke up the next day to find that she had again gained weight. Most of it had gone to her backside that was now very soft and cushion-like. She ate only a little breakfast because she knew that grandma Sarafina would have something ready for her.
"Mom, I'm going to grandma's. I'll be back for dinner."
"Ok Kiara, have fun!"

Kiara started a slow lope towards Sarafina's cave, but started feeling tired and out of breath very quickly. "Ugh...I could use some exercise..." she thought and continued with a slow pace.
Sarafina was indeed waiting for Kiara with a big surprise: a whole hippo!
"Wow grandma, how did you get your paws on that? Mmm, I can't wait to taste it!"
"Well, why wait, then? Go on, eat as much as you want to. You need the food more than I do".
Kiara dug in, ripping off huge chunks of fatty meat and swallowing them as if she was in a hurry. Sarafina was a bit surprised by how much the little princess could eat, but felt good that she could make Kiara happy.
Finally Kiara let out a small burp and lay on her back. "Grandma, that was sooo good! Thank you!"
"Well it you liked it, why is there still so much left?" Sarafina said teasingly.
"I'm only a cub, I can't eat as much as adults..."
"Go on, you can't be full yet! I can feed you if you want to."
"Would you really do that for me? Well, if doesn't cause you any trouble..."
Sarafina started feeding Kiara small chunks of meat, not wanting Kiara to feel stuffed too soon. She only stopped as Kiara fell asleep with belly that looked bigger than Kiara herself.
12111112211221122.title: Kiara visits Sarafina

121111122112211221.content:
"Enjoy your meal, Kiara?"
"Mm...oh, grandma! I must have fallen asleep."
"You took a little nap. Listen, would you like to stay with me for a while? It gets lonely here and we seem to get along well. And you must be very full, maybe you'd like to rest more before going back."
"Well, yeah! That would be great! But someone should tell my mom where I am."
"Don't worry, I'll go tell them. You just wait here. Should you get hungry, there's more than half of the hippo left."
"Ok grandma."

Sarafina left and Kiara was left alone in the cave. Her belly was still full, but Kiara thought she could fit in a bite or two. With a little difficulty she rose up and started nibbling on what was left of the hippo. Before she noticed she had packed in a whole leg and her belly was literally touching the ground.
"Oh! I've got to slow down a bit or I'll get really fat! But the hippo is just so delicious...I've got to have some more..."
Slowly Kiara ate her way through the carcass. Her belly started feeling painfully full, but it didn't stop her.

Sarafina returned a few hours later to find only a third of the hippo remaining and Kiara asleep with a ridiculously big belly. "Well, she needs to eat to become a strong lioness. Nobody wants to see the princess wasting away."
121111122112211221.title: Kiara stays with her grandma for awhile

choices: Kiara decides to lose some weight and get fit
Kiara continues stuffing herself every day
1211111221122112212.content:
Kiara passed a whole week with her grandma. They chatted and had fun, but mostly Kiara ate. Most of the time she stuffed herself with anything Sarafina brought her. This took its toll on Kiara's physique.

Her belly grew a lot, almost touching the ground as Kiara stood up. Standing up was getting more and more difficult each day since she didn't get any exercise and her muscles didn't get accustomed to her new weight. Her sides spread out, making her almost round in shape. Her butt was now very comfortable to sit on, and it jiggled with every move she made. Even her legs were getting rolls. As a positive side, her fur was shinier than ever.

"Grandma, I've stayed with you for a week now, and I think it's time for me to get back home. Could you take me there?"
"Of course Kiara, if that's what you want. Remember, you can come here any time you like, and I promise to have something for you to eat."

Though Sarafina didn't live far from pride rock, the trip took fairly long. Kiara only managed a slow waddle, and had to take breaks every now and then.
"Ok Kiara, we're back. See you again soon!"
"Thanks grandma...phew...for...everything!"

Kiara was feeling quite worried about what the others would say about her plumped up figure. Nala greeted her happily and hugged her, not making a single comment about Kiara's weight. Kiara was just in time for lunch, and she had a big portion of zebra.
1211111221122112212.title: A week of stuffing

choices: Kiara recovers quickly and starts exercising
It takes up to 2 weeks for Kiara's leg to get better and she gains a lot
12111112211221122122.content:
Kiara continued her lazy lifestyle, sleeping for the most part of her day, only waking up to eat. She got bigger and bigger, and was soon finding it difficult even to get up.

"Kiara, would you like to have a little walk with me today?"
"I don't know, mom...when are we having lunch?"
"I promise you we'll be back in time for lunch."
"Well, okay then."
Kiara slowly got up to her feet and slowly started walking. She couldn't keep up with Nala and had to ask for breaks very often. During one break Nala decided to have a word with Kiara.
"You know, Kiara, I think you've gained some weight lately".
"Umm...uhh...I...don't really know...", Kiara lied, "but maybe I might have gained a pound or two."
"Or maybe you're just tired, but you don't seem to walk as fast as before".
"Ok...I'll start exercising more tomorrow."

They climbed on a hill, and saw that the other side was too steep to go down.
"Oh, we'll have to go back and go round the hill", Nala said.
"Ok. I'll just take a peek of what's down there...." with that Kiara tripped on a branch and started rolling down the hill.
"Kiara! Oh dear, I hope she doesn't get hurt..." Nala ran to Kiara and found her holding her left front leg with tears in her eyes.
"Mum, I think I've twisted my leg...I can't walk with it."
"Oh...I'll carry you home, let's have a look at it there."

Luckily they were close to pride rock, since Nala barely could carry the heavy princess back. Rafiki came and told them not to worry, it wasn't anything serious, but that Kiara needed to rest her leg for about a week to make sure it got better and avoid any further injury.
12111112211221122122.title: Hungry hungry princess

choices: Kiara continues to gain weight at an increasing rate
121111122112211221222.content:
Kiara's leg didn't recover as quickly as thought, and it took two weeks until Rafiki gave her the permission to walk again. Kiara was unsure since she had spent her time doing nothing but eating. The other lionesses felt sorry for her and brought her food so she had something to eat all the time she was awake. Supported by Nala and Simba Kiara was lifted up.

Kiara's belly touched the ground even when she was standing up. Her sides had spread out even more than before, making her all round. Her tail was thick and too heavy for her to lift. Her legs and neck had rolls all over and she couldn't move her legs as far as before. Her butt was very big and jiggly, and weighed her down. She started to walk, but only managed about 10 metres before panting with exhaustion. She sat down, her big rump lifting her from the ground.
"Phew...I'm...in...quite a...bad shape..." she said, panting.
"It's only normal, Kiara, since you haven't been able to walk in two weeks. You'll get in shape quickly as you take on your daily routines", said Nala.
"Kiara must be careful", said Rafiki," for her leg is still very weak. She must avoid stressing it too much. I recommend her to take it easy for a while and slowly putting more weight on the leg."
"So I can't really start exercising yet?"
"No, not yet. And you must be sure that your leg gets all the nutrients it needs to heal, so you must eat well."
"Well...I've been eating quite well lately, thank you...." muttered Kiara, putting her paws on her belly that spread out between her legs.

Nala talked to Simba outside the cave.
"Simba, did you notice how our princess has gained quite a lot of weight lately? Should we be worried?"
"Now now Nala, it's only normal for a cub to gain some weight now and then. Besides, she's the princess, she doesn't have to be in shape for hunting or anything, really. Her job will be to make decisions about Prideland, the physical work will be left for others to take care of."
"Well, if you say so. But I'll keep an eye on her, it's not healthy to get too fat."
"As you wish Nala, but don't be too hard on her, she's having a hard time with her leg".
121111122112211221222.title: Big Kiara

choices: Kiara gets mad at Nala and starts putting on as much weight as she can
1211111221122112212221.content:
Even though Kiara's leg was now strong enough to walk, she didn't really change her daily routines. If anything, her appetite grew, and as a result Kiara grew.

It now took so much effort to get up on her own that she usually didn't bother getting up or asked someone to help her. Standing up her belly spread out under her, touching the ground and weighing Kiara down. She couldn't really lift her tail anymore, just swing it a bit from side to side. Overall she looked like a real butterball. When she moved, which she rarely did, she only managed about 5 metres before her legs started to hurt and she got out of breath. Kiara didn't seem worried about her declined mobility, and after a while Nala decided to have a talk with her.

"Kiara, would you like to get up?"
"Oh, mum...I'm not sure...I just ate..."
"Kiara, you eat all the time so that's not an excuse. Come on, let's get you up a bit."
"Ok then...can you help me?"
"Sure honey."

Kiara pushed with all her might, and Nala lifted her from behind. Simba came to help, and together they got Kiara standing up. Tha fattened cub was quite a sight, her fat jiggling. "Phew....that was hard...."Kiara panted, her legs quivering from the effort. Nala gave Simba a concerned look, but Simba didn't seem to notice. He left to continue his kingly duties and Nala was left alone with Kiara.
"Listen Kiara, I think you should consider losing some weight. You can't even stand up on your own, let alone run. It's not healthy."
"Mum! I'm the princess and I don't have to run!"
"I can't make any decisions for you, but I can help you lose weight if you want to."
1211111221122112212221.title: Hard time for Kiara

choices: Kiara is strong enough to only eat a little
12111112211221122122211.content:
Kiara agreed to start a diet. For breakfast she had less than anyone else, and that left her very hungry. Nala and two other lionesses got Kiara up and she started waddling around a bit. She was grumpy for feeling hungry and tired all the time, and her legs were aching. Plus, after three days of trying to diet, she didn't notice any change in her weight. She had instead developed a new technique for getting up: she supported herself between the wall and a big rock and swung her body for momentum, and then quickly rose up. She didn't succeed every time, but at least she could get up on her own.

"Mum, I'm hungry and tired and I haven't lost any weight yet."
"Kiara, it's only been three days! Diets usually last months, maybe years. Even though you won't be noticing any changes soon, you've got to keep on with your diet if you were to lose weight."

Months? Years?! Kiara wasn't going to take this another day. She asked to go to grandma Sarafina's cave for some time, and so Sarafina came to get her. It took almost the whole day for them to get there, since Kiara could only waddle very slowly and had to take long breaks.
"Grandma, mum made me go on this stupid diet and I haven't had enough to eat for three days!"
"Oh, that sounds bad! I don't think you have to continue with your diet if you don't feel like it. A young lioness is capable of making her own decisions, you know."
"That's what I think, too! No more dieting for me! Grandma, you wouldn't happen to have anything to eat, would you?"
"Sure I do!"
12111112211221122122211.title: Kiara's diet

choices: Kiara can't get up at all!
121111122112211221222111.content:
Sarafina dragged an entire hippo from behind the corner.
"Wow grandma, you're the best!"
"Anything for you, little princess. Go on, have as much as you want to!"

Kiara was extremely hungry, and so she ended up eating half of the hippo. This left her laying on the ground, patting her overstuffed belly.
"Enjoy your meal, Kiara?"
"Yes! Thank you so much, grandma! Do you mind if I take a little nap?"
"Not at all. Listen, I'm going out with friends tonight for a walk, so it's best for you to stay here. If you're feeling hungry, you can eat the rest of the hippo. I'll be back before it's dark."

Sarafina left and Kiara took a nap. She woke up later, to find her belly still full, but she wanted to eat more of the fatty hippo. She couldn't get up, so she dragged herself a couple of metres and started eating. She ate and ate until she felt such a sharp pain in her belly that she couldn't go on. Her belly was bigger than it had ever been, it protruded in every direction, the skin stretched tight. Kiara fell asleep and woke up in the morning.
121111122112211221222111.title: A serious falling out

1211111221122112212221111.content:
"Wakey wakey Kiara, it's time for breakfast!"
"Morning grandma! What's for breakfast?"
"A whole gazelle" Sarafina said, smiling.
"Wow! Let me just get up..."

Kiara tried with all her might, but she just couldn't get up. Sarafina tried to help her, but it was clear that Kiara had gotten too fat to move.
"It's okay Kiara, wait here and I'll get the others. Together we'll carry you back home."
Kiara was puzzled. She couldn't believe she had gotten too fat to move! But looking at her belly and her fat legs she understood that moving was an impossible task if she didn't lose weight. But how could she lose weight if she couldn't move?
1211111221122112212221111.title: Mobility problems

1211111221122112212221112.content:
Kiara awoke to her grandmother's voice telling her to wake up. She groaned and opened her eyes.

"What's going on, grandma?" she asked with a big yawn.

"Good morning, dear!" Sarafina replied. "My breakfast just arrived, and I was hoping that you could finish last night's leftovers and then join me."

Kiara had fallen asleep right up against the hippo, so she looked over what remained of it. There was maybe a fourth of the animal left, which was still quite a hefty portion, but even after her massive binge last night, Kiara was hungry again. She settled in to eat, and Sarafina watched her, smiling.

It was delicious as it had been the previous night, but she hadn't really digested that meal, so a quarter of a hippo was a lot for her. Nonetheless, she managed to finish it all, groaning slightly from how full she was.

"Thanks, grandma," she said. "That was really good."

"I'm glad you enjoyed it," Sarafina replied. "Now, are you ready for breakfast?" She dragged a zebra to where Kiara could reach it, tearing a leg off for herself. "Eat up." Kiara groaned.
1211111221122112212221112.title: Breakfast

choices: Nala comes to pick Kiara up
12111112211221122122211121.content:
Despite how full she was, the zebra did smell pretty good, and Kiara didn't want to seem rude after her grandmother had been so nice to her. So she started to nibble at her "breakfast," trying to ignore the protests from her straining stomach. After a few minutes, though, her nibbles turned into bites, which gradually developed into great gulps. Oh, she was full, maybe fuller than she'd ever been, but she still wanted more. She ate until there was nothing left of the zebra but bones.

"Oh, my, you finished that quickly! Would you like something else?" Sarafina said, apparently oblivious to how massively overstuffed her granddaughter was. Before Kiara, whose reflexes were slowed by fullness, could protest, Sarafina brought out a second zebra, which smelled just as good as the first. Kiara couldn't help herself. She had to have more.

Sometime later, she woke up. She didn't remember falling asleep, but there was most of a wildebeest carcass in front of her, so she must have passed out at some point. She tried to get up, but found that she couldn't move--which was hardly surprising, given the state she'd been in when she got here and the ridiculous amounts of food she'd consumed since then.

"Grandma?" she called.

"Good morning, Kiara!" Sarafina replied from somewhere further back in the den. "You can go ahead and finish off that wildebeest."
12111112211221122122211121.title: Good Little Glutton

121111122112211221222111211.content:
Kiara wasn't actually very hungry, still stuffed from her last meal (had she really spent the night here?), but she did as her grandmother instructed. She wasn't surprised when Sarafina brought her more food as soon as she finished the wildebeest. It was a huge cape buffalo, and Kiara started on it without a second thought. The past couple days had proved that she could eat more than she thought she could without really hurting herself, so why shouldn't she eat as much as she could?

The young lioness was so preoccupied with stuffing herself silly that she barely noticed the physical effect that stuffing was having. Her ballooning stomach pushed the rest of her further and further off the ground until she was nearly her grandmother's height. It had almost no jiggle to it; she was far too full for that, and none of the food she'd eaten since coming back to Sarafina's den had had enough time to turn to fat.

Kiara thought she finished the buffalo, but it was hard to be sure: As soon as she scooped up what she thought was the last bite, there was more meat there, as though it had appeared magically. Her mind screamed at her to keep eating, so she did. As for her stomach, it must have given up protesting the way it was being treated, because Kiara couldn't feel any pain from it any more.

This continued on for...well, Kiara wasn't too sure. She'd figured out that whenever she got too full, she fell asleep, but she didn't know how long she was out for each time. What she did know was that food was always readily available, and for a while, that was enough for her. She forgot all about the diet she was supposed to have been on, much preferring to gorge herself.

Eventually, though, she became dissatisfied. Oh, not with the food, of course. It was still as good and pleasant as ever, and she was still eating herself into a coma on a regular basis. But she never even really got to talk to her grandmother any more, and she missed her parents and Simba.

"Grandma?" she said between mouthfuls--she didn't care quite enough to stop eating.

Sarafina rushed over to her. "Yes, dear? Is there anything I can get you?"

"No, I'm fine," Kiara replied, continuing to stuff herself. "I was just wondering if you'd heard from my mom or anything. She must be worried about me."

The old lioness stiffened at that. "Your mother and I just had a talk about you," she said carefully. "And she said it would be all right if you stayed with me for a while longer. I get so lonely out here by myself, and your mother agreed that it would be good for you to keep me company."

"I dunno, grandma. I really feel like I should be going home..." Kiara said guiltily before tearing off another chunk of meat.

"Are you sure? I'm more than happy to keep feeding you, and I'm not sure that the same can be said for your mother."
121111122112211221222111211.title: Timeless

12111112211221122122212.content:
Nala was darn right that she couldn't make decisions for Kiara! The cub couldn't believe how much of a fuss her mother was making over her weight. She'd never have to hunt for herself, so what did it matter if she was heavier than the other young lions? Kiara had always eaten for the sheer pleasure of it, but now she vowed to gain weight on purpose, just to annoy Nala.

The problem would be getting food. There was no way her tyrannical mother was going to let her eat enough to really gain; her only recourse was to make her way back to Sarafina's den. Unfortunately, she'd been having a really hard time moving lately. Oh, she could make it to her grandmother's eventually, but it would take quite a long time.

Still, anything, even physical exertion, was better than letting Nala control her life, so inch by inch, Kiara started making her arduous way over to her grandomther's den.
12111112211221122122212.title: Spark of Rebellion

121111122112211221222121.content:
By some stroke of luck, Kiara managed to haul herself to Sarafina's den without running into Nala (or, indeed, any other lions). As soon as she was inside, she flopped onto her side, panting. She was more exhausted than she'd ever been in her life.

"Grandma?" she managed to call out weakly. It felt like a year before Sarafina actually came out to where Kiara could see her.

"Kiara?" the old lioness said. "Goodness, darling, you look terrible! Did you walk here all by yourself?"

"Y-yeah," Kiara panted. Sarafina looked her granddaughter over. The cub had certainly gained weight since the last time she'd been here. No wonder she looked so tired!

"Well, I was just about to have dinner. Would you like to join me?"
121111122112211221222121.title: Made It

1211111221122112212221211.content:
Kiara felt like she was gonna die if she had to exert herself any more. On the other hand, if she was going to gain enough weight to really make her mother angry, she had to eat, especially since she'd burned so much energy coming here.

"I'd love to," she gasped.

She rolled shakily to her feet, but Sarafina stopped her, saying, "Go ahead and lie down. You've had more than enough excercise for one day, I think, so I'll bring dinner to you. Don't go anywhere," she joked.

Kiara laid back down, immensely grateful that she didn't have to move. And her mood only improved when her grandmother dragged an eland out to her.

"Eat as much as you want, dear. I would never be able to finish this by myself."

Kiara's exhaustion seemed to melt away as she gulped down chunks of the eland, barely bothering to chew in her haste to eat. Oh, she still didn't relish the thought of getting up, of course, but she didn't have any trouble eating. As she devoured the huge antelope, her stomach expanded, and eventually she had to shift onto her front to stop her legs from falling asleep. Laying on her belly reinforced just how huge it really was. Kiara imagined every bit of it turned to jiggling fat, and she wished her mother could see her now. Despite the cub's best efforts, Nala managed to enforce some modicum of portion control at home, but the eland Sarafina had given her must have weighed three quarters of a ton.

That was far more than Kiara could eat at once, but she did her best, eating more than half of it before she was forced to stop. Even then, she continued nibbling at the remaining meat, partly to test her limits and partly because it was just so good.

Sarafina was more than happy to have Kiara stay with her again, and the princess even managed to convince her not to tell Nala this time, explaining that Nala was trying to force Kiara to diet. But Nala tracked them down eventually, after...
1211111221122112212221211.title: Power Through

choices: I was so worried about you!
What the hell happened to you?
12111112211221122122212111.content:
Kiara spent a happy week with her grandmother, stuffing herself until she couldn't eat another bite--and that line was getting farther away all the time. She didn't know where Sarafina was getting so much food, but since it meant that she could eat as much as she wanted, she didn't much care.

Sarafina was nice enough to always bring food to Kiara, rather than making Kiara come to the food, so Kiara stayed in the same place the whole week. As a result, she didn't fully know how well her "gain weight on purpose" plan was succeeding. Her stomach, which had been big when she'd arrived, was truly a sight to behold now, constantly growing from the huge feasts Kiara forced into it. It lifted her legs outward until she could only touch the ground with her toes if she strained them downward, and at the rate she was going, it wouldn't be long before they lost ground contact altogether. Her back fat was beginning to encroach on them from the top, and the limbs themselves were fast becoming toneless and flabby, just repositories for all the fat she was gaining instead of a viable means of locomotion.

After a week of this blissful existence, Kiara was shocked to see Nala stride into the den.

"Mother!" Nala called angrily. "Do you have any idea where K--" at that moment, she noticed her daughter. "Kiara!" she hissed. "I've been looking everywhere for you!"
12111112211221122122212111.title: Another Week of Stuffing

choices: I had to be in good shape to hunt
121111122112211221222121112.content:
"What happened to you? My god, you've gotten fat!" Kiara looked down in shame--or at least, as far down as she could look with three fat chins impeding her.

"What's all the ruckus out here?" Sarafina said, coming out from deeper in the den. "Nala! It's wonderful to see you, dear."

"Save it," Nala growled. "What have you been doing to my daughter?"

"She's just been helping me finish my dinners," the older lioness replied calmly. "They always leave me so much food, you know."

"And she didn't bother to tell you she was on a diet, I suppose. Why didn't you tell me that you had her here?"

"Oh, she told me," Sarafina said, her voice rising. "Which is precisely why I didn't tell you where she was. It's unfair of you to restrict the poor girl's diet like you do. She's a growing girl, dear."

"She grew right out of being able to walk!" Nala exclaimed. "Mother, you know this can't be healthy for her!"

"I don't remember it having any adverse effects on another young lioness I could name..." Nala blushed at Sarafina's words. Kiara's eyes widened.

"Wow, mom, did you used to be fat too?"

"She certainly did," Sarafina said when Nala didn't answer. "She wasn't quite as good an eater as you are, though, and she lost all the weight when she reached mating age."

"Really? Why?"

Nala looked at her daughter, who was looking back up at her expectantly. She sighed. "I lost the weight because..."
121111122112211221222121112.title: Discoveries

1211111221122112212221211122.content:
"When I was growing up, Kiara," Nala said quietly, in sharp contrast to her hot anger of a few seconds ago, "The pridelands were going through some really bad times. We barely had enough food as it was; I had to be in good enough shape to hunt just to make sure that no one else starved to death."

"But that's not a problem now, mom!" Kiara said. "We have plenty of food."

"I know we do, sweetie, but if something were to happen again, we'd need everyone to pitch in, and you can't do that if you're too fat to move." Kiara looked down again, feeling ashamed of herself for the first time.

"Dear, you know I love you," Sarafina interjected, "but I think you're being too paranoid. Scar's reign was an unhappy accident, but that was the first time anything like that had ever happened, as far back as anyone knows. I asked Rafiki about it, and if anything of that magnitude had ever gone wrong before, you know he would have known about it."
1211111221122112212221211122.title: Memories

choices: Nala and Kiara talk some more
12111112211221122122212111221.content:
Nala let out a long, slow sigh. "You're right, mother," she said. "I'm not being fair to Kiara; I shouldn't punish her because of what happened to me when I was her age."

"Does this mean you're not mad at me any more?" Kiara asked.

"Well, I'm still upset with you for running away without telling anyone where you were going, young lady. You had your father and I worried sick! But if you're asking whether I'm going to try and make you diet any more, the answer is no."

"Yay! Thank you, mom!"

"You're welcome, sweetie." Nala turned back to Sarafina. "Mother, if anything like this happens again, please don't keep it a secret from me."

"Oh, I don't think that'll be a problem," the old lioness replied with a smile.

After saying their goodbyes, Nala (with some difficulty) picked up her fat daughter and carried her home. When they get back...
12111112211221122122212111221.title: Nala Gives In

121111122112211221222121112211.content:
Nala was relieved when she finally set Kiara down in their shared den. She was used to bringing much heavier animals back from hunts, but there was a big difference between dragging a carcass and carrying her daughter.

"I suppose you want something to eat?" Nala said unhappily. Despite what she'd told Sarafina, she still had serious doubts about whether this was a good thing for Kiara. But she was a lioness of her word, and she really did want her daughter to be happy.

"If that's okay," Kiara replied timorously.

"Of course it's okay," Nala said, as much to herself as to her daughter. "I'll be right back." True to her word, Nala soon returned with a wildebeest, which she set down in front of Kiara.

"Thanks, mom!" the young lioness said.

The meat tasted better when she knew that she didn't have to fight with her mother any more, and she ate happily. This wasn't as much food as grandma Sarafina would have given her, but she figured her mother was still sort of adjusting, so it was better not to press her too hard. She finished the wildebeest fairly quickly, and then she was surprised to see her mother bringing in a cape buffalo.

"Is that for me, too?" she asked, scarcely daring to hope.

"If you want. Your grandmother told me how much you can eat, and I don't want you to think I'm starving you."

Kiara dug in without a moment's hesitation. This was more like it. She could feel her stomach expand as she scarfed down the meat, causing her feet to fully lose contact with the ground. But she didn't care about that. With any luck, she'd never have to walk under her own power again.

As Nala watched her daughter devour the big animal, she started to become concerned. Sarafina had said how much Kiara could pack away, but Nala hadn't really believed her. After all, Nala had been quite a big cub herself, but she had never managed to eat nearly this amount. Kiara was gorging herself to the point where she was nearly spherical, and showed no signs of slowing down. This really couldn't have been healthy.

Much to Nala's surprise, Kiara managed to consume the whole buffalo. Nala could hear her daughter's stomach complaining as it struggled to digest the massive amount of food Kiara had stuffed into it, but the cub was obviously no stranger to big meals, and in fact didn't seem to mind what looked to Nala like extremely painful distension.
121111122112211221222121112211.title: Kiara eats

choices: Nala decides that this can't keep happening
1211111221122112212221211122111.content:
Kiara groaned from fullness, feeling the weight of everything she'd eaten in weighing her down and imagining all of it transformed into fat. Her stomach hurt a bit from distention (it hadn't exactly been empty when Nala brought her home). It wasn't nearly enough.

"Can I have...some more food...mom?" she panted. Nala's eyes widened, and her jaw dropped.

"Don't you think you've had enough, Kiara?" she said doubtfully. "I mean..." she gestured to her daughter's stomach with one forepaw.

"I thought...you told grandma...Sarafina...that you'd...let me eat...whatever...I want." Kiara was so full that talking was difficult. She needed, she rationalized, more food to settle her stomach.

"I will," Nala replied. "I just don't want you to hurt yourself. You can take a rest, you know."

"Please," the cub keened. "I need...more food."

"Well, if you're sure," her mother said, still sounding unsure herself. "But if you get too full, you can stop whenever you want." Deciding that smaller animals were probably a safer bet as they provided distinct stopping points, Nala brought her daughter a pair of oryxes, which the cub dug into enthusiastically despite protests from her already straining stomach. That huge organ continued to swell as Kiara ate, and Nala watched with fascinated horror. Soon enough, both of the oryxes had disappeared into Kiara's gut.

"M-more!" she managed to choke out. There was nothing Nala could do but comply, egged on by her fascination at her daughter's eating habits. Kiara made it through two more oryxes and most of another wildebeest before falling asleep right there.
1211111221122112212221211122111.title: Kiara Wants More

choices: Have Rafiki make her a potion to keep her healthy
12111112211221122122212111221111.content:
Kiara slept for about 10 minutes before a loud noise woke her (don't ask what it was), and even though she had eaten so much, she called to her mother for more food. Nala couldn't believe what Kiara had said and much more didn't want to believe it. But, she did what her daughter asked and brought her some more food. Kiara made it through 2 zebras and a oxen before Nala finally snapped. She couldn't let Kiara keep doing this.
"Kiara, that's it, you can't keep doing this! You're feet have to be 3 feet off the ground!" Nala shouted. Kiara stared at her, then smiled, and said (with some difficulty), "I've been waiting do that." Nala's face went from angry to confused. "Waiting for what?"
"For you to tell me to stop. I was seeing how much you would let me eat before you would tell me to stop." Nala stared at her daughter (specifically her face), then at her enormous gut, then back at her face to find she had fallen asleep. She shook her head. She new this wasn't healthy, and that if she let Kiara keep eating like this she would most likely die. So she decided to...
12111112211221122122212111221111.title: Nala continues to spoil Kiara

choices: Nala agrees, and continues feeding Kiara
African Water Bullshit. Nala refuses outright.
121111122112211221222121112211111.content:
Nala walked out into the area that was effectively Simba's "throne room", the area where he went to make all his kingly prideland-ruling decisions. Along with him was Zazu who won't be getting a speaking line, two unimportant lion advisories who won't be getting speaking lines, and Timon and Pumba because they're the most marketable characters and always have to be around in Lion King related stuff, even if they aren't important and won't get a speaking line. Anyway, plot.

Nala approached her husband and spoke. "Simba? There's something I'd like to talk with you about." she glanced at the little cabinet of unimportant characters I mentioned, before waving a paw at them. "in relative privacy?" Simba looked over to the group, then back at Nala. "Alright." he said, before leading her out of their field of hearing. "What did you want to talk about?"

"It's Kiara." Nala said, "I don't think she's healthy and sh-" when she was cut off mid sentence by Simba. "Oh, Nala," he said, "didn't you just have a discussion with Sarafina about letting her eat what she wants?"

"Well, yes, but ...wait, you weren't there for that and I didn't tell you, how did y-?" she was cut off by Simba again. "I'm the king, I know things. Anyway, what were you gonna say?" Nala blinked, before continuing. "Well...yes, I did say she could eat what she wants, but Simba, it's getting ridiculous. She kept asking for more and more and now she's swollen like a tick, I'm afraid if she keeps eating, she'll explode or something."

Simba blinked, before chuckling, and shaking his head, which served to make Nala even angrier. "Oh, Nala, come on now. There's no way it's as bad as you're making it out to b-" Now it was Nala's turn to cut Simba off. "Oh yeah? Well, listen to this, it's getting to her head. Just earlier, I was feeding her, she went through more than five different animals Simba, finished them completely on her own. And she kept asking for more! When I finally called her out, she said she was doing it on purpose, to see how long it'd take me to snap! That's not good behavior."

Simba seemed to consider this new information, before saying "Well, it sounds to me like she was putting you through a test." Nala looked incredulously at Simba. "Well? Yes, of course she was. And?"

"And," Simba said, with a smile. "That's a wise decision, something a ruler would do." Nala was about to say something, but Simba went on. "When a new law or allowance is decreed, for example, Kiara can eat as much as she wants, it's sensible to see how far the people are going to go to follow it. See who's loyal, who's a good, valuable member of the pride, see?"

Nala blinked. "I...suppose, so," she admitted. "And," Simba said, "you don't want to fail a test like that, right?" Nala blinked again. "Simba, I won't be a doormat for my own something-thousand pound daughter."

"Oh, Nala, " said Simba again. "Don't think of it as submitting, think of it as asserting your dominance, proving her wrong about you, she expects you to give up. Go ahead and show her what's up!"
121111122112211221222121112211111.title: Ask Simba for Advice

choices: To everyone's (read: Nala's) surprise, she finishes the whole thing, on her own
She's gonna explode. Gives up about a quarter way through.
1211111221122112212221211122111111.content:
Nala was headed back in, Simba's points having convinced her Kiara's continued supply of food was the right thing to do. She passed by the area where Kiara was, and snuck around behind her. She glanced at Kiara as she did, noting the gigantic rotund mass that was her belly, and her thick, flabby useless back limbs almost swallowed up by her huge blubbery rump. Nala sighed silently, before continuing on into the area where the pride kept the food they'd hunted. She looked around for something...suitable, for Kiara. She knew it'd have to be big, if not to satisfy the gluttonous cub so that Nala would have an excuse for being gone so long.

Her eyes fell on a particular prize. She wondered of it would be ok to take it...but figured eh, who's gonna get mad at her? She took the massive animal, and slowly brought it out to Kiara, dropping it in front of her. "There you go, darling," Nala said with a smile. "Eat up!"

Kiara's jaw dropped into the first of her five chins, as she stared in disbelief at the full grown elephant in front of her. "I-is this...is this all for me?" she asked.

"Why, of course it is." Nala said. "I wanted to apologize for my little outburst, so I got you something a bit more filling than I was before. Eat all you want, unless... You're not hungry?" Nala said, in an almost challenging tone.

"No, of course I am! Thanks mom, this is great!" Kiara said delightedly, before digging into the pachedyrm, devouring fatty meat-chunk after fatty meat-chunk, her belly swelling more and more.

Of course, she had been full a minute ago, stuffed in fact. But that was before Nala brought out the elephant. She'd never eaten one and had it all to herself before. The prospect excited her. So, even though she was already stuffed to the point she felt she may burst, she forced herself to gorge more, and more, and more, polishing off the elephant at an alarming speed.

But, as she went on, she became worried. Had she finally bit off more than she could chew? Had it been a freaking stupid idea to try and eat an elephant, right after all that meat she shoved down her gullet not too long ago? Probably. We'll see, won't we?
1211111221122112212221211122111111.title: Nala agrees, and continues feeding Kiara

choices: "Alright, fine. More is on the way."
"I'm calling Simba. He has to see this for himself"
12111112211221122122212111221111111.content:
Nala stared in astonishment at her enormous daughter. Kiara's belly was absurdly gigantic, full and taut like a drum, due to all she recently consumed. As she laid on top of it, it lifted her twelve feet off of the ground. It was thirteen feet wide. She'd just about doubled in size.

Atop the monstrous belly was the rest of Kiara's body, every inch of her covered in rolls upon rolls of soft, heavy fat. Her limbs were barely recognizable blobs, dozens of rings of flab, the only reason her little paws hadn't been swallowed by her own fat limbs was because they themselves had been swollen with fat too, not so little anymore, they were slightly larger than the size of elephant feet. Her back paws seemed notedly even bigger than her forepaws, maybe that was because her gargantuan, rotund buttocks, each one much larger than Nala herself, were so heavy their sheer weight pushed down on her back legs, and forced hundreds of pounds of adipose back into her thighs, calves, and fat, fat, fat back paws. Her paw pads were bloated and had lost any callouses exercising had given them, since she hadn't done it in so long, and they were soft to the touch. Her toes had swollen with so much fat they were constantly spread, and she could barely wiggle them if she tried.

Her tail would've resembled her limbs, a thick, barely recognizable blob of fat rings, had it not been mostly hidden by being pressed between her massive rump and her dozens of rolls of back fat. Between the fat all over her butt, love handles, and chest, as well as her monumental gut, her limbs had been forced into a spread eagle position. Her belly pushed her fat chest resting on it up into her eleventh chin. Speaking of which, her face was just barely poking out of the fat-cavern caused by her multitude of chins, dozen neck rolls, and huge globular cheeks. It seemed like even Kiara's muzzle had some extra padding, and at the center of it all was her panting, salivating maw. The mouth that picked completely clean the immense elephant skeleton in front of Nala, and forced every last speck of meat down Kiara's gullet, into her eager belly.

After a good minute or two of staring slackjawed at the spectacle before her, Nala snapped out of it when she saw Kiara fruitlessly wobbling her limbs, wiggling her bloated toes, sending the entirety of her body (excluding her still taut stomach) jiggling furiously.

"Mmm...more..." Kiara said. Nala gaped.

"What??" She said.

"More food....you said as much as I wanted . I gotta eat...eat more food...." Kiarasaid hungrily, wiggling her toes and jiggling her body as she spoke, it seemed feeding her only fed her gluttony too.

After a moment more of staring at Kiara, helplessly trapped in her own fat, moving as much as she could only to wiggle her engorged toes, in a desperate attempt to somehow get more food, so she could be fed and eat and continue growing , Nala said...

Kiara looked like a blob with paws resting on top of a hot air balloon. Almost hidden by the fat was her face, her line of sight was filled with her flab and it took a notable amount of effort for her to open her mouth, due to the sheer amount of fat weighing down and pressing against every part of her body. Almost more effort than the lazy mountain of flesh of a cub was willing to exert, if it weren't for how hungry she was, and just how much she absolutely needed to eat. Once Kiara opened her mouth, the first thing to escape it was a long, low belch, which became the exact word Nala was hoping not to hear.

"BBBRRRRRRRRUUUURRAAAAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRRRRPPP......mmm...mmo ooorree..." Kiara then began taking deep breaths, panting and wheezing, her entire body wobbling and jiggling, sweat pooling in between her rolls of blubber, and drops running down her monumental sphere of a belly. But her feet were so uselessly swollen she could just barely flex them. She tried to rub herself with her forepaws for some relief, but the only thing she could touch were the squishy rolls of flab surrounding her paws that were once her wrists, and even this was too much exercise for the hedonistic young lioness, as it caused her to pant even harder, sticking her tongue out, tasting the salty sweat pouring down her rolls made her hungry.

Nala sighed and rolled her eyes. "You look like you're getting tired. One more meal, then it's high time you took a nap ." With that, Nala turned and walked out, leaving Kiara to relax a little and wait for her to come back, which she did. Wiiith...

So just... enjoy life. I can see to it that you don't have to tend Kiara, I imagine you're exhausted.
Nala sighed, drowsiness overtaking her previous worries. She had been up for almost twenty-four hours straight, although the lioness did not have the means to tell- at least until she saw the first light of dawn up in the sky.
"How- yawn- how long have I been up?" Nala said, dreary-eyed. Her knees began to shake as exhaustion took over. Her stomache growled from not having had a meal since breakfast.
"Almost all day and night. Come on, let's go to bed." Simba said, coaxing her to follow him. Nala's thoughts were completely scrambled, but she couldn't care less. Her mind was taken over with a simple desire to rest and forget everything, all other thoughts a mere buzzing noise in her mind. Simba took her off hunting duty for the next day and assigned a number of lionesses to tend to Kiara (and to not speak a word of it to others).

Time passes and Raffiki's words clearly do not lie. Lush greenery is found everywhere. Even spreading...
1211111221122112212221211122111111111211.title: Plentiful Times of Plentiful Plenty

1211111221122112212221211122111111111211.content:
"How... how does a tree grow on a rock?" Timon said, staring at the newly sprouted Acacia growing atop of Pride Rock.
"Well, look, it's roots go all the way down, see?" Pumba said, pointing out the long, winding green roots coming from the sprout.
"I- but- why does a sprout have roots extending that far down? It's a sprout!"

It had been about a week since Nala's talk with Simba. She had agreed to enjoy life a bit more (after all, she was the queen) and even began, "unintentionally," packing on some pounds- something Simba commented on while in privacy, and something which Nala would have previously been furious at she now enjoyed. Nala continued to go on the hunts, and remained as fit as ever because of it. Meanwhile...

Kiara was (with incredible difficulty) moved out of the cave through a back entrance and placed in a much larger space underneath Pride Rock. Originally intended to act as a room for storing food due to it's low temperature, it was quickly overtaken by Kiara's corpulence. Speaking of her corpulence, Kiara's stomach now had the interesting property of finding a way to digest almost all food she had eaten in the span of only a few hours. Having only just awoken, she was as tall as three adult lions and as wide as a giraffe is tall and then some. Her body, head, and rear were the only things that could truly be distinguished, her limbs and tail having been overtaken by the fat piled upon the areas mentioned previously. Forty-two chins could just barely be counted and her face was only just visible thanks to the size of her cheeks, which were now large enough to fit an adult zebra inside whole. Her rear was the size of a rhinoceros; her ample chest forcing her head up. Her back fat threatened to devour her whole if it weren't for the fat piled upon her stomach, rear, and neck. Roll after roll flowed down her sides and pooled onto the floor as though liquid- but that was just speaking about her when she hadn't eaten; when her stomach was empty. Only moments after she awoke, her stomach let out a growl loud enough to make her lioness servant's ears ring. For the next five and a half hours, they kept her feeding until she had eaten so much she was now as tall as a giraffe when sitting on her stomach. Her entire body had managed to pack on weight already, and the sound of an unnaturally rapid digestion process could be heard when one pressed their head against her ballooned stomach. Speaking of, her stomach jut out from below her, in comparison, tiny form, sticking out sideways the height of now two giraffes. Her breathing was heavy, oddly enough not from difficulty doing so but from pleasure and satisfaction in her action. She called out,
"More... f-food... please..." and the servants went back to the prey pile, giving each other worried glances.. They returned, working together carrying an elephant: not even snack to her at this point. The elephant was devoured in moments, her form expanding farther and father. She just needed to eat more, it just felt good, felt right, she needed more, more, more, more, more, more, more!

Two more hours of eating ensued, only three spent digesting. Something supernatural was at work here, but Kiara couldn't care less, if she would ever even realize it. When she awoke, she found herself now as tall as two rhinoceroses, as wide as two giraffes are tall, and with seventy-six chins obscured by their sheer number- and also with a completely empty stomach. She had eaten ten elephants, far, far more than that even, and yet here she was, her stomach growling even louder than before, now with more room to hold yet more food. The servant's came, and she feasted yet again.

Back atop Pride Rock, Nala was eating an especially overweight Gazelle beside the essential throne room, Simba smiling at her. He was amazed the hunters were able to catch so much food. Apparently the prey was moving much more slowly, slowed down by their own increased mass. Simba almost wished he was a hunter so he could enjoy hunting his own kill, but he brushed the thought away, remembering his duties as king. Simba was repeatedly distracted by his queen's rump and fattier form shaking as she ate. She now sported a second chin, and was definable as nothing else but fat- but that is not to say she wasn't still fit. Her muscles had not atrophied in the slightest and her limbs were mostly spared from her weight gain thanks to her continued exercise. She was muscular, strong enough that Simba consistently lost wrestling matches with her. This was not helped by the fact that her stomach and tail-end were now much larger. She was bigger in every way: muscle, fat- even confidence, and she showed no signs of stopping there. All of this, Simba loved. He loved that his mate was happy, he loved she was bigger, and he, to his own surprise, loved that she was stronger too.

Things progressed like this for the next...
1211111221122112212221211122111111111211.title: How does a tree grow on a rock?

1211111221122112212221211122111111111211.content:
Another week had passed and surprisingly, food is still plentiful. Greenery is still spreading all over the Pridelands and animals are still getting quite fat. Even already large animals, like hippos and elephants. Some lions, like Nala, have also added more to their frames. Nala now spotted a third chin and had a belly that touched the ground. But even with the extra fatness, she still had quite muscular legs due to her still being active. This, however, could not be said about Kiara.

With each passing day and each passing meal, Kiara had only gotten fatter beyond belief. She had grown so incredibly fat, they had to move her out of the large space underneath Pride Rock before she outgrew it and got stuck. Kiara's stomach was now a symbol of her unending gluttony. Whether it was eating antelopes, rhinos, hippos, and even elephants, the prey all got churned up in the princess's stomach and later became part of her massive girth. With every meal, her stomach got bigger and with and with each meal digested, her stomach had room for more. Kiara now had a countless amount of chins. It was somewhere over a hundred. Her face could barely be seen due to the abnormally large cheeks that could each hold an elephant, her rear was bigger than any mammal description. Her high had to be at least 4 giraffes tall and she was several times as wide as that.

Her emptied stomach let out a large growl that nearly woke up everyone on Pride Rock. The servants already knew what that meant. I was time to fetch food for the hungry princess. If it wasn't for all the prey getting fatter, Kiara may have eaten a good chunk of the population. Her eating habits never changed. If anything, they had multiplied. It was the same as before. Eat a massive meal until full, sleep a bit, digest within hours, and eat again. And again, and again, and again.

Times still goes on.

The cub was more if a blob of lion blubber that lion. The bigger and fatter she got, the more her appetite. Not even shrinking in the slightest in the past month. One elephant wasn't even a snack for her now. Once more, her digestive system was seem to be getting faster. Digesting a whole meal in a few hours turned into just one hour. Because of this, there was rarely a time when she wasn't eating.

Kiara became the largest animal in the Prideland and was....

"Why, dear Nala, your concern seems unwarranted! For a young lioness, especially one of royal blood, to have a great appetite is only natura-" Nala cut him off.

"Rafiki, she is obese, and impossibly so. Did you even hear me? Heck, I might've been underestimating her size by a lot when I called her big as an elephant, she's definitely bigger! And it's all fat! And she just, won't stop eating and if we keep feeding her I don't know what'll-" now it was Nala's turn to be cut off.

"Nala, Nala, Nala... Perhaps I should see the damages myself, then I may properly judge." Rafiki offered. Nala looked at him for a moment, before nodding solemnly. "Yes, I suppose..." with that consent, Rafiki smiled, "Well, follow me, then! Let us check up on your plump princess!"
