Nala and Rafiki slowly walked up to the mass that was Kiara, Nala's mouth for one hanging slack-jawed at the sight. Rafiki took his time as he looked over the impossibly fat cub of a Princess.

While Nala had gone to see and bring Rafiki back to Pride Rock, during that time all the meat that Kiara had eaten had completely digested, resulting in fattening Kiara even bigger. Now she was the fat blob size of an actual hot air balloon. There wasn't an inch of Kiara that didn't have rolls of wobbly and jiggly flab, cause the rolls fully covered and encompassed Kiara's entire body. On her fat masses of rolls that were Kiara's legs, only her fat blobs of her paws were stuck out. Her fleshy mound of pancaked rolls that was her tail lay between her hills of bulgy domes of rump cheeks and her many packed rolls of back fat that also bulged upwards in flabby rolls in a dome like shape. In front, her mass of neck rolls spread out to the far ends of her bulgy fat shoulders, up her back fat like stairs going up half way up her back fat and down to spill out on the ground in front of her front chest fat, her chin rolls flowed down from a cavern like tunnel and down her neck rolls to spill out on the ground and ooze out widely like liquid lava a good ten feet out in front of the fat blob of Princess. Also bulging out from the fat cavern tunnel poured out fat and wide bloated face cheeks and flowed down in arcs on both sides in front of her to spill out on the ground like thick and long party balloons of fat that was as far out as her chin rolls. Deep inside the fat cavern tunnel of neck rolls, one could barely make out the fat roll layered and covered mass of the Princess's fat blob head since her fat head was also ten feet deep back in her own mass of fat neck rolls, cause after two feet it got dark inside.

Nala gasped after she got done looking what had become of her daughter. "Rafiki, this isn't right. We got to do something to get her back to her regular weight." she talked as quietly as she could as to not wake the sleeping blob Princess.

Rafiki hummed in thought before nodding solemly. "I can do something, it'll be tricky. But I can do it. If you want your daughter to be back to her regular self, then you'd
have to take what is burdening her."

Nala look shocked with wide eyes. "Take her weight? But that's huge."

Rafiki shrugged. "If you want what's best for you daughter. That would mean also taking her hunger."

Nala thought for a moment, before sighing. "You know I'd do anything for her, anything for Kiara to be her regular cub weight again. But can you do something for me? I'd like to always be healthy no matter how fat and big I get. And for my body to have no limits. Also for my stomach to quickly digest the food I eat only to fat. I also want to be young again, a young adult one year of age lioness." Nala giggled and looked over the blob of her daughter. "I always wondered what it would be like to be fat and eat and get fatter. So I might as well go all out."

Rafiki grinned and nodded. "Those things I can make so. All I have to do it cast the spell. The taking weight would be instant and you'll be that size, as well as have her hunger. Then you'll have all those things you said."
1211111221122112212221211122111111111212.title: Incredible fat blob of a Princess

1211111221122112212221211122112.content:
Nala heard the sound of Simba's pawsteps outside the den, and she bounded out to him.

"I found Kiara!" she said when she got close. "She was staying with my mother, not that Mother felt the need to tell me that."

"That's great!" Simba replied, obviously relieved. "Uh...how is she?"

Nala lashed her tail back and fourth, not knowing how to broach the subject. "I've realized that I can't stop her gaining weight if she wants to," she said resignedly. "So I've decided not to bother." When she finished speaking, she flinched, as if expecting Simba to yell at her.

"Good for you," he said instead, nuzzling her reassuringly. "If she's willing to run away to keep this up, trying to stop her will only make life more difficult for all of us. And remember that you weren't exactly a skinny cub, either," he said with a laugh.

"Hey!" Nala said, mildly offended. "First of all, I wasn't anywhere near your daughter's weight, and second, I lost the weight when I had to."

"More's the pity," Simba rejoined. "I thought you were pretty cute back then. Heck, you could stand to gain a few pounds now," he added, tapping her flat stomach with a forepaw.

"Are you saying you think I should gain weight too?" Nala asked disbelievingly.

"Not if you don't want to, dear," Simba said. "It was just a suggestion, but I know you can be sensitive about your weight."

Simba went inside to say hello to his daughter, and Nala considered what he had said. Should she try to gain some weight?
1211111221122112212221211122112.title: A Proposal

12111112211221122122212111221121.content:
When Nala considered it rationally--ignoring her ingrained fear of not being fit enough to help the pride--she didn't see any harm in gaining a little weight, since Simba wanted her to and all. She wasn't enthused about the prospect of gaining, but she knew that her worries were mostly irrational, and she did want to make her mate happy. And Simba did say he only wanted her to gain a little...

The only real question was whether to tell her daughter about what she was going to do. Kiara hardly needed any more encouragement to get fat, but at the same time, she felt bad about hiding something like that from the cub.
12111112211221122122212111221121.title: Accepted

Nala decided that she couldn't in good conscience tell Kiara that she was going to try to gain a little weight. She still didn't actually approve of how much Kiara had gained, and she didn't want the cub to think that she was totally okay with Kiara being immobile.

That meant that she had to hide her revised eating habits from her daughter, though that wasn't honestly too hard. Kiara barely moved these days, so as long as Nala took her meals out of the cub's direct line of sight, she was safe.

Nala was having more trouble with the gaining itself. She was naturally a very active lioness, and her body rebelled at the thought of getting fat, still feeling a deep-seated need to be thin and tend to her duties as queen. Simba took her off hunting duties, which helped some, but it was a rough start. She knew, though, that she was being ridiculous, and since she was doing this for Simba, she persevered. Her hard work paid off, and she soon gained...

If she couldn't become fat she could become big! Simba at first was confused by her excersice regime but quickly grew to accept it and even joined her at times.

1211111221122112212221211122112122.content:
Much to Nala's surprise, gaining was easy once she got going. She still had to struggle with the urge to go exercise after every big meal, but even though her mind was freaking out, her body seemed fine with her lifestyle change. Two weeks of extra food and as little exercise as she could do without going crazy had softened her stomach and fleshed out her thighs, and she was already beginning to develop a second chin.

As her gain became more noticeable, she became more concerned with keeping it secret from Kiara. The princess wasn't the most observant cub in the world, but Nala still found herself spending less time with her daughter. Still, she couldn't avoid her entirely.
1211111221122112212221211122112122.title: A Bit of a Gain

choices: Nala needs to lose the weight
12111112211221122122212111221121222.content:
Nala was pretty much worried over nothing. Kiara was still happy to chat with her mother, but she wasn't much concerned over the physical properties of anything other than food. Since coming home, she had continued with the lifestyle she'd gotten used to at Grandma Sarafina's. That meant eating nearly constantly, and that meant becoming very fat indeed.

Kiara had been more or less immobile when Nala had brought her back, but now her paws couldn't even touch the ground, resting instead on a thick layer of her own fat that was growing thicker by the day. The paws themselves were buried beneath the fat rolls of legs too fat and weak to have held her up even if they could have made contact with the ground. Her neck was a mass of chins, and her whole fat body jiggled whenever she made the slightest movement--which mostly involved biting and chewing.

In short, Kiara was in heaven. Why would she notice that her mother was gaining a little weight when her own gain was so much more pleasurable to focus on?

Nala realized this after a while, and was in fact a bit shocked by it. How could Kiara be so oblivious? Thinking about Kiara's situation made Nala consider her own. She'd gained a good bit of weight, after all.
12111112211221122122212111221121222.title: Kiara Is Oblivious

choices: Nala's diet fails and she gains more
121111122112211221222121112211212222.content:
Nala knew that she didn't want to end up like her daughter--Kiara might have been okay with being an immobile blob, but Nala certainly wasn't. She decided that she had to lose the weight she'd put on. She felt a little bad about what Simba would think, but ultimately, she decided that her ability to feel good about herself was more important than making herself a little more attractive to her mate.

Therefore, she resolved to eat less and exercise more. She wasn't needed on the hunts, unfortunately, but she was still able to work out on her own.
121111122112211221222121112211212222.title: Need to Lose

choices: Give up and embrace her weight gain
Take drastic measures to lose weight
1211111221122112212221211122112122222.content:
Despite Nala's best efforts, she found losing weight as difficult as she'd found gaining at first. She was as active as ever, but since she had stretched her stomach out while gaining the extra weight she was already carrying, and she found it difficult to resist eating. She tried to convince herself that her increased portions were no big deal, since she was exercising again, but while working out slowed her gain, it didn't stop it entirely, and as she got fatter, she started exercising less and less.

Since she was also eating more and more, her weight loss plan was not working at all. Her stomach hung down farther than ever, pushing her fat thighs into a bow-legged waddle, and her back fat was starting to hang over her legs and tail a little. And none of that was helped by the sheer volume of food that was usually laying around the den. While the pride as a whole didn't know how much weight she'd gained, they certainly knew about Kiara, and so food was constantly left for the immobile princess, and even when Nala went to specifically get a small meal, she ended up eating a lot more than she intended.

After one of these binges, as she swallowed the last of a big eland, Nala felt too heavy to get up--she had a long way to go before she became immobile, but all the meat in her stomach was certainly weighing her down. And what was worse, she still felt hungry!
1211111221122112212221211122112122222.title: Failed Diet

choices: Keep less food in the den
12111112211221122122212111221121222222.content:
This just wouldn't do! With all the food lying around, there was no way Nala was going to be able to control herself enough to lose any weight. She had to change her environment if she didn't want to be fat for the rest of her life.

She started to consider her options, but she was too tired to really have much brain power. Almost without thinking about it, she heaved herself to her feet, waddled over to a zebra carcass that was lying a few feet away, plopped back down, and started to eat. She was so full already, but her body was telling her that it was tired, and that eating was the best way to get a little extra energy. It wasn't really working. Nala's mind was too focused on eating to come up with any clever weight loss plans, and as her already-sizeable stomach expanded outward, her will to get up eroded.

Once she finished the zebra, though, she realized what she'd done. This proved it: she couldn't trust herself to be around food all the time. So she decided on a way to keep herself away from temptation.
12111112211221122122212111221121222222.title: Uh...Drastic Measures

121111122112211221222121112211212222222.content:
Even with Kiara being...the way she was, Nala decided there was no reason to have so much food lying around the den. It didn't go bad--it didn't have time to--but that was just the problem. If she was surrounded by food all the time, Nala would never lose this weight. She asked the lionesses in charge of feeding the royal family to heavily cut down on how much they left, but there was still the matter of all the food that was currently laying around the den.

Nala rounded all of it up into a pile: several impalas, three giraffes, a cape buffalo, and four wildebeest. Sheesh, that was a ridiculous amount of food for any one family to have!

How should Nala get rid of it?
121111122112211221222121112211212222222.title: Decide to Remove the Food

1211111221122112212221211122112122222221.content:
Nala was going to just push the whole big pile out of the den and invite whoever wanted some to take it, but gathering it had been hard work, and she didn't relish the thought of having to push the whole danged pile around any more. Therefore, she decided that the most sensible thing to do would be to eat it all herself. She justified the huge meal with the excuse that after this, she would be able to diet and there wouldn't be any more food in the den.

She started with a giraffe, since they were the heaviest and thus the biggest pain to move again. After the first one, she was feeling a little full, but she pressed on. After the second, she was starting to feel sick, and there were still tons of meat left. Her mammoth stomach was bloated to the point where it had almost no jiggle to it. The last time Nala could remember having a tight stomach was back when she was still thin.
1211111221122112212221211122112122222221.title: Farewell Binge

choices: She started trying to lose weight
1211111221122112212221211122112122222221.content:
Almost without noticing, Nala found herself starting in on the last giraffe. The distension of her stomach was painful, sure, but her mouth didn't seem to realize that. And anyhow, it was either this or push the rest of the meat out of the den, and in her hugely bloated state, Nala didn't relish the thought of that.

She tried not to think of Kiara as she gulped down chunk after chunk of meat. It was a good thing this was her absolute last meal like this, because otherwise she knew she would end up like her immobile daughter. What she was willfully ignoring was how close she was to that mark already. The fat lioness' gut had hung nearly to the floor before she'd started this binge and now, with every new bite she swallowed, it was pressing harder and harder against the ground, forcing her legs to splay wide.

After she'd finished the last of the giraffes, eating started to become paradoxically easier. The pleasure of consumption was swiftly overcoming the pains in her overstuffed stomach, and soon she had devoured the whole enormous pile of meat. Nala was fuller--not to mention bigger--than she'd ever been in her life, but if she had had more food in front of her, she would have kept eating. In the moments before she passed out from her huge meal, a traitorous thought stole into her head: she could see how Kiara enjoyed this.

When Nala woke up...
1211111221122112212221211122112122222221.title: Keep Eating

choices: He brings a lot of food
1211111221122112212221211122112122222221.content:
A few hours later, Nala awoke groggily. She felt uncomfortably bloated, but as she rose to her feet to check what the heck was wrong with her...well, she didn't actually rise. She could feel her paws pressing down on the floor of the den, but her stance felt curiously wide, and she wasn't moving. Then, bit by bit, the memories of the previous night's gorge filtered back into her mind. She was aghast. How could she have possibly thought that that was a good idea? She'd made a very unwise choice, and now she was paying for it. How the heck could she lose weight when she couldn't even stand up?

After nearly half an hour of exhausting attempts to move her hugely fattened form, Simba wandered into the room where Nala was laying. The lioness froze, as if that would somehow prevent her husband from seeing her.

"Oh, hi, darling," Simba said as though he didn't notice that Nala was too fat to move. "I've been wondering where you ran off to." Nala could feel her mouth hanging open in disbelief. How on earth was Simba taking this so casually? Could he really not see how fat Nala was? She knew that he'd wanted her to gain a little weight, but surely she was too fat for him now. She felt that her staggeringly bad decision last night was comment-worthy, but if he wasn't going to bring it up, she certainly wasn't going to.

To her embarassment, her stomach rumbled. She blushed under her fur, but Simba seemed unconcerned.

"Do you want me to go grab you some breakfast?" he asked casually. Nala really, really wanted to say no, but her stomach wouldn't have any of that. Well, as long as she controlled her portions, she'd be back on her feet eventually.

"That would be great, but only a little bit, okay? I'm trying to watch my weight." Simba nodded and disappeared from her view.
1211111221122112212221211122112122222221.title: She was still immobilized

1211111221122112212221211122112122222221.content:
Simba was, of course, not really oblivious to Nala's gain. As a matter of fact, he had been dreaming about seeing her like this, but he knew that she was sensitive about it, so he had to proceed cautiously. The last thing he wanted was for her to catch on to the fact that he was trying to fatten her up, so, while he brought back a large variety of animals to feed her, the only thing he actually brought up to her was a small gazelle.

She thanked him and devoured the thing within minutes. Simba could hear her stomach continuing to rumble; it would take a lot more than a measly gazelle to fill that thing up. Still, he played dumb.

"Are you sure that's all you want?" he said innocently. "I brought this other one in case you were still hungry..." he carried out another gazelle, no bigger than the first. Nala eyed it dubiously, trying to ignore her stomach's dissatisfaction.
1211111221122112212221211122112122222221.title: The Start of Another Big Meal?

choices: Nala realizes what Simba is doing
1211111221122112212221211122112122222221.content:
It still wasn't that much meat, she reassured herself. She needed to eat less to gain weight, but that was no reason to starve herself.

That rationale lasted through a third gazelle and a kudu, and by the time she'd started in on her second wildebeest, she wasn't even bothering to rationalize her gluttony to herself any longer. All she knew was that she was hungry and that delicious food kept appearing in front of her.

Simba, for his part, was in awe. He watched, mesmerized, as his wife devoured carcass after carcass. For a surprisingly long while, the food disappeared into her vast stomach without leaving a trace, but eventually Nala neared her capacity, and her gut started to expand visibly, to Simba's delight. Every pound of food she ate would make her just that little bit fatter, and adding up everything that she had eaten, she would get quite a bit fatter indeed.

When Nala finally stopped eating, Simba marveled at how much she had been able to pack in. Her enormous stomach was taut, and it pushed the rest of her up so she was significantly taller than Simba was. She had also fallen asleep almost immediately after she'd stopped eating, which meant that Simba didn't have to pretend that he didn't notice her gain any longer. He pressed himself up against her flank, listening to her stomach gurgle and murmur as it digested its huge meal. He began to rub it, gently, so as not to wake his wife. The sooner Nala digested this, the sooner she could stuff herself again.
1211111221122112212221211122112122222221.title: Another Big Meal

12111112211221122122212112.content:
The princess, never losing those fires of rebellion inside of her, only ever did three things when she was with her grandmother, ordered in decreasing frequency of occurrence: she ate, she slept, and she talked. She devoured meal after meal, often eating more than what three adult lions could, forcing herself to eat more. Her grandmother, perhaps not all there in her age, simply enabled this behavior. She provided many a meal for the princess, who ate with glee.

On her first week she lost the ability to touch the ground

On her second week she lost the ability to move her tail

On her third week she lost the ability to even feel full

And on her fourth week she was officially taller than her grandmother.

Kiara developed a love for her fat and her size, but the one thing she came to love more than being fat was getting fatter. She wanted nothing more than to eat more and get bigger so she could then eat even more and get even bigger. A beautiful cycle, she came to believe.
12111112211221122122212112.title: Beyond Fat

Kiara began to look at herself secretly concerned about what was happ ening to her figure, discerned with how much fluffier she had becomeÂ  during her escapades with her grand mother had taken their toll upon her body. A layer of thin fat covered the cub’s body slightly it jiggled with every move she made, concerned with her daughter’s ch ange as the princess of pride rock Kiara needed to be an example to others, this didn’t matter to Kiara it was more of a choice sheÂ  had to make. Loving the taste of food and all of its splendor wasÂ  great, but the side effects that came with the constant filling of herself with so much food was definitely something that she had to d eal with for herself and for her pride. Countless days went by for the little cub, countless routines to slim her once flabby body intoÂ  something that would make the once saddened Kiara more proud of hers elf and who she was, very little fat could be found upon her body this was no small feat she had no time to herself as she ran aroun d the pride lands like she was insane, lifted heavy logs for her un cle Timon and Pumbaa so they could get their delicious bugs, and eve n helped old rafiki with his daily chores to become small again.

"my poor girl if only I could show you that I love you no matter what your size is" Sarafina whispered to herself while overseeing everything that was going in the pride lands. slowly she laid down in her den sadded at what her daughter was doing to her grand daughter she only wish to feed her grand daughter and love her expanding sizes, but she knew that Nala wouldn't allow it she would have to do it in secret, she love the plump fluffiness of her grand daughter and just wanted to feed her by force if need be.

Ghana knew that with their many ranks and that their past treachery of helping Scar Kill and overthrow the past king Mufasa, they had no allies to speak of and with the scraps they were getting now it wouldn’t be a stretch to say that they would be halved by the year end. Ghana grinned a wicked smile to Sarafina “we will accept your proposal and cub nap your little one, but I have to ask why do you want us to take her away from her loving family anyways, sure her brother has given us trouble but Kiara has never given us hyenas trouble in the past, so why do you want us to take her?” inquisitive about the situation of why Sarafina wanted to have the young future queen to herself, it just didn’t make much sense to Ghana at the moment. Sarafina started to blush very subtly as the question that the hyena was prying at was embarrassing to admit to anyone, it was a very strange set of circumstances in which Sarafina enjoyed feeding Kiara and making her fatter.



         “Well you see miss, I actually love feeding my granddaughter and seeing her being helpless, the pure domination of her is the main reason why I want you to cub nap her and so we can force her to until she is nothing more than my pet” such determination in Sarafina’s eyes how could Ghana say no to the aging lioness. “Fine we will capture her but I hope you can keep up your end of our little arrangement and get enough food for the five of us and your little pet project” Ghana scoffed at Sarafina believing that the lioness wouldn’t be able to ensure that there would be enough meat for all of them to eat well, thinking that if this woman would double cross them Ghana was prepared to hold the young princess for ransom if it came to that, but that would be for if and only the time came for that. Ghana hoped that luck was on her side as she inched closer to the cub clasping her jaws on the nape of Kiara’s neck to lift the young girl out of the den, delicate as Ghana could be in a situation like this, she begun to leave the den with Kiara confident that she had done it without any type of immediate repercussions. Escaping the pride lands with the cub in her mouth Ghana begun to walk back to her employer’s den “So uhh boss when are we gonna ransom this cub off to it’s parents, like you said we were going to do?” one of the hyena’s asked looking at the snoozing cub not even noticeing that her surroundings has changed. Ghana couldn’t say anything to her underling with the child in her mouth, placing the girl down gently Ghana begun to express herself to her underling. “If this old lion doesn’t give us food like she promised, then we will ransom this princess, until then we follow through with our orders.” Somewhat disgruntle about the kind of orders she was given by Ghana the hyena could only bit her tounge about this issue until the time would come

         Keeping to the shadows for now Sarafina begun to lead her hired help to start to greet their new prisoner, They didn’t want to question the reason why their boss wanted to fatten up this cub so badly but the leader of the other Hyenas didn’t want to question it as long as the lion fed them and they had some place to lay their head at night they were happy to be of service, Ghana knew that without the help that this lioness gave them they would have to become exiled like the lions who lived in the outlands, scrounging around for the littlest taste of meat, all they need to do is be good soldiers and force this cub to become too big to move. “go meet out little prisoner, Ghana” Sarafina chuckled as her new accomplice begun to move towards Kiara chuckling to herself as she knew what was going to happen to the unexpecting cub, Ghana was followed by two other hyenas who were dragging a freshly killed Zebra towards Kiara who was scared about what was going to happen to her. Seeing the hyenas come out of the shadows with a zebra in toe with their leader only raised more questions for Kiara as she thought that she was Kidnapped to be used as like a ransom for the pride lands stock pile of food that was kept in an icy cavern near the mountains of the gorilla King, meekly the cub asked her captors “what do you want with me, Please let me go home I’m not good to you here” Ghana could only chuckle at how terrible the young girl’s bargaining was it was laughably terrible on how she tried to wiggle her way out of her current situation.

         “Hehehe… don’t worry dear princess I promise that your going to be well fed” Ghana with all the venom in her words circled the little cub, Pouncing on Kiara Ghana held the princess down a wide grin upon the hyena’s face while the others encircled the two of them, chuckling the with various kinds of Savannah animals entrapped in their maws. Closer and closer each of them got to Kiara, the cub tried to struggle against her captors with no avail tears forming in her eyes as she didn’t see any way to get always from the situation.

“Go ahead feed our little guest already, I’m getting tired of pinning her down she does know how to struggle alright I guess it's just something royalty knows how to do after all” Ghana just chuckled, moving her paw forcing Kiara's mouth open gleefully nudging her little helpers near the cub. Not much effort was used as the first slab of meat slid down the throat of Kiara, forced to chew the meat or suffocate from it. Slowly Kiara began to chew it, tears running down her face knowing that there was more food to come and there was no way she could escape the situation that she found herself in.

“Struggle all you want but there is nothing you can do” Ghana chuckled, her minions knew what they needed to do shoving more and more meats into the little cub's maw forcing Kiara to swallow. The meat hit her stomach with a thunk, Kiara couldn’t deny that the taste of zebra was the best from the ibex she was used to that her parents forced her to eat to be the athletic lioness she once was before she hid away from her parents and stayed with her overbearing grandmother, who was taking away her choice to be thin Kiara begun to wonder.
12111112211221122122221112.title: her minions force ffmeed kiara

choices: Trick Timon and Pumbaa and sneak away
12112.content:
"I'll never eat bugs!" Kiara said. "They are disgusting!"
"Ok, ok." Timon said. "You're not going to eat bugs."
Then Kiara started chasing a butterflie. But it didn't go long before she got tired of chasing it and sat down in the gras. Oh, so boring it was! If she just had something to do...
12112.title: Refuse

1212.content:
"I'm telling ya Pumbaa, crunchy ones are best," Timon said.

"No, slimy ones are," Pumbaa replied, "They're less filling."

Kiara rolled her eyes as the all-too-familiar argument started yet again. For a moment, she considered shouting at them, then realised the opportunity, if those two were arguing they weren't watching her, so she could escape and do anything she wanted. Taking full advantage of the situation, she glanced back at the squabbling pair, then raced off.

"This is great," Kiara said, a while later as she continued to explore.

It was so much better now without those two interfering friends of her father's, or at least it was until she head a noise close behind her." Kiara whirled to see what had made the noise, but she only saw a flash of something before everything suddenly went dark.

Some time later, Kiara woke up in an unfamiliar place. Muzzily, she raised her head and looked around for a few moments trying to figure out where she was.
1212.title: Cubnapped

12121.content:
Kiara awoke groggily from whatever caused her to black out in the first place, smelling the air surrounding the area around her she found this smell familiar yet different from what she was used to it was someplace that she may have been in before with her two friends Tiifu and Zuri on one of their many adventures across the Pridelands but how did she get to this place now. Staggering the cub began to get up, “ow my head, what happened to me” Kiara though trying to make sense of what happened to her she didn’t know where she was although looking around the area she could see it was one place her mother and father always warned her to be very cautious of, the Outlands. Fearing the reason she got here Kiara begun to quickly look around the area where she was eyes darting around, looking at where she was it seemed to be a big system of tunnels and caves someplace that she had never seen before, all of it was foreign to her “you don’t know where you are do you princess” a voice chimed in, Kiara didn’t know why she didn’t sense the presence of whoever was stalking her at this moment. Kiara didn’t know how to feel about this person who casually lurked up behind her in such a manner, even though Kiara was being taught by one of the best hunters in the Pridelands this other creature was so stealthy that she Kiara couldn’t even recognize what type of creature it was, the person hopped down from the ledge in which she was laying down from, seeing clearly that it was an older lion who was peering at her a massive grin upon her face, vicious with the smirk on her face caused Kiara to shrink in her place not knowing what this lioness would want with her she knew it had to be nothing good that was a given.

“It’s an honor to have the princess of the Pridelands in my humble abode, I am your host of the little soiree I have brought you here as a plaything for my daughter to have fun with” the lioness stated cackling while saying it, this lion was someone Kiara knew quite well it was someone who her father had disdain for as she was one person who had relations with her great-uncle scar years her name being Zira a lioness who was as ruthless as scar once was, always thinking that she was meant to be the queen of the Pridelands and someone who couldn’t be reduced to being exiled to the Outlands. Kiara was just scared at what was going to happen to her there was no way she could defend against the might that was Zira she was as tough as she was Cynical all the young cub could think of what to do was to run, dashing past Zira in a burst of speed to overtake the larger body of Zira, not thinking about how she was going to escape the cave Kiara only Knew that she had to get out of there as soon as possible.

“Oh we are playing this game are we young princess, well I’m up for a chase just be ready to lose” getting ready to chase Kiara Zira said just she darted for the young cub, like someone who was out on the prowl, catching up to Kiara quite easily her long legs and body made the distance between them seem like nothing at all. Quickly Zira was able to catch up with her prize it was mere child’s play to someone of her speed and grace, easily she caught up with Kiara grasping the Princess’ nape with her maw, dragging her away deeper into the caverns that littered the area in which they stood. Deeper they went into the cave system the more Kiara struggled to get away from this woman she didn’t know what the lioness wanted with her but Kiara didn’t want to stick around to find out what that was, shifting her weight to an fro she thought that this would dislodge her from the mouth of Zira a feeble attempt to get away from the menacing Lion was good then no attempt. “Stttahp strwggling” Zira spoke slurred in her words thanks to Kiara’s wriggling, thinking she could get loose from the mighty grasp of Zira was just a dream by this point, her captor just clamped down harder on Kiara’s nape making sure that she couldn’t break free from the hold Zira had on her. Kiara was unceremoniously dropped by Zira as the reached their destination inside the caverns, mouth agape Kiara saw what their destination was…
12121.title: Outlands

choices: Food arrives let the force feeding begin
121212.content:
Kiara didn't know where she was being taken by this lioness why was Zira was so adamant to bringing her deeper into the catacombs of rock and dirt that she wounding let her go from the nape until they had reached their destination where ever that was. Twisting and turning down cave after cave only confused Kiara it all looked like the same kind of area to her the only kind of difference from the bland cave pathways was Kiara seeing a lion here or a hyena there for her to beg for help this seemed to be useless as none even looked at her and the ones that did look only laughed at her, they knew who she was and that she was a present for the birthday of Zira's daughter. It all seemed useless to try to escape from her current situation, "please just let me go, I won't tell daddy I was her" Kiara blubbered, “yomfr nammft leawving” Zira slurred her words still trying to speak with a mouth full of fur in her maw.

Zira was grateful that their stop was coming up fast. The area was a wide open area, a skylight was in the center shining down sun from the outside, cliffs peppered around the area but none seemed to reach to the skylight, it seemed like it was the nicest cave she had seen in the Outlands. Being dropped from the mouth of Zira was a relief for Kiara as she didn’t want to be in the mouth of this vile woman any more than she had to be, scared to move from the spot lions looked at the scared cub like she was a meal for them to devour in one gulp, “Vitani your present is her” Zira yelled trying to get the attention of her daughter as she could not see her among the other Outlanders that were around.

Jumping down from one of the cliffs was a Brownish lioness, she looked to be around the same age as Kiara, her piercing blue eyes looked through Kiara and maybe even through her, “I thought you said you were going to make her big for my party” frowned the lion, Kiara didn’t know what she meant by that but seeing Vitani circling her like a vulture made Kiara very uneasy for whatever she meant by big, Kiara didn’t want to know what she meant she just had to leave. Edging away from Vitani’s circling it was uncomfortable, to say the least, Zira didn’t even bother to look at Kiara anymore it was as the Lioness said Kiara was a present for Vitani’s birthday. “I thought you could make her yours all by your self, you don’t want her to imprint on me would you my dear daughter” Zira coyly pointed out to her daughter, I will bring the meat for your little project in a while but you too get to know each other, oh and my dear princess don’t try to escape this is your home now and my daughter is your mistress, don’t think about running I will only catch you and there will be consequences that you won’t like” Zira put it a blunt as she could for the girl that there wasn’t any escape she was Vitani’s and she was going to be here forever.

Kiara’s mind raced with what was going to happen to her, tears began for form in the corners of her eyes she just wanted to go home and forget that this day had even happened in the first place, “we are going to have so much fun when mom comes back down worry little princess you will love being mine and only mine” her new mistress stated as she nuzzled up against Kiara’s body, feeling every nook and cranny of the slim princess’s body was her main objective, “I can’t wait to fatten you up, you may not like it but I will make you love it” the cub thought a grin plastered upon her face, she was already loving the present her mother had delivered to her. Vitani went back to her spot where she usually laid about, waiting so patiently for her mother to return was the worst thing about her present but it was going to worth the wait she as the fun could really begin then.
121212.title: Zira's Daughter, Vitani

choices: hyenas tease Kiara telling her how much of blob she will become
1212122.content:
Vitani was happy with the birthday present she was given to by her mother, hopping up and down in excitement for what she was planning to do to her newest little toy, Vitani’s mouth curled itself into a menacing grin one that Kiara knew that had ill intent behind it. She was scared being in an area that she didn’t even recognize as a part of the Outlands the den was kind of pretty in a strange way the open skylight and watering hole in center made it look so serene, but this wasn’t a time to daydream about the beauty of the area she needed to get far away from these lions as fast as she can before this demented cub had her way with her.”Don’t worry my dear princess if you’re a good girl and obey your master then you will have a good time living here with us, but if your bad and don’t listen to me, well then we are going to have a problem” Vitani slyly stated circling her pet like the predator she was born to be. Kiara didn’t know what to do with this girl who looked like her like prey to be hunted and not as an equal, the way Vitani looked at Kiara only made her more uncomfortable in the situation she was in, She needed to get away from her no matter the cost but Kiara wondered if she could even get away from Vitani in the first place.

         “Please just let me go I don’t want to cause any trouble I won’t tell my father any of this” Kiara repeated herself hoping to find some glimmer of humanity in this lion cub, it was a long shot but at this moment Kiara needed any kind of edge that she could find. Anger rose to the surface of Vitani’s face when Kiara talked about being let go from her current situation it was something that Vitani wasn’t just going to allow her new play toy to walk away from the situation she found herself in, pouncing upon Kiara in a rough manner that throws the terrified cub to the ground asserting to Kiara that Vitani was in control. Looking up to the sky seeing all the birds flying overhead only made Kiara feel the weight of her situation was direr than she originally thought it to be. “you seem to be understanding that your mine and mine alone no one is going to save you or come for you” Vitani chuckled, not even noticing that her mother had returned from her hunt with a prize that made Vitani look twice at what it was, food for the Outlands was something that wasn’t very abundance sometimes, Vitani though she would have to feed Kiara some grubs before she could really fatten her up. “I thought you could use a gazelle for your pet my dear daughter” don’t waste it now it was hard to track down, but I’m sure it will be worth it” Zira chuckles looking at her daughter pinning Kiara to the ground in triumph could only make a mother proud.

         Vitani didn’t even have to move from her position of pinning the princess to enact her plans for the lithe cub, tearing off meat from the gazelle to feed to her pet, Kiara eyes grew wider seeing the large piece of meet that the demented cub was holding in her teeth inching closer to Kiara mouth. Struggling to get away from the Vitani became an uphill battle seeing that the Outlander had to be tougher than the princess to even survive her mother’s wrath, it was futile to get away from her as the loving lioness the smell of the meat from the gazelle was intoxicating, trying to keep her wits of her situation was hard to do, the meat shoved into her mouth was delicious to say the least not even knowing where her mother would find such a delectable morsel was something that wasn’t her concern. Looking at Vitani ripping off another piece of meat from the plump gazelle to feed to Kiara the princess thought what was going to befall her in the care of Vitani. This Gazelle could easily feed a full-grown lion, why was it being fed to Kiara if food from them was so scarce, these questions swirled in her head as another piece was shoved down her throat without warning causing Kiara to choke, coughing struggling to breathe Kiara, wondered if Vitani was just trying to kill Kiara by making her choke on the gazelle instead of feeding it to her.
1212122.title: Food arrives let the force feeding begin

choices: the hyenas are ordered elsewere, time to run
Vitani comes back with more food
12121222.content:
“what was this outlander trying to do to me, why was her mother saying I was her present,” Kiara thought, still engorged with the zebra meat she had to eat thanks to the feeding she was getting from Vitani it was almost sickening of how much she was forced to eat. Being a little cub also meant that she couldn’t eat that much food as she was too small to be able to in the first place this was something that the Outlander cub didn’t ever see as a problem for she had a grand scheme in her head of what she was going to do with her present. This was kept from Kiara as Vitani didn’t want any of her plans to be ruined by loose lips, the bones of the gazelle were shoved in the corner of the cave system where the Outlanders decided to place the pride land princess into. Looking around for some more meat to shove into the already very full Kiara proved futile as her mother had only given Vitani a little meat not wanting Vitani to break her new toy a little too soon this was the only reasoning the little cub could think of why only one gazelle was brought to the spot where Kiara was placed in the first place.

         “Keep an eye on her I have to go and get more food for my pet I can’t believe that Gazelle didn’t last as long as I thought, its such a pain” Vitani announced her intentions to gather more food from the pit wasn’t just for Kiara to know where her new master was going, no this was for the other creatures whose eyes gleamed around the caver where Kiara was placed ever since she was placed in this cave she had always felt like she wasn’t alone with Vitani. The familiar chuckle echoed from the confines of the base of the Outlanders. Kiara knew that familiar laugh was from hyenas, it was an animal she was always told by her father to avoid due to their Conniving nature that they had shown Simba when he was a cub himself. Closer and closer these animals circled Kiara intimidating the little cub with their immense size. Eyes darting from corner to corner trying to see an opening to get always from these hyenas.

         “you still don’t get it do you, poor girl your no longer free to do as you please your just another toy for Miss Vitani to play with and boy does she have plans for you” one of the hyena’s chuckled out taking a pay to rub against the lithe form that Kiara had gained from always hunting with her mother and Keeping up with the other cubs that lived in the pride lands, she didn’t really know what these hyena’s wanted from her but there isn’t much she could do escape seemed to be off the table, there just wasn’t anywhere she could run it just seemed so very hopeless to say the least.

         “Miss Vitani Has many more things to feed you before you are even close to being ready for her part, I mean she has many plans for you since your not even a cub anymore your just a pig” the leader of the hyenas taunted her more, they all were female and could be shown to be lead by Vitani herself, it made Kiara think that the rabid dogs were telling the truth and that she had no hope for whatever the outlander had planned for her was going to come into fruition even if she did try to escape. The clouds of doubt circled in her head as Kiara though of a way out of this situation sobbing when there wasn’t anything around that even looked like it would be a way for her to escape. Stomach still bloated with delectable meat of a gazelle still sat comfortably in her stomach not moving an inch acting like a rock in her stomach, just weighted down by the pure size of how much she was forced to eat a little while ago made the situation she was in even more hopeless than what was previously thought by anyone.

         “Yeah when miss Vitani get done with feeding you, you wont look like a cub anymore just a blob of flesh” another hyena chimed into the conversation she was having with Kiara putting fear into the cub of what was going to happen to her when Vitani returned from where ever she had gone to get more food for her pet, no way to get away from five fully grown hyenas who seemingly work for the little monster that was Vitani it all just seemed hopeless for the once princess of the Pridelands.

         “Kiara was once the princess of all the land, pampered and loved by all she knew, now she was nothing more than a toy for the princess of the Outlands to play with. Fed with all kinds of meats might be a chore, being fattened against her will Kiara the princess will try to fight but we all know that the outlands princess always does what she does and gets what she wants, what do you think will break first the poor Pridelands princess’ mind or her waist, no one know but its always fun to see” the hyenas sung in the most annoying sing-song voice only got on the little cubs nerves more and more, not knowing what to do as Kiara was very much outnumbered. Was it true about what they were saying was she brought her to be toyed with and fattened, the feeding that she had just had to endure was just a highlight of what was to come was resting heavily on Kiara’s mind she knew that she couldn’t stay here as her mother and father would be worried, Kiara had to get out.
12121222.title: hyenas tease Kiara telling her how much of blob...

12123.content:
Kiara awoke to find herself in an oddly shaped cage. Looking around, she saw that the cage was in a cave. Nearby, two large creatures were talking, though she couldn't make out what they were saying.

"You know we could get into real trouble for this," one man said.

"How," the other man asked, "we've been okayed by both governments and the FDA."

"I don't mean that," the first man said, "I mean, this is some lioness's cub, what if she comes searching, brings the entire pride?"

"Look, it was wandering around lost," the second man said, "lions don't do that unless the cubs have been chased out, ergo, they don't want her anymore."

"And the formula's safe is it," the first man asked, "if she drinks too much..."

"It's a dilute mix," the second man said, "there ought to be no way she'll drink too much."

"Ought to..." the first man began.

"Shut up," the second man said, " now lets get things ready."

Kiara then found herself removed from the cage, and carrier into another part of the cave and put into another, smaller cave. When the princess had recovered a bit more she decided to explore her new quarters. Not that there was much to explore, her enclosure was a wooden, well, 'pit' came to mind, it was only about 10 by 20 lengths in size, and the only fixtures seemed to be a pile of straw in one corner and a bowl filled with some sort of thick, off-white liquid.

Feeling peckish, Kiara tasted the liquid, which turned out to be bland, but manageable. Of course, the princess wasn't to know that the liquid, as well as being quite rich, also a had a special chemical formula to make it more appealing over time, and so, about half an hour later, the lion cub found herself returning to the bowl. This time the liquid tasted much better, the chemical having taken effect, as so she drank until her stomach was achingly tight, before she retreated to the the straw to sleep her meal off.
12123.title: Captivity

121231.content:
Kiara felt odd when she awoke the next day, but she couldn't figure out why. Unbeknownst to the lion cub, the change had resulted from her last meal, and the result was that most of her body had gained a thin layer of fat, almost unnoticeable to eye, but a herald of things to come if she remained in here.

Getting up, Kiara tried to figure out what to do, she wasn't tired, and she wasn't really hungry, so she finally decided to try and figure out a way out of here. Of course, this was quickly exhausted, her craws barely marked the wood of her enclosure, and she soon picked up a splinter, which, while she removed it easily enough disuaded her from any more escape attempts. With nothing else to do, the lion cub finally sat down on her hay and daydreamed.

This wen't on for some time, but then suddenly, she came back to reality.
121231.title: Next day

121232.content:
A week had passed since Kiara had been brought into the enclosure, and it was certainlt having an effect. Kiara of course was bored out of her mind, spending almost all of her time sleeping or daydreaming, only coming back to reality when her stomach forced her to do so. Unfortunately for the female cub, her stomach had become more and more forceful as the week went on, and this combined with her lack of space had had a big effect on her body.

KIara could no longer be called chubby, or reasonably even fat, she was now officially obese. her body was almost ball shaped with her newly gained weight, or egg shaped if you chose to count in her head and neck, the second now wider than the first and beginning to develop rolls. Her legs were affected as well, their layers of padding forming rolls over her joints, and pressing against her belly, forcing her to develop a splayed posture whenever she stood up. Even her tail hadn't escaped, hanging limp down her rump, simply too heavy to lift any more.

"Look at that lazy beast Todd," the human growled, sitting in front of the monitor watching the cub in her now daydreaming phase. The camera had been well placed, seeing the whole enclosure, but apparently remaining unseen itself.

"Well what d'you expect her to do sir," Todd replied behind him, "she's got nothing to do and nowhere to go."

"What're you suggesting," the first human asked, turning away from the monitor.

"One of two things sir," Todd replied, "either we can put her in the outdoor enclosure, or we can get her a playmate."
121232.title: Outgrowing Her Enclosure

122.content:
Kiara smiled as she watched the sun rise, feeling its touch warming her body, and what a body it was.

A few moons had passed since the Outlanders had been integrated into the pride, and after the initial frictions, everything had settled down nicely. Kiara especially had benefitted from the contact, and was now quite a proficient hunter, or would have been but for one particular issue, her weight.

Kiara was fat, not especially so, but it was noticable, both physically and dynamically, she was the slowest lioness out, and often got teased for it. This depressed the princess, but for some reason, no matter how much she exercised, she barely seemed to make headway against the weight, and it was quck to come back if she let it.
122.title: New Life

1221.content:
As time passed, so did Kiara, the princess's boom-and-bust diet attempts had left her even heavier than before, and also more hungry and lethargic, which didn't help.

The situation had become so bad in fact, that Simba had asked Rafiki for help. The shaman had agreed quickly, and given him some herbs for Kiara. They hadn't had any affect yet, but it was early days, so they'd have to wait a while to see changes occur.
1221.title: Porky Princess

choices: Simba finds a way to keep her from gaining weight
12212.content:
The herbs didn't help much. It seemed that no matter how many she ate, she just got bigger. Eventually they gave up. The herbs just weren't working. Kiara didn't really mind though, cause it seemed Kovu liked her a bit more this way. But her Simba was still worried. He decided to try talking to Kiara about it.

"Kiara," he said, "we need to talk."

"Sure dad, what's up?"

"Well, it's actually about you."

Kiara was a bit surprised. "What is it?"

"Well, it seems to me that you're not really paying attention to your weight."

"So I'm a bit chubby," she said, "so what?"

"Kiara, you're more than a bit chubby. All I'm saying is you need to keep an eye on your weight."

"Dad, I'm perfectly fine. Besides, I kind of like it, Kovu kind of likes it, and if you have problem with, then, well, that's you're problem."

Simba was shocked. He opened his mouth to say something, but nothing came out, so he simply turned and walked away, wondering what to do.
12212.title: Opposite Effect

122121.content:
Simba was truly stumped. While his daughter continued to gain weight, now sporting a second chin and quite the rear end, Simba decided that he and Rafiki needed to talk about his daughter's eating habits, and what she said to him a few moons ago.

"Rafiki, the kind of disrespect not only to her own body, but to me!" Simba said, pacing back and forth, Rafiki watching him.

"Simba, your daughter is not wrong." Rafiki said, a small grin appearing on his face.

"What!?" Simba spun around, glaring at Rafiki for a split second before calming himself down.

"If your daughter is happy, then why should you distrub that? She has a loving mate, and the lands are even more bountiful than after you had retaken the Pride-lands from Scar! The boost in population from the Outlanders integrating into our pride has made more mouths to feed, but has also given us twice as many hunters to feed them with. So, why not let your daughter be happy? I can check on her health every few moons or so if you truly think it'll become a problem. I have many an herb and brew to keep her healthy, do not worry, Simba. She'll be fine." Rafiki gave a caring smile to Simba when saying this, and Simba returned to his pacing, thinking on this.

"Hmm... I suppose you may be right, Rafiki. Although, I will still have a talk with her about that attitude she gave me the other day."

Rafiki chuckled to himself as Simba left.

"Oh, Simba. You really are just like your father..."
122121.title: "Well, she's not wrong..."

1221212.content:
Simba paced along the now moss and grass covered pride rock. For months, a strange surge in plant growth and animal life had taken hold of, as far as any of them knew, the entire world. This had come with significantly fatter and easier to hunt prey being provided for everyone; and it was showing. Simba was in deep thought about his Kiara’s weight as he approached his nearly immobile daughter.

"Hello, Kiara. How are you today?"

"Hmm?" she looked up, just finishing off a piece of meat. "Oh, hi daddy. I'm doing great! Are you doing good?"

Simba sighed, still mulling over the state of his kingdom.
1221212.title: Rotundity Rampant

1222.content:
Kiara was just down at the waterhole one morning, taking a drink, when a voice behind her said, "my my my, and who do we have here?" The princess turned towards the voice, but wasn't fast enough. Something hit her hard on the head, and everything went dark.

Some time later, Kiara awoke. She had a bad headache, and shook her head to try to clear it, when someone said, "Well, looks like the precious princess is finally awake. Startled, but still muzzy, she turned her head to see who was talking, and found herself facing...
1222.title: Out Cold

13.content: Is it set before or after TLK (not during the movie obviously, because of the drought and famine)?
13.title: Sarabi

1312.content:
"Morning Muf'" Sarabi said as the sun rose over the horizon.

"Morning Sarabi," Mufasa replied, smiling at his favourite lioness. He wasn't sure why he liked her so much, more than even her seemingly twin Sarafina, but he did, and she'd be perfect but for one aspect "have you put on a bit more weight?"

Sarabi blushed and nodded. In truth, she didn't mind being a bit chubby, and probably wouldn't have minded being even more so, but Mufasa did, so she tried to keep her excesses down. "Afraid so," she replied, then asked, "what're you going to do today?"

"Not much," Mufasa replied, "you?'
1312.title: Youthful Innocence

13122.content:
''Not much''sa Sarabi and giggled.
''I got an idea, we're going to hunt, or we can try to hunt''said Mufasa excited and looked at Sarabi if she was willing to join the hunt.
''Yes, and the adults would be very happy if we hunted down and took our own food, or tried, haha''

On the steppes hid Sarabi and Mufasa in the grass and looked at the zebra graze. Sarabi had water in his mouth and felt my stomach growled. She had not eaten breakfast.
Hungry''?''Mufasa whispered to her.

The two young lions crept closer to the grazing zebra. It turned on the ears to them and looked nervously up.
Mufasa and Sarabi ran out for, not long after the zebra lying dead in the grass.

''A good hunt'' Mufasa say and smiled.
Sarabi had already begun on the zebra soft belly. She swallowed large pieces and neutral flavor of zebra meat.

She swallowed hard to bring down the last bit and licked around her mouth. She lay down on her side and then licking her paws.
Mufasa, who had only chewed on one of the zebras frambein, looked at her bulging stomach.
''You are satisfied now ..''
Sarabi looked at her full and satisfies belly, it was round like a ball. She nodded her head and smiled.

''But what shall we do with the rest of the zebra?''She asked.
''There's a lot on, we should take the rest and save it for later,''said Mufasa.

Sarabi was about to get up when she felt a pain in her belly.
''But my stomach is so full''she complained,''I maby need to sleep it of..''

What sould they do now?
13122.title: The Hunt

1313.content: Before or After Simba's birth?
1313.title: Adult

132.content:
Sarabi smiled as she looked out over the Pridelands' resurgent beauty. It had been but a few moons ago that there nothing but death and destruction here, but now the lands were bustling with life again. Of course, new life for the herds meant more meals for the pride, and it was a situation they took advantage of, often stuffing themselves to the point of bursting simply for the sensation of being full, and the former queen was no exception.

And nor was food the only improvement, for with the hyenas gone, the lionesses were able to relax once again, and it was a situation they took full advantage of, though none more so than Sarabi, a situation arising less from Sarabi's inability, or the laziness inherent in all positions of power, than from Simba's fear of losing his mother. After hearing of Scar's bad treatment of the pride, and especially his former brother's mate, Simba took every advantage to spoil his mother, giving her a good share at every meal, and preventing her from joining the hunt more than ocassionally, under the pretence of 'instruction and guidance'.

Of course, an excess of food and a lack of exercise were having an effect, and Sarabi's once lithe figure had expanded considerably, not with muscle, her own having actually decreased from lack of use, but with pure fat. These days she didn't go out on hunts at all, excess fat and lack of muscles tired her too quickly to be useful, so she just sat around, giving Simba and help and support he needed.
132.title: New Life

1321.content:
As time passed Sarabi got bigger and lazier, until, a few moons later, she was so big she couldn't even get to the waterhole without having to stop for a rest. Quite apart from the lack of exercise, she was also seeing less and less of the rest of the pride, most of whom now refused to talk to her for being greedy.

Not that Sarabi was bothered by this, because she was comfortable with her new weight. Not only comfortable in fact, but happy, she'd never realised being so big could feel so comfortable. Of course she couldn't go fast of far, but nor did she have any reason to.
1321.title: Getting Bigger

1322.content: Sarabi was out walking one day when a sound caught her attention, the danger Yowl of a Cheetah, then its scream, and then a sound that chilled her heart, the laugh of a hyena. Walk forgotten, the former queen crept closer to where the sound had come from, and saw a sight that made her blood boil, a trio of hyenas was bullying a cheetah, and seemed already to have done their damage, for one of the cheetah's legs was covered in blood.
1322.title: Savior

13221.content:
"Hey," Sarabi called, drawing attention to herself, "get out of here," then charged.

The hyenas retreated when Sarabi charged, then turned when the expected blows of the lioness didn't eventuate, and began to laugh as the turgid lioness drew alongside the injured cheetah. The charge hadn't been long, only a few dozen paces, but it was enough to leave the former queen panting slightly. Sensing a weakness, the hyenas stopped their retreat, and instead began to approach again.

Dealing with three hyenas wouldn't have troubled a lioness in her prime, but Sarabi was far from in her prime, so while she managed to drive the hyenas off she sustained some nasty injuries, including a bad bit on her haunch, leaving it virtually useless.

Once the hyenas were gone, Sarabi turned to the cheetah, and asked, "are you ohhh..." noticing for the first time the bloodstained cub at the cheetah's forepaws, "I'm sorry."

Ignoring the lioness, the cheetah struggle for a moment, but managed to bend down far "enough to nuzzle the cub, but it was obvious, after a few moments, that it was dead. leaving the dead cub, and still ignoring her massive companion, the cheetah limped over to a nearby bush, where Sarabi watched two more cheetah cubs appeared.

Struggling to move her considerable body with only three good legs, Sarabi made her way over to the cheetah, who was embracing her two surviving cub fiercely, then took the head of one in her mouth, and was about to bite down when Sarabi said, "hey."

The cheetah's head shot round and said, "can't you just...oh, sorry, I though you were..."

"Hey, it's okay," Sarabi said plopping her bulk down beside the cheetah, "and you don't have to do that because I can help you."

The cheetah turned her head to look Sarabi over, before saying, "how, because you're a bit, big."

"And don't I know it," Sarabi said, "but I can help you, honestly."

The cheetah looked disbelieving for a moment, then sighed, "well, it's not like I can do anything else is it?"

"Well you could finish your job and die here alone," Sarabi said, "but I doubt that's something you want to do if there's an alternative."

"And what is this alternative," the cheetah asked.

"Well I didn't get this size on my own," Sarabi said, "but I think we'd better get these injuries looked at first."

"And I can bring the cubs," the cheetah asked, "I can't leave them behind, not after what just happened."

"You take one I'll take the other," Sarabi said, "now come on, this is going to take a while so we'd better start now."
13221.title: In Defence Of Another

13223.content:
It sickened Sarabi to watch the hyenas kill the cheetah, who was nursing as it turned out when several cub squeaks were heard, but the former queen was adamant, the hyena could pay later, for now she had to find out where they lived, the get back and warn Simba.

Being careful to maintain her camouflage, Sarabi followed the hyenas as they headed back home, their deed done. At first it looked as though they were heading for the graveyard, but they passed by it, heading instead for the Outlands. As she watched them cross over the log spanning the river, she considered whether to follow them further to pinpoint their home, or leave to warn Simba.
13223.title: Tailing Trouble

132232.content:
As the hyenas stepped off the other end of the log Sarabi made up her mind, it would be no use reporting the hyenas to Simba if she couldn't also lead him to them, and with that in mind, she waited till the hyenas were out of sight, then started across the log.

Of course, while the log was quite capable of taking three hyenas together, Sarabi was much heavier, and that's where the problems started. The former queen was near the middle of the log it began to creak warningly. At first she tried to back up, but it was useless, she'd have to go right to the end and turn around, so she continued on.

Things didn't improve though, because as Sarabi got past half way, she heard the log begin to break, so moved as fast as she could, hoping to get to the other bank before it gave way completely. This she managed, but she didn't have time to be thankful for this because the hyenas returned to see what the noise was, except there was now seven of them, too many for even some lions to handle, and a lion she certainly wasn't.
132232.title: Caught Out

1322322.content:
Sarabi could only glare, as the hyenas, at first cautious, quickly broke down in laughter at the sight of a Sarabi. Finally, one of them recovered enough to say, "okay, enough of that you lot," and finally, by degrees the rest of the hyenas calmed down, though not one of them stopped sniggering.

When things were finally quiet, the hyena who'd spoken asked, "who are you, and why're you here?" Sarabi didn't answer, so, after several moments, the hyena said, "okay, have it your way." Signalling a couple of the other hyenas to join it, the hyena approached the lioness, and said, "you're coming with us, don't try to run, because we'll kill you, and don't trt to resist either, because that'll lead to the same fate, understood?"

"Fully," Sarabi replied coldly.

"Come on then," the hyena said. At first Sarabi did refuse to move, but not for long as the other four hyenas approached, boxing her in and nipping at her.

It took the group some time to get where they were going, and when they did the future looked bleak for Sarabi, they'd arrived in what must have been the main social are, for there was dozens of hyena. As the group moved across the area Sarabi began to attract more and more unwanted attention from the other hyenas, some of which sneered at her, but most of which simply broke down laughing at the lioness's appearance.

Finally the group approached a raised section, almost a dais, on which lounged a female hyena and her two male cohorts. "Seems like you got yourself a little prize," the female said, in a voice which left Sarabi with no doubt that this was Shenzi, former and apparently current matriarch of the hyena clan. She then rose, jumped down from the almost-dais, and began to examine the lioness, pulling back in surprise after only a few moments, "Sarabi."

"Shenzi," Sarabi replied coldly.

Shenzi seemed to be at a loss for a moment, then finally said, "long time no see."

"Not long enough," Sarabi replied.

"Oh come on Sarabi," Shenzi said, "that's no way to talk to a friend is it?"

"You're not my 'friend'," Sarabi replied, "so I can talk to you how I like."

"That you can," Shenzi said, "but I wouldn't be too nasty if I was you, after all, I'm controlling whether you live or die, and I'll always go the easy way, easy for me anyway."

"You won't have me for that long," Sarabi replied, "Simba knows where I am, so it's only a matter of time before I'm out of here."

"She's lying," the other hyena said as Shenzi raised her eyebrow at it, "she's been following us the whole way, she didn't get a chance to warn anyone, plus she broke the log getting over here, so there's no way they could get at us even if they did know."

Sarabi tried to keep her face neutral as her hopes of a successful bluff faded, but couldn't stop the twinkle of worry in her eye, which Shenzi immediately pounced on. "Nice try," the matriarch said to the lioness, "pity for you it didn't work."

"So now what are you going to do with me," Sarabi asked.
1322322.title: Prisoner

choices: Shenzi decides to stuff her own belly.
13223222.content:
"Hmm, let me see," said Shenzi, thinking of what to do. She tried not to giggle at Sarabi's size...why wouldn't she? Shenzi had gained a bit of pudge on her belly, but Sarabi was ridiculous! She looked Sarabi over once more, still taking in how massive she had become. Then Shenzi's ears pricked: Sarabi's immense stomach was growling. Shenzi grinned. "You seem...hungry, Sarabi."

"Yes, what of it?" Sarabi replied. But she couldn't help but cringe as her stomach let out another deep rumble: she really was hungry. Several other hyenas snickered and laughed at Sarabi's embarrassment.

Shenzi grinned again. "Well, even if you are my prisoner, I can't just let you starve to death..." She looked at the hyenas close to Sarabi. "Hold her down."

Sarabi gasped as she was flipped onto her back, and all four limbs were sat on; she didn't have the strength to lift the hyenas off. She looked around to she what Shenzi was doing, but she had disappeared. Sarabi's mind was racing, wondering what was going to happen...

A few minutes later, Shenzi reappeared followed by many other hyenas, and all of them wee carrying meat. Lots of it. Sarabi gawked; her belly roared with anticipation.

Shenzi walked over, glaring at Sarabi, holding the meat above her. Sarabi gave in to her hunger and snapped at it; Shenzi let it go, but smirked. "I hope your belly has a lot of room, Sarabi...you'll need it. Before Sarabi could answer, the next chunk f meat was shoved int her maw; it was too big to spit out, and she was too hungry anyway. Shenzi watched as Sarabi was fed...after a while, Sarabi had slipped from starving, to sated, to sick, and truly had to be force fed now.

After a pause in the food, Sarabi belched. "oeeergghh...so stuffed...ohhh...I...Ijust can't eat any more..." Saabi felt like she was about to burst, and her belly was almost a sphere, nearly a metre in diameter!

"Hurts, doesn't it?" said Shenzi, having approached her. Sarabi merely belched. Shenzi grinned, taking a sadist pleasure in Sarabi's painful belly ache. The hyenas were returning with more meat.

Sarabi turned her head; her face was right next to Shenzi's belly. It had grown a bit since they'd last met, but little more than to make Shenzi look pregnant. Sarabi's ear twitched: Shenzi's stomach was growling.
13223222.title: Force Fed

choices: Simba, Nala and all the other Pridelanders!
Zira, Nuka and all the other Outlanders!
132232221.content:
"Hold up!" Shenzi said just as the hyenas arrived with more meat. "Sarabi here is going to need to pause for a bit." "Huh?" everyone said in unison. "Gosh, Shenzi, I didn't know you cared..." Sarabi sarcastically remarked. "Don't let it go to your fat head, blubber belly." Shenzi responded as she did a few small knocks on Sarabi's blubbery skull, then did a small smack on Sarabi's gargantuan belly, causing her to be wracked with unendurable pain, even if only for a second. "I'm doing this for two reasons only. The first is that if we were to feed you any further right now, you would burst open. Your belly would explode like a bomb. You would be dead in seconds. And as such, you wouldn't be capable of feeling pain anymore! And we can't have that, now can we?" "Sadistic lowlife..." Sarabi thought in her mind, increasingly wanting to tear Shenzi's throat out, but frustrated at how she was unable to move at all, save for breathing, due to her already obese self having now gotten all the fatter, while also having lost even more muscle than before. She was literally immobilized.

"Um, what's the second reason, Shenzi?" asked one of the hyenas. "The second reason is that I'm hungry now, ironically enough! And I'll take that meat, thank you! Stuff my belly!" "But Shenzi, you're already sort of plump!" said another hyena, this one being Banzai. "If you stuff yourself, you could end up just as fat as the lioness lump lying down there, or worse!" "Right now, I don't care one way or the other, because I'm hungry! FEED ME!" Shenzi exploded with the last two words, and the hyenas obliged. Although Sarabi was relieved she would be granted a temporary rest from this torturous force-feeding, she knew the hyenas on her limbs were not intending to get off at all, and even if they did, she could not possibly get up. She was trapped here, and would be unless some of her pride came to her rescue, which was quite unlikely. "Thank God for small favors, but I'm still in a very dangerous, and possibly life-threatening, situation!" Sarabi thought to herself. "Why did I have to become so fat and lethargic? It's like I've got a target painted on me now!"

Anyway, one hyena after the other handed Shenzi meat, and she kept on gorging herself with it. It looked as though Shenzi would never finish stuffing herself, even as her initially merely plump, pregnant looking belly was getting bigger and bigger, and, as if that weren't enough, the rest of her body was expanding with fat, too, even if not as much as her paunch, which had gotten a head start, was. By the time Shenzi finally finished binging and stuffing her belly, she was twice as fat as Sarabi had been before getting force-fed, though not quite on par with Sarabi's current state of corpulence. After letting out a long, loud belch, Shenzi patted her new, mountain-like belly and said: "My God, that was good. So, how much weight have I put on?" "Well, you aren't on par with lard lioness," Banzai replied in a derogatory reference to Sarabi, "but you are comparable. Still, I don't think should should be unable to move, like she is." All the hyenas could not believe how fast Shenzi had fateened herself up in a matter of time with just one meal. At least, what she considered a meal.

After they got over it enough to think straight again, Shenzi turned to Sarabi and said: "Okay, porky prisoner, what to do with you now?!"

but before anyone could do anything else, or even think anything else, who should show up but...
132232221.title: Shenzi decides to stuff her own belly.

choices: Shenzi decides to go hunt for more
Shenzi has her two lackeys hunt for more
She is visited by a rather handsome hyena male
14.content:
Since the day, when the Hyenas had scattered the kingdom, they had relocated into a new beautiful and rich savannah.

Life was good, as the savannah had plenty of varied arreas and lot's of live prey.

in Shenzi's case, the days had grown lazy. She had plumped up to a rather overweight female hyena the last month. There was no denying in that.

Right now she was eating through a dead gazelle.
14.title: Shenzi

choices: Shenzi is slowly but constatnly growing fatter
Shenzi finds a treasure trove of food
141.content:
"I'm still hungery?" Shenzi said to herself as her fat belly growled back at her "well, no better way to calm it than to feed it."
She slowly got up, causing her fat belly to jiggle, and went off to find more food.
Even though she found a very large gazzel and ate it all, giving Shenzi a large belly, wider posterior, and was beguining to form a second chin, she was still hungery, the thought lingered in her mind untill...
141.title: Shenzi decides to go hunt for more

choices: Some hyenas pass her and tease her for her weight.
1411.content:
Days passed with Shenzi's continiuous gorging and she would grow larger and larger.

When she walked or waddled her body would make small jiggles. Her speed had been reduced, and she found it harder to hunt. Whenever she walked her fat belly would sag to the ground. She was easely the fattest girl in the savannah.

She relaxed on her rather plump ass, when..
1411.title: a fatter hyena

14111.content:
"Well, Someone has been putting on!"
"Are you trying to become a hippo?"

These comments was followed by insane hyana luaghter. Shenzi turned around to see two slim female hyanas, luaghing at her.

"Good luck atracting a mate, Shenzi. I bet the boys will go crazy for a hippo" One if them said sarcastically.

"Beat it!" Shenzi snarled in such a terrifying way which made the two other hyanes scatter immidiatly. She was good at gaining control over others.

Shenzi tried to get up, but found her self stopped by her heavy carriage. It took her three-four tries to get up on her feet, which exhausted her. She started to feel..
14111.title: fatty, fatty!

choices: Go and eat something to try and comfort her
Go to sleep and has a dream
141111.content:
Shenzi started to feel depressed.

looking down at herself, she saw her large belly and flabby legs and realized how much she has been gaining in the past weeks,

"Maybe their right" Shenzi said bitterly, "I am becoming as big as hippo"

Shenzi started to walk, or more like waddle, off back to the cave she sleep in, upset.

Part of her mind was thinking about eating, she needed comfort food, while another part just wanted to sleep.
141111.title: Depressed

choices: a rather handsome young hyena male walked by
1411111.content:
Shenzi sat sad in her cave. The more she thought about her shape the more resless she got. She had to do something!

Her belly gave a growl. She had to go get some food... No! She had to be carefull what she ate now onwards... She gave another glance on her now plumper thighs. Damn it!

She cursed loudly and bowed her head. the hunger was almost unbarable! Forget about it! She had to eat something! She rushed as fast at she was capable over to a previously hunted gazelle carcass and began eating.

Greedily she devoured piece by piece of meat, all along feeling deeply ashamed over her own lack of will power.

She then heard a noise..
1411111.title: Go and eat something to try and comfort her

choices: Shenzi has become a very dominant girlfriend
14111111.content:
Shenzi found herself sitting on her plump rear with her soft hyena gut spilling out in front of her. Sobs of self pity could be heard in the big empty cave. Or was it empty?
