Shenzi thought she could detect some sounds coming from outside the den. Curiously, having forgotten about her weight for a brief moment, she waddled her way over to the entrance.

There was clearly a figure making it's way to the den. A male hyena, fit body with graceful elegant movement. Shenzi felt a warmth in her chest and stomach, a nervousness which made the flab on her hind legs jiggle.

The hyena male has made his way up to the entrance. He is just about the enter when he spots Shenzi sitting by the side of the entrance. Startled, he jumps back.

For a moment, the hyena male just stares at her, measuring her from top to toe. A faint blush is visible in his fur.

"I'm.. I'm sorry, I thought this den was... empty. My name is Majiti" he eventually says.

"... There is still room enough for one more, Majiti" Shenzi replies, blushing.

Three days later...
14111111.title: Oh, those young...

141111111.content:
Shenzi was dozing after having recently finished breakfast, when Majiti returned from somewhere, carrying a small gazelle carcass carcass. "You know you don't have to bring me something every time you come right," she said, "I'm already gaining weight."

"I know," Majiti replied, "but it's good to see a girl who enjoys her food."

In her torpid condition it took Shenzi some time understand what Majiti had just said, but when she did she stared, "you like fat females?"

"I know its not a normal thing," Majiti replied, "but that's just me." Shenzi didn't say anything to this, trying to work out what to do.
141111111.title: Plumping Up For A Friend

141111112.content:
"Majiti, do you know the heck what time it is," Shenzi said, when he finally returned from the hunting trip, dragging half a gazelle, "I'm hungry."

"Sorry Shenzi," Majiti apologised, browbeaten, "the ambushers had a tizz about something, we almost lost the hunt altogether."

"Well you didn't," Shenzi said, "now drag that thing over here, so's I can eat it."
141111112.title: In The Deep End

choices: Shenzi shows Majiti who's in charge in their relationship.
Shenzi acts hurt, Majiti feels sorry for her.
1411111121.content:
Majiti grinded his teeth:

"Why don't you do it?!" He snapped
"What was that?!" Shenzi snarled

"Why don't you do it?!" Majiti growled back. "Or has your butt grown so huge you can't drag it over here to your own meal?! I agreed to be your mate, not your slave! I don't mind hunting for you, in fact I see it as a priviliege! But what I can't take is harrasment from a bloody disrespectful, lazy slob who is supposed to be my girlfriend!"
1411111121.title: Is enough, enough?

14111111211.content:
Shenzi was incensed now, how dare this lowly male talk back to her. She rose, growling, and advanced on Majiti, her fat shaking with every step.

Majiti was growling as well, but he was scared, he knew he was going to get into trouble for this, and as Shenzi approached, he began to back off. Unfortunately, while was watching the approaching female, he wasn't watching where he was going, and so was quickly coralled into a corner, his growl dying in his throat as he realised his predicament.

Shenzi knew she had Majiti trapped in the corner, but it still wasn't enough fir her, so she approached the now cringing male, knocking him over and laying down on top of him, letting her more than ample stomach pin them down, before saying "you don't ever talk like that to me again, understood?" When there was no answer, the Matriarch stood up, then before the male could act, slamming her bulk down on top of him, startling agroan out of him, and saying, "is that understood Majiti?"
14111111211.title: Pushy Partner

choices: Thinking he has an advantage, Majiti attacks again
141111112111.content:
"..understood" Majiti replied in a faint grunt of bitter defeat.

With that, the more than portly hyena female arose, satisfied, from on top of the poor male releasing him from the pinning pressure of her immense bulk. Surely being at least twice his size, most direct physical confrontation was likely to prove futile. If Shenzi could get her weight around, there was little Majiti could do to fight back. Even in their more intimate moments, the rare times they occured, the severly overweight female could prove difficult for the male to handle.

He looked at her, waddling away, her hind-quarters bouncing from side to side in her walk. Shenzi would eventually lay down on the ground and, with a slight struggle, roll over on her back, her soft flabby shapes spilling out on each of her sides. Shenzi turned her fat neck, licking her lips: "So how about that feeding, hon?" She said strict, yet still with a satisfactory gloat, knowing who was really in charge of this relationship.
141111112111.title: The male obeys

choices: Majiti attempts to escape at night
Majiti tries to bring back the "old" Shenzi
1411111121111.content:
The shame was visible all over the male as he approached his spouse with the food. Shenzi did not hesitate and began tearing off large meat chunks from the dead animal Majiti had hunted for them. Ignoring the sounds of Shenzi's greedy binge, her satisfied moans as her belly got filled with food, Majiti pondered over his current situation. Whatever it was that had lead to him loving this female, it was sure beginning to fade.

Naturally, it was a common tradition among hyenas that females assumed the dominant role in a couple, Majiti was well aware of it, but this was something more. Shenzi was greedy and insensitive. She always got to eat first taking most of the food, barely leaving enough food to give Majiti the strength he needed for hunting. While Majiti was becoming undernourished, Shenzi was virtually exploding with fat. Things had to change. Majiti gazed longingly upon the cave exit.

The sound of a tiny feminine "urp" made his eyes turn back to Shenzi. Majiti smiled in his mind. Shenzi didn't look quite as vicious now. In fact, she looked almost innocent. Majiti remembered when they had first met. Shenzi seemed almost shy. Now she was laying on her back before him, breathing heavily from devouring her feast. She depended on him, Majiti knew that. Things really had to change.
1411111121111.title: The relationship turns

choices: Shenzi feels guilty for not sharing her meal
Shenzi tells him his hunger is his own problem
14111111211112.content:
It seemed to Majiti that he had to let Shenzi know that he was a person, and not just a servant. He had brought this upon himself, really, by bringing her all this food without complaint: she must be thinking that was all he had to offer. He had to show her otherwise.

"I'm sorry for talking back at you," he said, his head lowered.

"Hmm?"

Majiti waited, keeping his posture submissive. He took a deep breath, hoping that what he was about to try would work, and that she wouldn't think he was weak.

"I was angry. I shouldn't have snapped at you."

"Darn right!"

He pretended he hadn't heard her. "Just that... I had to break up a pretty big fight today. Truth is it took a lot out of me. Lots of males got hurt today. It was all I could to scavenge that one piece for you. Plus I haven't eaten in a few days... puts me in a crabby mood."

He looked up from under his mane, trying to gauge her expression.
14111111211112.title: Appeal to Shenzi's kindness

choices: "Help me get up on my feet.."
141111112111121.content:
Shenzi slowly stopped chewing and let go of the meat. She tilted her fat face to look up at Majiti, forming a huge double chin.

It was a weird sight, the bloated female hyena laying there. Her belly heaved up and down as she breathed. She looked thoughtful and her expression seemed to turn somewhat milder. Yet Majiti was careful not to meet her eyes too often. He had to look strong as well as humble. But it was hard, especially as he already knew Shenzi had the final say in this. As of now, it appeared she had made up her mind.

Shenzi sighed and gave a slight smirk: "You may have the rest of the meat, Majiti. I'm full"

Majiti knew this was the closest he would get to an apology. It wasn't good to know what Shenzi's motives where, but right now Majiti did not bother. He was just about to approach the meat as Shenzi spoke again:

"Well.. there is one thing I need you to do first."
141111112111121.title: Shenzi feels guilty

1411111121111211.content:
"Rub my belly?"

Majiti stifled a frown. Really, he was starving, and she wanted him to do something so mundane? But he looked into her eyes again, and saw a vulnerability there - perhaps she just wanted some attention.

So he wandered over and obliged, running his claws lightly over her quivering gut.

"Mmmm no, push harder you silly male!" she said, slapping his paw, and Majiti grimaced, trying to contain his anger. He pushed hard into her lovely, soft fat until he felt some resistance, then rubbed up and down, sending her blubber rolling this way and that.

"Thaat's better, oh Majiti, that's so good! Why didn't you tell me you were so good at this?" She said, looking up and smiling beautifully amongst the many rolls of fat on her face and neck. The fat on her body rolled up between her chubby forelegs and pushed up against her chin, making the rolls there even deeper. She looked so cute that way.

Majiti couldn't help it, he smiled back, and foolishly he said, "I live to serve."

Shenzi reached out her chubby arms, and Majiti stepped forward, as surprised as anything to recieve a great big, smothering hug from her. It felt nice, of course, laying on top of all her fat (much better than the other way around), and soon he did his best to hug her back, patting her, feeling her fat undulate against his skinny body.

It was the first bit of affection she had shown him, and he liked it.

"My you are skinny," she said, rubbing his hands up and down his back, then pushed him away. "Quick! Go get some meat on your bones. I really don't know why you put up with me, y'know. I'm such big, fat slob!"

Majiti looked down into her sad face, only then realising, he hadn't told her he preferred her this way! If he did, though, he wondered whether she would become cocky again. Pausing for a moment, he said...
1411111121111211.title: "Rub my belly!"

choices: Shenzi rolls on top of Majiti in her sleep
14111111211112111.content:
Majiti was just about to engorge in the rest of the meat, but stopped in his tracks and turned around to look at Shenzi.

"I like you like this.." he said simply.

"Oh.." Shenzi seemed to lit up, but suddenly had a thoughtful expression. When nothing else was said, Majiti turned his attention back to the meat. It felt really good to get a decent portion of food for once. As Majiti wasn't used to being proper fed, he didn't really eat much before he was full. It felt satisfactory. Again, Majiti thought of Shenzi, who could eat herself so bloated she would just lie on her back and whimper for hours. He doubted food could ever get so satisfactory to him.

When he had finished eating he turned back to Shenzi who looked at him with inviting eyes. She signalized for Majiti to come and lay down on top of her. She was laying on her back, her fat belly was spreading out on her sides. Majiti obliged giving a tired smile.

"I thought you would like to sleep here tonight.." Shenzi smiled as Majiti had gotten comfortable on top of her, his skinny frame nearly sinking into hers.
Majiti did not reply, but smiled. He wasn't really sure how to answer to Shenzi anymore, but perhaps everything was turning for the better now?
14111111211112111.title: "I like you like this."

choices: Suddenly, other hyenas come along and see this
Shenzi chews Majiti out for making her this fat
14111111211112112.content:
"I love you anyway." he said, patting the enormous pile of blubber that was Shenzi's belly and then licking her face before digging into the meat. Shenzi couldn't help but blush a little at that. She was so glad to have a mate who would love her, no matter how obese and flabby she was, and who she could trust and love back. Now she regretted her initial refusal to let him eat more than ever, and once he'd finished his meal and was satisfied for the time being, she said: "Oh, Majiti, I'm so sorry for how I've acted." Majiti was very surprised to hear Shenzi apologizing, but he smiled kindly as she continued: "If only I'd realized how perfect you really were sooner. Can you forgive me?" "I certainly can." he said. "Good to know. I love you." she said. "Though maybe you still need some meat..." "No, I'm good for now." he said. "However, I found something in this particular kill." "What?" asked Shenzi. Majiti explained: "It's a gem. A magical one, by the looks of it, and you know what?" "What?" asked Shenzi. "I not only love you anyway, but I actually prefer you this way. I've come to realize, additionally, that the fatter you are, the more gorgeous you become." "You prefer me this way, and think my being fat makes me attractive?!" Shenzi exclaimed, excited and elated all of a sudden.

"Indeed," Majiti said. "Which is why I'm going to use this gem to make you fatter than ever, and it will be done so in a way that makes sure you continue to fatten up nonstop, though the magical properties will see to it you can still breathe and such, and won't have any health problems or heart attacks or anything like that. You'll be permanently immune to and exempt from them, no matter how much blubber piles on. You'll be able to move, too. I wouldn't want to incapaciate or injure you, after all. But you'll be fatter and fatter by the second, all the same! You'll be my beloved mountain of a blubbery beauty." "Now, just a minute..." Shenzi began. As much as she loved him and was flattered to hear he loved her as a big, fat bitch, she was already fatter than a hippo! She wouldn't want to get even a bit fatter. But Majiti worked his magic, literally, and Shenzi could only watch as the gem did its work and she got fatter and fatter by the second. Soon enough, she was twice as fat as she'd been before, then three times as fat, then four, then five. By the time she was six times fatter, Majiti suddenly stopped to consider that this could cause the ground beneath them to crumble and their home to break. So he did a wave of the gem and put a stop to the sequence, then threw it away. All else worked as he said it would, though, and Shenzi was easily six times fatter than she was before. "My God, you are so beautiful..." Majiti gaped as he looked at the unbelievably fat Shenzi. Shenzi was full of disbelief, too.

What was to happen next?
14111111211112112.title: Shenzi fattens up more than ever

choices: Shenzi fattens rapidly massive along with Nala
Nala fattens and catches up with Shenzi and they fatten at the same rate
141111112111121122.content:
"What?!" Shenzi gasped out and for the moment could not move, her body needed a bit of time to get used to her new size. And it was a large elephant fat, flabby, roll and bulgy layered blob of a hyena body. "You say
I'm beautiful but I look like a elephant sized hyena! Take away these tons of new fat now!"
"I'm sorry Shenzi, but the gems' power is irreversible. In fact, it effects any female animal that is within its surrounding influence. And that is likely a mile all around." Majiti explained.
"Darn it, I'm going outside." Shenzi felt her body get used to her new size, and like a lumbering elephant and hippo, she waddled heavily out of the cave and outside. Shenzi barely was able to fit through the entrance.

In anger at being yelled at by her, he searched for the magic gem and picked it up. "Well Shenzi, I'll get you to like being fat and continue to fatten rapidly nonstop, like both a desire and lust to be fatter and fatter. I hope it has a massive effect on your hunger too, to become a constant feeding gluttonous hyena blob." And that said, he chased outside to her.

However, it was a day when the new Queen Nala occasionally planned to meet up to talk about the current hunting and food shares betwen the pride and her hyena clan. As soon as Nala got into the elephant graveyard, she gasped and blinked when she saw the newly fattened blob female hyena. "Shenzi, is that you?"
Shenzi blinked and forgot about the meeting time. "Erf, Nala... I, ugh, recently ate some elephant."

Getting back to her outside, Majiti turned to face Shenzi again. He didn't notice Nala was there. "You might not like being fat now Shenzi, I thought you did, but soon you will." He said angerily but not unkindly as he immediately waved the gem once again to start up its magic on her, not knowing it would also do the same to Nala as well. "You'll be more beautiful soon, a litteral mountainous blob of constant undulating fat and more
so than that." In fact, Majiti had no intention of stopping the magic gem this time. He was going all out on extremely fattening Shenzi fatter and fatter. He could also live on her too, after all.
141111112111121122.title: Shenzi chews Majiti out for making her fatter

choices: Shenzi's appetite had adjusted and now she wants even MORE!!
141111112111122.content:
"Puts you in a bad mood!?" barks Shenzi with a scowl to Majiti, who was almost dumb-founded, what kind of monster had Shenzi become?

"I need food Majiti, I can't live on pathetic things like antelopes or zebras! I want-urp-more!! I want elephants! I want a banquet fit for a queen! now I'll go to sleep with nothing more than a snack"

With a scowl Shenzi heaved her bulk up, causing pain to shoot through her colossal bulk causing Shenzi to whimper slightly as she waddled her huge bulk too her usual sleeping spot and plopped herself down, with a greater struggle then she had before, Shenzi rolled herself onto her side, whimpering in pain as she started to fall too sleep as Majiti smirked.

If Shenzi wanted a banquet fit for a queen she'd get it, but Majiti was going to stay and watch Shenzi self-destruct due to her out of control appetite.

____________________________

With a groan, the obese Shenzi woke up, she'd slept in till afternoon and was starving to feed her appetite.

When she rubbed the sleep out of her eyes she thought she was in heaven

Elephants, a banquet of 5 Elephants as she heaved her huge bulk up, causing pain to shoot through her flesh as Shenzi heaved her huge bulk to the first elephant, ignoring the pain as she dug in, greedily tearing huge chunks off the elephants flesh as she was having the feast she'd always wanted, as she continued to eat, her stomach was protesting, groaning and sloshing as Shenzi didn't care, she only needed food in her life, she didn't care about anything else.

However 4 hours later Shenzi finished the first Elephant and let out a monsterous belch that could be heard for miles around as she clutched onto her monstrously obese belly, which jiggled and rippled and she whimpered in pain, trying to block the intense pain out

"URP!!!! MAJITI!!! I NEED A BELLY RUB!!!" bellows Shenzi like the tyrant she was as Majiti comes into the cave entrance

"You only want me to get food Shenzi, I need to fill that appetite of yours" smirks Majiti as Shenzi belched loudly again as she snapped back

"Yeah!! -URP- I've just got to rest..My belly needs to digest the appetizer!"

After two more elephants...
141111112111122.title: Shenzi tells him his hunger is his own problem

14111112.content:
Shenzi looked up, trying to find the source of the noise. "Anyone there" she called after a few moments, but no-one replied. She looked around for another moment, then finally decided she'd imagined the noise, and continued to eat.

Soon, the gazelle carcass was nothing but bone fragments, Shenzi even having crushed the bones for the marrow. "Oof," she exhaled, surprised at the sudden extra weight in her belly. Now that she could finally think without her stomach, making demands, she tried to decide what to do.
14111112.title: Hearing Things

choices: She tries to drive the leopard away.
141111121.content:
Shenzi decided to walk out into the night. She decided she needed the exercise to keep what muscle mass she did have under all that fat. She waddled slower than usual; her belly almost touched the ground. She looked up at the sky...it was clear, all the stars and the moon shining brightly. Her stomach gurgled softly as it digested her meal. She continued walking when she heard another noise, and she stopped in her tracks. "Hello...?" she called. No answer.

After a while, Shenzi heard another noise. "Is anyone there...?" After a moment, there was a crashing noise and a yelp. Shenzi waddled as fast as she could to it, to see who it was...

Shenzi stopped. It was not a hyena, but a leopard. I young, scrawny, terrified leopard, bleeding from the leg after the fall.
141111121.title: Go for a walk

choices: Shenzi wakes up from the dream
1411112.content:
Shenzi got back into her cave.

Exhausted she heaved her flabby belly up on a flat rock where she usually slept. Her pudgy waist spread out across the cold stone. She shut her eyes. She was tired.

That night Shenzi had a weird dream.

The first thing she noticed was the lights. Around her there was lit several torches who gave bright light into the warm African nights. The she heard the sounds. Repetative drumming rythms who appeared to come from nowhere. All around danced happy hyenas singing and dancing to the beat. The lyrics where almost impossible to catch, they eccoed and sometimes appeared to be sung backwards, but Shenzi could manage to hear a few words: all hail our queen!

She looked at herself and she had to look twice, to understand what she saw. Her body had easily doubled in size since she had last seen it. She had to be the most obese hyena to ever live. Her legs had fleshed up adding to hear wide hyena rump, a collar of fat almost engulfed her head and her belly spilled out over the flat rock she slept on. No! this wasn't a rock - it was a cliff! a Throne! and all the other hyenas where dancing and praising below! She was their queen! The queen of the hyenas!

She had several servants around here who took care of her needs, notably three rather handsome hyena males. One who continuously fed her food, another one rubbing her immense stomach and a third waving a palm leaf above her to cool her off. She had flower leaves spread ontop of her body and some knitted into her mane. She was the queen.
1411112.title: A dream of delight

choices: Shenzi tries to make her dream come true
14111122.content:
The dancing hyenas began to line up, food magically appeared in their paws: hippos, elephants, rhinos, only the fattest animals.
Shenzi licked her lips, she liked what she was seeing.
The hyenas began to march towards her, food in paw, Shenzi's behemoth stomach growled with lust for food.
One by one the hyenas shoveled the animals into her maw. She quickly gulped them down, her stomach swelling with 100lbs after every bite. Her belly swelled forward, becoming rounder and more spherical, yet blobby. Her paws had become useless, they were trapped beneath her layers of flab, she couldn't so much as wiggle them. Her cheeks had become immense, almost like a monster truck tire had engulfed her whole face. Her ass began to constantly grow larger, swallowing pride rock behind her. She laughed, this was the life for her. Just a humongous blob.

Soon Shenzi became a ball, she crushed Pride Rock, she was far beyond that.
Just then, millions of hyenas rolled a massive, blubbery, elephant far bigger than her in the way. The elephant was fed beyond bursting. Shenzi devoured it whole and felt her body begin to shake.
She erupted to the size of the world and began eating past that,all while the hyenas worshipped her as their queen.
Then-
She woke up.
14111122.title: the dream continues.

141112.content:
...pleased, strangely. She hadn't realised it till now, but the former matriarch, more than 'almost' anything else in the world, enjoyed being fat. She wasn't sure why this was, but she supposed it had something to do with having spent so many years on the edge of starvation.

Of course, there was one thing in her life that outweighed her pleasure of even eating, and that one thing was Banzai, she was smitten with him, and so, when someone behind her said "Shenzi," she turned to see...
141112.title: Oddly Pleased

14112.content:
She felt a gurgling in her stomach, so intense it actually made her whole body jiggle. Shenzi looked down at her belly, her four chins squishing into each other, somewhat confused.

"What the heck was that? I'm not that hungry, I just ate a whole Zebra...couldn't be indigestion or anything, I feel just fine." At that moment, another violent gurgle came from her huge gut. She sighed, and got up off her fat ass, waddling off to find some more food. "Must just be more hungry than I realized..."

As she waddled, however, she felt a strange tickling sensation on her underbelly, which got more and more prevalent. She thought it must've just been the grass, her belly was hanging pretty low, but then she felt it more, and realized what was really happening. Her stomach was dragging on the ground! She stopped, and looked down, her view blocked by her five copious chins...wait, five? She counted four last time. And she hadn't eaten anything since then. Plus, her belly wasn't touching the ground a minute ago, and again, she hadn't eaten anything new. But, as she stood, she felt it press more and more firmly into the ground, spreading out little by little and forcing her legs apart, bit by bit. On top of that, she felt less pressure on the soles of her paws...she was being...lifted? Off the ground, by her own belly? Plus, plus, she felt her ass swelling up, starting to get so big it was encroaching on her own back, squishing against the rolls of back fat she'd developed. This was impossible, it made no sense, but she couldn't deny it was happening.

Somehow, some way, she was growing. Swelling up bit by bit, a little fatter and fatter every second. All on her own, she wasn't eating a thing. It took a minute to fully accept this bizarre reality, but once it dawned on her, she blinked a few times, and...
14112.title: Gasp, unexpected

choices: Her growth was slowing, and stopping!
Someone else WAS nearby! Food, food, food!!!
141122.content:
Shenzi yelped as reality hit her like a ton of bricks. She could feel the fat growing, such a bizarre sensation. She quickly wobbled, slapping her thickening limbs into her belly in a pitiful attempt to run. All she could manage was to make the pile of flab that was rapidly overtaking her to slosh and wobble furiously, her rump rounding out and protruding further and further up and out in the air, bouncing and swaying as she pumped her legs. She stretched her back legs as far as she could, wiggling her thick squishy paws in a desperate attempt to get a foothold on the ground. However all she could do was press them into the backmost part of her own gut, she felt the flab squishing up between her soft toes.

"Help! Help! Banzai, somebody! Ed! I can't move- feed me!" She called out, but no one was around. She tried to look around, but the swelling ring of fat encasing her neck impeded her abilities to turn her head very far. Plus, her large plump cheeks were inching forwards bit by bit, obscuring more and more of her peripheral vision. She could feel her chins wobble as she yelled, it felt like a new one of those was developing every minute, as she gradually ascended on her own pillow of flab, which spread out in all directions like a viscous liquid.

Her head swam. She was enjoying her fat earlier, but now- like this? This was too much. How was she supposed to hunt? And more importantly- to eat! She'd never thought ahead to the point of immobility, but now that it was here...

She wiggled her large, soft, squishy toes. She could barely bend her limbs anymore, they'd become so obese. She felt like a living mountain made of jello (not that she'd know what that is). She knew she must be the size of a hippopotamus by now, drowning in her own sea of flab. Her rump was gargantuan, like two slightly sagging spherical mountains erupting from the homogeneous blob that she'd largely become. About six feet tall, and thirteen feet wide, it dominated much of her mass, completely covering her tail, spilling on to her back rolls, and engulfing her legs to the point of almost nothing but her soft, round, engorged, wriggling toes and pillowy soles were out in open air.

She sighed, panic subsiding to confusion, annoyance, and some vague sense of enjoyment (after all who could be entirely upset with an ass like that?).

"Great. No one's around to feed me...I don't care if I'm a mountain- I wanna eat... but I can't if I can't even move." She moped. When suddenly she noticed...
141122.title: Panic and... not run, Panic and stay still!

choices: The humans and they're mysterious creations.
1411222.content:
Shenzi didn't know what to expect when her partially fat covered ears pricked up at the sound of grass rustling, but she certainly hadn't expected the sight of a scrawny looking meerkat strolling out of the high grass with a grub under his arm the size of his own leg.

"Sheesh," Timon grumbled, "I swear that's the last time I sneak a stinkbug into Pumba's lunch. A solid gas attack from that could put anyone in a coma..."

It was about then Timon noticed the massive being before him, gurgling and undulating as she grew with spurts and sloshes as pounds piled up in new folds all over.

"Whoa baby!" Timon blinked in shock, "What happened to you? Looks like you just ate a six pack pf pachyderms."

"Can it, snack-size," Shenzi muttered, "I need some help here."

"You? Help?" Timon scoffed and then looked mildly thoughtful, "Wait a minute... I know you. Yeah, you were one of those three Hyenas that tried to eat me and my friend."

"Circle of life pal," Shenzi replied as she grunted, trying to shift her massive hippo sized form, "Now are you going to help me or what?"

"I'm gonna go with 'what'," Timon replied with a huff, "Why should I help you?"

"I'll give you anything, just please help, I'm starving here," Shenzi was practically begging as her thick ham-like legs wobbled against her doughy sides.

Timon was about to tell her no way when a thought struck him and he considered more seriously. "Alright," he finally replied, "But if I help you I want three things in return."

"Anything," Shenzi almost begged as her stomach gave a particularly tight clench under all her blubber.

"First, me and my friends are off your menu for good," Timon replied, "That includes myself, Pumba, Simba and his family, and my immediate family in the colony for certain."

Shenzi grit her teeth but nodded as the now six chins wobbled down her front and her melon sized cheeks wobbled, "Fine..."

"Second..." Timon hesitate briefly as he looked over her fat form, "I want in."

"In?" Shenzi replied in confusion, "In what?"

"In you," Timon replied, "Or rather those folds of yours. they look rather warm and comfortable. A nice place to burrow in to sleep at night."

Again Shenzi winced at the demand but muttered a grudging agreement. "And the third agreement?"

"I'll let you know when it comes up," the meerkat smirked, "For now it's not important."

"Alright fine," Shenzi growled as her stomach did the same. Now just how are you going to help me?"

"Well..."

Choice One: "...There are lots of animals on the savanna. I'm sure we can ask around find the most annoying, the least liked, the real jerks who everyone wants to see gone and bring them by with a little creative manipulation."

Choice Two: "...Pumba and I have lived on grubs and bugs are whole lives. Slimy yet satisfying. It wouldn't be too hard for a couple of bug experts like us to round up a bunch more... If you're willing to try them."

Choice Three: "...Believe it or not I heard about some new place built by those human creatures. Supposed to be some sort of lab or something. they might have some food there you could eat, if you don't mind being rolled to it."
1411222.title: Making a Deal With a Meerkat

1412.content:
A faint smell caught Shenzi's attention, bringing her out of her contemplation. The smell brought the promise of more food, it was the smell of an almost dead animal, quite a large animal in fact.

It took Shenzi quite a while to find the source of the smell, but when she did, she cheered silently, the elephant was a huge lone bull, and the deep bloody gash on it's rear leg told her all she needed to know, it was near death from blood loss.

Shenzi moved in to make the kill, but paused when the bull, sensing the hyena's approach swung its tusks at her. Unfortunately, the bull had lost much blood from the deep wound on it legs, so instead of injuring or killing the hyena, she merely had to step between the tusks, brushing aside the trunk to reach the throat and deliver the killing bite.

Furnished with this bonanza of food, Shenzi momentarily consider what to do with her kill.
1412.title: Beef Bonanza

14121.content:
As Shenzi was considering what to do with the elephant, her stomach began to growl telling her exactly what 'it' wanted to do with the feast in front of her nose. She tried to ignore it, but it built up rapidly, so that after not very many moments, she began to dig in, devouring everything she could.

When Shenzi finally came to her senses, she found herself on her side, all but groaning from the pressure in her stomach, which felt just short of bursting. Groaning, she went to massage her stomach, but stopped when it only seemed to make things worse.

As a little more time passed, Shenzi realised she was way outside her safe zone, and with evening beginning to come on, she knew she had to get back to the pack or risk becoming a meal for something even nastier than herself, and so tried to struggle to her paws.
14121.title: Banquet

141212.content:
It was a few long painful moments before Shenzi was able to finally push herself up. Feeling her weight, she just wanted to lie down again and let her meal digest, but she knew it wasn't safe, she had to get home.

Unfortunately, it took longer than Shenzi anticipated to get home, she wasn't very mobile at the best of times these days, and her tightly packed belly meant she now had to waddle to keep from disturbing it too much.

Finally though, Shenzi did get home, to greeted by Banzai, who asked, "Geez, where've you been Shenz', you look way bad." The matriarch mumbled something, before waddling unsteadily over to her spot, and almost falling down. Exhausted from the long drag home, and torpid from the already begun digestion, she was asleep in moments.

"Rrm," Shenzi murmured, waking the next morning. Someone was nudging her, but it took her a few more moments look over "B'nzai?"

"Good morning Shenzi," Banzai replied, "feeling okay?"

"Mm, yeah," Shenzi said, yawning, then rising, "bit heavier but fine otherwise."

"Good," Banzai said. He was silent for a few moments, then asked, "Where were you yesterday?"

"Um..." Shenzi replied, trying to decide whether to lie and keep her secret, or just tell the truth.
141212.title: Long Way Home

1412122.content:
Caught off-guard, Shenzi couldn't think of a believable lie, so finally said, "I found an elephant carcass yesterday, barely dead, and at my fill, and a bit more."

Banzai thought about this for a few moments, then asked, offended, "and you didn't tell us, why?"

"I was hungry," Shenzi replied, "I wanted to come back and tell you, but I started eating instead." Feeling that this wasn't a good thing to say, she asked, "you want me to show you where it is?"
1412122.title: Spilling The Beans

choices: Shenzi is full after one troth load
Shenzi is still hungery after one troth load
There's a malfunction and the cell beguins to flood with food
1413.content:
Everything went black as Shenzi colapsed to the ground with a dart sticking out of her neck.
"You know that this isn't legal."
"Well duh I know it isn't legal, that's why we are getting a hyena. Almost everyone cares about the wolfs in those protected wildlife centers, but the hyena's are not that popular so if one of them is missing they would think it was by natural causes."
"I still think this was a bad idea"

Shenzi rustled around a bit before comming to her senses. She knew she wasn't in the jungle any more and was probebly in trouble too because she was without the power in numbers. Her suroundings were also alien, as if she was in a large shiny square cave with a troth in it.
"Man, this place is weird" Shenzi said to herself.

Two men on the other side of a one way mirror stood at the controls.
"You know, if my calculations are correct, the food we will be giving her will make her gain weight incredibly fast."
"Stop worrying, we tested this on other dogs and they are fine."
"But we are talking about a hyena, that is a little bit diffrent than a dog."
"Tell you what, if she does get fat then we will not kill her and continue feeding her the formula untill she naturaly dies, but if she dosn't then we will let her go."
"Alright, but did I mention that..."
"Yes, I know, it's highly addicting, that's what the boss wants."

An autible rumble was present in the area as Shenzi's stoumach rumbled, and just then to her delight, the troth started to magicaly fill with a brownish mixture of what appered to be meat and gravy. Her claws slipped around on the metal floor as she slid to the troth and buried her head into it.

"The troth fills it'self so whenever he's hungery then it will be full."
"That's a she"
"Whatever"
1413.title: Test subject

choices: It was just her stomach digesting.
14131.content:
After the troth was cleaned out, the hyena femme stepped back and dropped down on her back. Her big hyena belly was heaving up and down in exhaustion.

Shenzi was incredibly bloated where she layd. She had eaten so much meat and her belly had expanded to it's very limit. That not being small.

She tried to get up, but the pressure in her stomach was to painful. She decided to just lie down til her stomach setteled and reminded herself not to eat so fast the next time.

Then Shenzi heard a noise
14131.title: Full after one troth

141311.content:
Shenzi looked up with interest as a series of noises made its way down one wall of the cave, then an opening appeared. Another time she might have tried to make an escape, but right now she knew she just wasn't fast enough. In any case, the opening didn't last long, just enough for the mysterious jailers the dump in a stunned jackal, before it disappeared.

Shenzi turned to watch the jackal, It wasn't moving at all, but it was breathing, so at least it was alive.

After a while, the Jackal woke up and looked around, quickly focussing on Shenzi and backing away, obviously scared. This dismayed the hyena just a bit, so she tried to think of ways to gain its confidence.
141311.title: Companion

1413112.content:
Shenzi sat down, so as not to look threatening. The jackal was still scared, but did not get any closer. "Don't be scared..." Shenzi said softly. "I won't hurt you...it can get a bit lonely in here sometimes...there's no way I could catch up to you anyway." The Jackal was still scared, but took a step closer; she whimpered as her scrawny stomach growled. It was a high pitched whine that pleaded for food, unlike the deep rumbles from Shenzi's belly that demanded food. "Ohhh...hungry? Come on, follow me, there's lots of food over here!" Shenzi turned around and waddled to the through. The Jackal waited, but eventually followed when a safe distance behind Shenzi.

Shenzi was waiting at the trough. The Jackal approached more slowly now, but could smell the food, driving her stomach crazy. She finally reached the trough and took a sip...and then dunked her head and gorged herself. Shenzi giggled, and joined the Jackal in the feast.

The Jackal was lying on her back, rubbing her overstuffed belly: it was perfectly round and the size of a basketball. Finally, she spoke: "What...what kind of food is that...? Urp!" Shenzi, who was still eating slowly, paused to answer. "I don't know, but it is wonderful..." Jackal belched again. "Ohhh, I know...I want more, but I'm seriously fit to burst..." Shenzi belched, having finished the trough. "Urp...I'm quite stuffed myself..." She lied down next to Jackal, yawning. She then giggled: Jackal was already fast asleep.

[I can't think of a name for Jackal, next writer do that, please.]
1413112.title: Invite it over

141312.content:
For a few moments, Shenzi wondered what the noise was and whether it was dangerous, then it came again, longer this time, and a little louder, and she realised it was her stomach beginning the work of digesting the massive meal. Of course, digestion took time and resources, and so she was soon asleep.

When Shenzi awoke the next morning she quickly discovered the effect the meat was having on her, she was quite a bit bigger now, and that worried her, not that she was bigger, but she'd grown 'so much' bigger overnight.

Shenzi rose, with some difficulty, and as she did so, the smell of the meat washed over her, making her realise how hungry she was, even as she worried about it.
141312.title: Digesting Her Situation

choices: Shenzi go's ahead and tries to eat the next troth of food
1413121.content:
Shenzi couldn't help but waddle over towards the troth of food, her large belly shifting from side to side as rolls bunched up on her legs. She then stuck her head into the troth and began eating again, the wonderful flavor rushing over her. Her neck and cheeks swelled slightly as she tried to eat as much and as quickly as she could.

Shenzi's worries was drowned out by the food as she grew. In her mind, she always wanted power, but the reason she wanted power was because she wanted to live a nice and cushy life. Well, even though this strange place wasn't exactly Pride Rock, the food was great and she herself was becoming quite cushy.

When she got to the bottom of the troth, Shenzi looked a bit bloated as her stomach touched the ground. Yet she watched as the troth refilled itself, Shenzi drooling at the sight, but was she able to eat more, she wanted to real badly. Maybe a nice nap might give her some room.

The differance was that this additive was many times more potent than others. Anyone who took even a sniff of this would be peckish even if they'd just eaten three christmas dinners by themselves.

So for our fattened hyena actually eating it means that she will always be hungry no matter how full she is for the rest of her life.

She waddled back over to the trough and at a more sedate pace began to dig in.

Later when she had truely had her fill she waddled back over to where she had been about to lay down for a nap. She idly noted in her food dazed state that her stomach now dragged across the ground at gave her considerable discomfert.

She yawned as she was about to let sleep claim her when her ears perked up at the familiar sound of the trough filling up again.

Her painfully tight stomach was growling in hunger already but she was about ready to collapse from exhaustion.

"Pretty much," the first man said.

Shenzi woke up, she was in her room with the same eerie white walls, and the calming yet-creepy, white marble floor. Shenzi sighed and decided to walk over to her trough which was filled, only she realized that she couldn't move!
She struggled in place as she tried to inch forward, but realized that she couldn't move ANYTHING, she trumpeted in frustration, wait...trumpeted?

Her stomach gurgling with hunger, Shenzi devoured what meat was left in the trough, before attempting to extricate herself from it's constriction.
141322.title: Food Bath

Shenzi struggled hard to escape the trough, having to fight both against its constriction, and against the constriction and weight of her own bulk. She almost made it as well, but was just about up when she felt her paw slip, and though she struggled hard to recover she was unable to prevent herself from falling back into the trough, though she managed to avoid serious injury.

In her struggles Shenzi had managed to move herself off the food pipe, and consequently the trough was beginning to fill up again, Panting with her exertions, the hyena felt her stomach growling, reminding her that it's last feed hadn't very big. She tried to resist her hunger, but it soon overcame her, and she was soon drinking down the liquid.

Shenzi finally had to stop drinking when she felt her stomach pressing painfully against her other organs, having expanded as much as it could out to the sides. There was now no hope of getting out of the trough, at least for now, as any attempt sent pains shooting along her belly, so with nothing else to do she lay down to digest.

When Shenzi awoke again, she found her predicament even worse than it had been before, her legs pressed even tighter against the trough by her mammoth belly, and its greater weight wasn't going to help either. Nevertheless, she was hell-bent on getting out, and so put every effort she had into rising.

Just as Shenzi was getting to the bottom of the trough, she bit into something harder than the meat. Even more curious now she pulled back, but the worm resisted, so she pulled harder and harder, till finally the worm came free with a 'pop'.

Unbeknownst the Shenzi, the worm was actually a sensor for the trough autofiller, and by pulling it out, she'd ensured that the filler would continue to work indefinitely.

When the Trough began to fill again, Shenzi still had room in her stomach, so she continued to eat, but as the filler was working constantly now, the trough was filling faster than she could eat, and began to spill over the lip onto the floor.

When she was finally full, Shenzi headed for the opposite corner to rest, ignoring the trough as it continued to overflow. As her stomach began to digest the huge meal, it left her torpid, and so she lay down to sleep, not noticing the ever growing puddle of food making its slow was towards her.

Some time later, Shenzi was awoken by a strange feeling on her fur. Still torpid, she turned to see what was going on, and found herself ankle deep in food, and it showed no signs of decreasing.

After a while searching, Shenzi finally found the hole where the food was coming out. it was a good sized hole, but she was sure she could plug it with something.

That something turned out to be herself, because, as Shenzi stepped up to try plugging it with a paw, she slipped, and instead of a paw coming down in the hole, it was her muzzle, stunning her slightly.

Recovering in a few moments, Shenzi tried to pull her muzzle out of the hole, but quickly found herself stuck, and worse was to come, because the impact had parted her lips, and so while her jaws were jammed shut, food was seeping into her mouth behind her teeth, slowly at first, but ever more rapidly, until it matched the flow of the pipe.

Shenzi tried to keep from swallowing, as more and more food entered her mouth, but the pressure forced it into her stomach anyway.

As Shenzi's stomach began to fill up, her struggles became ever more desperate, but no matter what she did, she seemed to be completely stuck.

It didn't take her long though, to realise that this wasn't much of an improvement, she was still stuck in here, her stomach packed tight with food and probably stretching, but nevertheless alive.

Time passed and Shenzi's stomach gurgled, beginning it's digestion process. Normally she'd be asleep by now, but the pressure from both her stomach and her throat kept her awake, just.

Not really believing her eyes at first Shenzi saw the faces of her two best hyena friends, and by the look on their faces they couldn't believe their eyes either.

As she came up to them the first thing that was said was a "What the heck has happen to you?!" from Banzai, "You dissapears for two days, and when you're back you look like you had been eating a whole hippo!" he proclaims while Ed just nods agreeing. "Well, it's a long story guys." Shenzi says. "We got all day." Banzai replies quickly. "I don't know myself really how it started," Shenzi started the story, "but from one second I went from falling asleep on the savannah to waking up in a weird cave." "What do you mean weird?" Banzai asked. "It was all white and blank spaces everywhere. It didn't look like there was any way of getting in or out of it." Both Banzai and Ed looked more and more scared of what kind of weird place's Shenzi had seen. "And before I knew it there was a sudden small round hole in one of the walls where food started to come out of." "Food?!" Banzai said surprised over hearing the magic word. "Yes." Shenzi replied, "Do you mean like Zebra's and Gazelle's and Hippo's?" Banzai asked curious while Ed just started drooling by the thought of all the foods. "No, more like some kind of already chewed up food." Shenzi answered. "It didn't look very appetizing at first, but as soon as I took and started to taste it, it felt wonderful, and I found myself not being able to stop eating it." "We can clearly see that." Banzai said in a snarky remark making Ed laught a little. "But soon I found the whole place starting to become filled with the food, and it was more then I could possibly chow down. I almost drowned."

The last sentance made both Banzai and Ed silence for a moment. "You mean you could have drowned in food?" Banzai asked. Shenzi replied with a simple "Yes." "Wow." Banzai said, "I would never have guesed that would have been the way for you to go." "Neither did I, but luckily things didn't end like that." Shenzi said. "Yeah, how did you manage to survive?" Banzai asked with Ed also showing huge interest. "Just like how the food suddenly apperaed out of a wall, I could feel the ground under me disappear." Shenzi explained. "So food can come out of the walls and the ground can suddenly disappear? This place really sound weird." Banzai said a s both he and Eds minds felt blown by this strange place Shenzi was describing. "But what happen then?" "Then I could feel myself suddenly be swiming for my life in a wild river, with no hopes of surviving." Shenzi said as she saw both her friends being on their sets about how it would end. "But then I suddenly saw the light at the end of the tunnel..." "No! Don't walk into the light!" Banzai suddenly shouted. "Not that light you fool." Shenzi said irritated, "The light of the moon. I was suddenly outside in the wide open savannah once again. I got myself up on land again and searched for a good place to sleep during the night and found that place." She said and pointed in the direction of where the bushes where laying. "And once the day arrived I took and searched for someone that could help me, and found you."

"So we can call the additive a success." Said the second.

"Yeah. We put this in anything edible and we can make a fortune no matter how bad the food is."

A high five echos in the room. They turn back to watch their ever growing experiment.

"What do we do now? We don't need her." Questioned the second

"Well we just...." The first paused paused. His face comtemplative. "Well I guess we could realese her back into the wild."

"Like that?"

"Do we care?"

"Well nnow that the mention it."

"What!" Said the first annoyed. "Don't tell me youve gotten used to her."

A nod. The first scientist sighs.

"Well we can't give her too the zoo. They'll be wondering how we got a morbidly obese Hyena in the first place. And we can't just stick her in the wild since she couldn't fend off a merkat right now."

"So we have to keep her?"

He didn't want to admit it but after playing about with the idea's that came to mind a few times he came to the conlusion that unless they were willing to kill her or do jail time they had no choice but to Keep the Hyena.

"Sigh. Yes doug we have to keep the Hyena." Said the still un-named scientist.

Doug's mouth split into a wide smile as he looked back into the room.

"So what now. You wanted it so now you have to decide what were going to do with her now the experiments over."

Doug thought for a minute before coming to a decision.
141331122222.title: Something else

1413311222222.content:
"The important part of the test is over: doesn't mean we can't keep testing, right Jake?" he said, his expression almost making the formerly unnamed scientist check to see if a light bulb had appeared over his head.
"That's the du- no, wait, I think I get it. We can test to see if it has any incredibly adverse effects, such as insanity or, I don't know, something else along those lines." Jake said, hand having migrated to his chin. He turned back to face the lioness, still gorging herself on the addictive substance. He could visibly see her gaining layers of fat, and quickly wrote down, "consumption increases digestion speed," on his clip-board.

After several...
1413311222222.title: Voluntary(?) Testing

choices: She awakens to find the troth stopped.
She awakens to find it's still flowing and up to her thighs.
1413312.content:
She soon realized the level of the food continued to rise. She figured that if there was no limit to the food she might end up drowning in the stuff. She also knew that she required sleep and couldn't eat at that time so she had to eat like she never ate before or burst from overeating trying. She'd rather die from eating than drown in food.
With that she dunked her muzzle into the troth and pulled out a full mouth of food and swallowed it quickly before diving back in. After several mouthfuls entered her gut she took a moment to breath and then dive back in. She saw her efforts were showing little improvement and tried to hasten her past more and more until she was dunking her entire head into the troth and chugging it down. All the while her stomach stretched to hold the food and even when she felt full she kept eating. She was also tiring from the food, but she kept telling herself not to stop till as long as she was awake. Finally, after several more dunks in the troth she was was too woozy to even see straight. She took a few steps back and fell asleep.
1413312.title: Drinking for her Life

142.content:
Still hungry, despite having recently finished a gazelle, Shenzi walked to the mouth of her cave and roared, "Banzai, Ed!"

"You wanted us Shenzi," Banzai said when they arrived.

"Yep," Shenzi said, "I'm hungry."

"What," Banzai said, but you just..." At a loss for words, he waved a paw at the now picked clean

"Yeah, I know I just," said Shenzi, "but I'm still hungry, so you're going to go out hunting."

"Oh, I am am I," Banzai asked, "why don't you come out with us?"

"Don't mouth off to me," Shenzi growled, "I'm hungry, and you're going to hunt for me."

Ed whined when the two hyena locked gazes. He knew Banzai would lose, Shenzi was jusy too overbearing for him not to, but it didn't reduce the tension any.

Finally, Banzai conceded, turning away and saying, "come on," before Marching out of the cave.
142.title: Taskmaster

choices: All of the gazelle was eaten
All of the gazelle was eaten, and Shenzi wanted MORE
1421.content:
Once the two hyenas left, Shenzi was able to get down on her larger belly and take a nap. Well, she didn't get much sleep though because her belly kept rumbling and waking her up, but it was better than standing.

In around half an hour Shenzi could hear the two grunting hyenas dragging somthing towards the mouth of the cave. What ever it was, it was a bit bigger than a gazelle, well, so she thought. When the two brought the carcass closer Shenzi could see that it was a large gazelle, as in an obese gazelle.

"Here you go Shenzi" Banzai said as he pushed the flabby carcass over, but Shenzi had already stuck her head into it eating as if she had been starving for years.

"Uh... enjoy?" Banzai said before sitting there watching Shenzi eat the incredibly fat gazelle.

When Shenzi was done eating...
1421.title: Success

14211.content:
Shenzi belched and lied on her back, her near spherical belly sticking out almost as far as her legs. "Are you finished? asked Banzai, eying the meat. Shenzi hiccuped and nodded. "Go ahead...I'm stuffed!" Banzai dove into the meet, as dd Ed, who was already sneaking a few nibbles when Shenzi gave the Okay.

Shenzi yawned, patting her belly. Naturally, she was sleepy after a big meal, so she waddled to the spot she normally slept in, and lied down, and was fast asleep almost instantly.
14211.title: Half the gazelle was eaten

choices: "No your not, your the best looking hyena I know"
142111.content:
Shenzi sighed as she woke up the next morning, yawning loud as she rolled sluggishly onto her feet, waddling to the mouth of her cave, seeing Banzai and Ed had already gone off somewhere to hunt, she laid down at the mouth of her cave, sighing to herself.

A couple of hours dozing later, she heard cackling, perking her ears up she looked over to see three Hyena females laughing as they looked at her, making her scowl. The middle female, possibly the leader let out a long laughing fit. "wow, look girls, a Hippo so far out from the watering hole, what are the odds?" she said, cackling madly with her friends

Shenzi snarled at the three, frightening them. "go jump off a cliff you scrawny little harlots!" She yelled, making the girls scowl and walk away, leaving her to sit back down on her flabby haunches, slowly looking over her massive fat body and letting out a sigh. ".....they're right....I am just a hippo in Hyena's clothing..." she said morosely to herself, getting up and waddling to the back of her cave, laying down and starting to cry.

Shenzi would have never resorted to crying back when she and her pack were at pride rock, yet, now as she lay there, fat and in her eyes, ugly, she felt like all her former toughness had softened with her body.

She lay there crying till the sun sat low in the sky, before she heard something behind her, slowly turning her chubby head to look, rolls forming on her fat neck as she bent it round to look, seeing Banzai looking at her in concern.

"...You ok Shen?" he asked, sitting next to her. Shenzi made a tough face, wiping her eyes with a paw. "yeah...fine..." she said, looking away, a slight pink blush tinging her cheeks.

Banzai narrowed his eyes. "Shenzi...what happened?" he asked, not believing her facade of toughgirl.

Shenzi looked at him with a slight scowl, before sighing, her look changing to one of depression. "...I'm fat..." she said, looking deeply ashamed, before hearing Banzai chuckle. "yeah i know Shenzi, you have been since we came here." he said, smirking at her, laughing as she looked at him in embarrassment.

"s-shut up Banzai!" she stuttered, growling, thought this only made her chubby face look pouty, making Banzai grin even more at her.

"whats the problem Shen?" he asked, smiling at her.

Shenzi blushed, looking away. "...i-i'm ugly..." she said, biting her lip, Banzai looking at her and saying...
142111.title: Shenzi wakes the next morning.

choices: A Hippo..which Shenzi eats on her own
14213.content:
An incredibly loud belch came from Shenzi as she finished she snapped to Banzai and Ed

"More!"

"What!?" exclaims Banzai as Ed just laughed meekly

"You heard me! Feed..Me..More!!" snaps Shenzi as she groaned slightly and rested back, letting her binge of the obese gazelle digest as Banzai and Ed look to each other as Shenzi's monstrous belly heaved with every heavy breath, Shenzi's recent bulk made her easier to tire, not that she did much apart from binging and ordering for more food.

"WHY ARE YOU STILL HERE!!!" bellows Shenzi and Ed and Banzai head out to get the almost tyrannically Shenzi another feast to try and control her.

After an hour Banzai and Ed returned with.
14213.title: All of the gazelle was eaten, and Shenzi wanted...

choices: The Hyenas Bring Shenzi Her Elephant To Devour.
The Hyenas, Apart From Banzai and Ed, Abandon Shenzi.
142132.content:
"Yo, Ed, we gotta do something about Shenzi, she's out of control!" Banzai grumbled to Ed as they and several other hyenas returned after an hour of hunting with something that they hold would calm Shenzi down and fill her monstrous appetite.

They dragged in the carcass of a hippo that the group killed as Shenzi, now with the previous meal digested inside of her felt her belly rumble, she was starving as she showed how out of shape she was by grunting, groaning and struggling to even make it up to her feet, she was so obese and lazy that she gave up trying to pull herself up.

"Good work, boys...bring it here." Shenzi demanded as she struggled to roll herself onto her side, her blubbery body working against her as she finally managed to roll onto her side, but even that small movement had tired her. The gigantic female hyena panted and wheezed, like breathing was an issue for her, but she shrugged it off and looked on with piggish glee as the male hyenas brought the dead hippo in front of Shenzi.

"Mmmm, come to Big Momma!" Shenzi laughed as she started to make a pig of herself, tearing into the dead hippo carcass like a hyena possessed, the familiar sounds of chomps, grunts and belches could be heard as Shenzi's rampage of gluttony continued, however, as Ed and Banzai tried to tuck in, Shenzi selfishly swiped at them, not intending to share.

"Did I say that you boys could eat??" Shenzi barked out with a mouth full of food as she continued to pig out as Banzai tried to defend himself as he got increasingly annoyed at the power drunk Shenzi.

"Hey, Shen', we did all the work and-" Shenzi responded by snarling back and giving him a death glare, which got Banzai to shut up. "I'm not stopping you from going and getting a snack or two, but I'm the ruler and I gotta eat like one...go on, scram, let me enjoy my snack...be back here in an hour so you can get me more!" Shenzi demanded.

"There's no way you can be still-" Banzai said only for Shenzi to grab him by the collar and pull him towards her fat, obese body as Shenzi breathed heavily thanks to her obesity and growled out. "I said...get me more food...unless you want to be food!" Shenzi snapped as she threw Banzai away and continued to gobble up the hippo on her own.

Half an Hour Later

"BWWWWOOOOOOOOOOOOOUUUUUUUUURRRRPPPPPP!!!!"

A monstrous belch could be heard exploding from Shenzi's cave, it was obvious that she'd finished the hippo, it was picked clean down to the bone and Shenzi looked more obese and immobile than she ever had before, the force of her mighty belch shook the surrounding area and sent birds and other animals fleeing; which meant that the rest of the hyenas couldn't eat.

Leaning on her back, Shenzi breathed heavily, wheezing and gurgling in discomfort as she whimpered in pain at how much she ate, but she wanted even more food and she didn't care how much pain it would cause her, her limitless appetite overruled everything as the rest of her hyena clan walked, reluctantly into the lair of their immobile tyrant, Shenzi casually picked some hippo meat from her teeth with one of her claws and panted out.

"Was that me?? Oops, my bad." she sarcastically 'apologised' for her almighty belch, but it was obvious she didn't mean it as Shenzi pondered what to eat next, before it then hit her. "Go and get me an elephant!" as the hyenas looked at each-other in shock as Banzai went to say something only for the blob of flab that was Shenzi to grunt out. "No, Banzai, I'm not joking!"

What happens next?
142132.title: A Hippo..which Shenzi eats on her own

1422.content:
Shenzi was getting quite hungry by the time Banzai and Ed returned, and her mood, never good at the best of times, wasn't helped by the fact that they returned without a kill.

"What the hell is wrong with you," Shenzi said, "I told you to go out and get me something."

"Yeah, and we were out there ages," Banzai said, "not every hunt's successful you know."

Shenzi knew she should calm down, and shouldn't blame the others for being successful, but her hunger seemed to have elevated several places, so instead she said, "Why you no good, pathetic little..."

"Pathetic, me," Banzai growled, "take a look at yourself one day, then you'll see pathetic."

Shenzi was silent for a moment, then said, "okay, you just crossed the line," and charged.

Banzai hadn't expected the charge, but he was spoiling for a fight, and he got one. It was quickly over though, Shenzi's bulk made her slow and quick to tire, and she ended up on her back with him pinning her down, "I want an apology."

"You're not getting one," Shenzi replied, and tried to dislodge Banzai, but he didn't budge, and her weight and exhaustion worked against her.

"I want an apology," Banzai repeated, then bent down, "and you're going to give it to me."
1422.title: Tussling

1423.content:
It was sooner than Shenzi expected before the two males were back, or, as it turned out, Ed was. "Ed, what's going on," Shenzi asked the frantic hyena, "where's Banzai?" The male mumbled and waved his arms about trying to convey what had happened to him and his companion, and while the Matriarch could somewhat understand him normally, he was going too fast to be intelligible, "hey, slow down." Several repeats later, she still didn't understand, so hit him and said, "look you're going to fast, slow down, what happened to you two out there?"

Finally, Ed managed to convey that they'd been ambushed by several lionesses, and that he'd barely escaped with his life, and didn't know what had happened to Banzai. A chill ran up Shenzi's spine, but she said, "okay, lets get a party together."

"Hang on," said one of the hyenas in the group Shenzi had assembled, "'your' lackeys get ambushed while they're out hunting for your private food supply, and you want 'us' to risk our lives to rescue them, no way, no way in heck."

Shenzi looked around the assembled crowd, and saw that most of the hyenas were agreeing with the male who'd spoken out. "Not even if I go," Shenzi asked, hoping that would drum up a bit of loyalty.

"You you look like you could do with getting out a bit more yourself," said another hyena, and the crowd was soon in raucous laughter.

Shenzi sighed in frustration, before turning to Ed and saying, "okay, looks like we're on our own. The male whined at that, but she replied, "we're not going to get any help out of them and I'm not leaving Banzai out there alone." A thought occurred, and she added, "and I probably could do with getting out a bit more, so let's go."
1423.title: Friend in trouble

14232.content:
"Hey Ed," Shenzi said, as she followed him back to where He and Banzai had been attacked, "would you say I'm fat?"

Ed's reply, a laugh as always, was definitely affirmative, and also sounded sarcastic.

"Yeah, I guess it was kind of a stupid question," Shenzi said, "but I mean, seriously, d'you think I need to lose weight?"

This time, Ed's reply seemed more thoughtful, but he managed to convey that 'he' wasn't struggling with this fairly mild speed.

This made Shenzi realise just how out of shape she was. Once, the speed she was doing now would have been cubs play, now it was the fastest she could keep up. That would change though, she decided, as soon as they got Banzai and got home, she'd start to lose some of this weight.

Shenzi and Ed were getting close to the site where he and Banzai had been attacked, when a voice behing them said, "oh-ho-ho, what do we have here?"

Shenzi spun, or at least turned round, to find herself facing a pair of lions. They weren't particularly big or powerful as lions went, but even the smallest lion would be a match for any three hyenas in their prime, but there was only her and Ed now, and she was nowhere near being in top condition. "Looks like a couple o' hyenas to me," said the other, though she had difficult telling between the two.

"Looks like it," the first lion said, "and you know what we do with hyenas around here don't you?"

"Do tell," Shenzi said.

"Gladly," the first lion said, "we have a little...fun, with them, teach them not to overstep the boundaries."

"Yeah," said the second lion, "just like we did with those two this morning, remember that?"

"Yup," the first lion said, then frowned at Ed, "don't I...oh you got away did you." His sadistic smile returned, and he said, "an' I see you've brought us another little friend to play with too."

"So you're the ones who attacked my mate," Shenzi asked, glancing beside her,Ed was struck dumb with terror, unable to move.

"That's right," the first lion said, "and now we have to decide what to do with you."
14232.title: In Real Trouble

143.content:
"Excuse me," said a voice from the mouth of the den, "is this space taken?"

"Y..." Shenzi began, meaning to say, 'yes it is', but the words died on her tongue as the gazed at the new arrival, a seriously handsome male.

"Oh, right," the male said, "sorry about that, I'll be going then."

"No," Shenzi said, "no, I mean, sorry, yes, it's sorta taken, but you can sleep here as well, if you want." Her brain didn't seem to have been involved in any of the statement, all too taken up in analysing the newcomer's looks.

"Well thank you," the male said approaching. Seemingly unaware of the effect he was having on Shenzi, he said, "you're staring."

At this point Shenzi managed to regain some self control, and tore her eyes away. She spent a few moments gathering her thoughts and making sure her heartbeat was back to normal, before replying, "sorry, it's just that you're so, so..."

"Yes," the newcomer asked, "I'm so, what?"

"Handsome," Shenzi finally managed to blurt out, "I've never seen a more handsome hyena than you."

"A lot of females have said that to me," the newcomer said, "but never really any in such, obvious, positions of power."

"Obvious," Shenzi asked, still refusing to look at the newcomer in case her brain stopped working again.

"Quite obvious, yes," the newcomer said, "after all, I can't imagine a normal hunter could eat so generously as you."

"Well I am quite powerful, yes," Shenzi said, then finally got it together enough to ask, "who are you anyway, where are you from?"

"My name's Pendeza," the newcomer replied, "I've only recently arrived here from another pack, in fact I was just looking for somewhere to sleep when I came across this place."

"I guess I should welcome you then," Shenzi said, "my name's Shenzi by the way."

"Well I'm pleased to meet you Shenzi," Pendeza said, "and I'd like to thank you for offering me a place in your humble abode."

"Well I have to admit, it's been getting a bit lonely at night," Shenzi said, "my friends seem to be sleeping elsewhere more and more these days."

"Their loss," Pendeza said, lying down next to Shenzi, then asked, "do you mind if I share your meal right now?"

"Not at all," Shenzi replied, shifting the gazelle carcass to a position where Pendeza could get at it more easily, "go ahead."

"Thank you again for your hospitality," Pendeza said, "I'll be sure to make it up to you later."
143.title: Pendeza's Coming

1431.content:
"How're you feeling this morning Shenz'" Pendeza asked.

"Mm," Shenzi inquired sleepily. It took her a few more moments to wake up enough to reply, but when she did she shuffled her large form closer to her new friend, and murmured happily, "never better." In the back of her mind it surprised her how quickly her romance with Pendeza had blossomed when her relationship with Banzai had gone nowhere despite years of slog.

Pendeza was also surprised how quickly he'd gone from wandering rogue to high society, but counted it as just his good luck, and while Shenzi could be a little demanding at times, she was overall a nice female. She was also quite lonely, admitting that her few friends seemed to have gotten more and more distant as she gained weight. He himself didn't see why a little bit, or more than a bit as it was now, of weight should repel him, it never had him, but he was happy for the chance, both to make her life better, and to have a better life himself.

Glancing back at the food alcove, Pendeza saw there was still part of a zebra left over from the last hunt, so he asked Shenzi, "hungry yet love?"

"A little," Shenzi replied, then it hit her what Pendeza had just said, "love?"

"Um," Pendeza said realising himself what he'd just said, then recovered, "well, if you want to be, yes, if not, well I hope we can still be friends."

Shenzi was speechless now. Pendeza had apparently called her 'love' only off-handedly, but it still left her reeling, trying to decide how to deal with it. Should she agree to his apparently unspoken proposal and accept him as a mate or not?
1431.title: Love is in the air

1432.content:
"Hey Ed," Banzai said as he and his friend approached Shenzi's cave, "d'you think I've been a bit too hard on her about her weight?" In truth, he wasn't actually too bother about Shenzi's weight, but he was about her position, and by extension his own, and he knew that she could only maintain that position by being fit, which right now she most definitely wasn't.

Of course, all of Banzai's thoughts of making good with Shenzi vanished when he walked into her cave and found her in conversation, bordering on intimate, with another male, "Shenzi, who the hell is this?"

For a moment Shenzi froze, too terrified to move, before she managed to regain her composure and reply, "hello Banzai, meet Pendeza, he's a, friend."

"A friend," Banzai growled, immediately understanding the implication, "that was quick wasn't it, didn't take you long to find my replacement did it?"

"Did I say he replaced you," Shenzi asked, almost growling herself, "noo I didn't, and even if I did what does it matter, you were the one who walked out on me remember?"

Banzai didn't say anything to this, but instead assumed an attack posture, and let out a continuous growl that only tailed off when he saw Pendeza step in front of Shenzi to protect her, "get away from her."

"So that you can rip her apart," Pendeza growled in reply, "no."

"I'd never hurt Shenzi," Banzai snapped, "you I might just tear apart though."

"I'd lik..." Pendeza began.

"Enough," Shenzi yelled, interrupting them both, and drawing their attention to her. "Look," she said when she was sure she had their attention, "you're both great guys okay, I mean, Banzai you stuck with me through everything, and Pendeza, you're wonderful to be around, so can all just try to calm down and work something out, please?"
1432.title: Old Friends And New

1433.content:
"Am I going to like this place we're going," Shenzi asked as she followed Pendeza, eyes closed.

"Shenz', you gonna love it," Pendeza replied. He knew this was a lie, she'd hate what he had in store for if she knew, but 'he'd' love it.

A short time later, Shenzi, puffing now, asked, "how much further is it anyway?"

"Almost there," Pendeza replied, and indeed it was only a few dozen steps before they reached the place, which turned out to be a widish canyon, blocked off at one end by a rock fall, and with this end a scree slope that he'd barely managed to escape, Shenzi would have no chance.

"We're there," Shenzi asked as she bumped into Pendeza's rump.

"Just a few more steps," Pendeza urged.

Shenzi's eyes shot open as she felt the ground shift under her paws, but couldn't pull back because Pendeza then thumped her hard on the rear, forcing her forward, till she was riding the scree slope down into the canyon. She lay stunned at the bottom for a few moments, before managing to recover herself, at turn back to pendeza at the top, "what the heck was that for?"

"I'm sorry Shenzi, I really am," Pendeza, "I just couldn't help it."

"Oh you'll be sorry alright," Shenzi replied, "you just wait till I get out of here and I'll make you sorry of the day you were born."

"I'm sure you will," Pendeza said, "but you won't be getting out of there any time soon, believe me."

"Oh, won't I," Shenzi said, making her way over to the slope and climbing, but barely managed to get half a length up before the scree gave way and spilled her back down to the bottom. A second and third attempts were no more successful.

"You'll never make it," Pendeza replied as he watched Shenzi struggle, "heck, 'I' barely made it, so you'll stand no chance."

"Okay then," Shenzi said, deciding to heed Pendeza's words for now, "but tell me one thing, why?"

"I'm a control freak," Pendeza replied, "and I happen to like my ladies bigger, so this solves both things."

"By leaving me to die down here," Shenzi asked.

"Oh don't worry, I won't let you starve," Pendeza replied, disappearing from sight for a moment, before appearing at the side of the canyon, much closer, "in fact, here's a little appetiser, eat up," and dropping the gazelle carcass almost on top of Shenzi, "eat up."

Shenzi want to refuse the meal, to slim down and get out of here, and get revenge, but all too soon her new-found hunger kicked in and she fell to eating, which was followed by a digestion-laden nap.

When she woke up, Shenzi couldn't remember where she was for a moment, then the memories came flooding back, and she curse silently at Pendeza, who seemed to have disappear for now, and tried to decide what to do.
1433.title: Captivating Love

"Some jerk tricked me and trapped me down here. Can you get me out of here?" Shenzi asked. "Sure. I know the way out. Just climb out over here." He said as pointed to a hidden path. Shenzi quickly ran to the path and followed it up and out of the scree. She's so excited to get out, she gives Rahman a big hug. Rahman looked pleased and said "should we go get something to eat?"
