154232121.title: how they captured her.

choices: Loads of meat is brought to her
1542321212.content:
(This chapter was originally entered by Tarnishedice, but it accidently got removed along with another chapter that was deleted)

Out on Patrols for the pride lands, Fuli was as energetic as ever speeding across the plains to look out for troubles that might arise in the pride lands, as she was the fastest member of the lion guard Fuli was the best when it came to scouting out potential disasters and wrongdoings that went on around the Pride Lands. There were some people who hated and despised the help that the lion guard provided for other animals it was something that one particular clan of hyenas would always clash with the guard with as they always had a knack of getting in their way when it came to schemes that they had cooked up to get either more food, more land, or sometimes something obscure. Janja was their leader of this ragtag group, wanting nothing more than to terrorize the pride lands for his own selfish reasons he alone stalked the pride lands for ways to disrupt the peace that has been built around pride rock. “If the lion guard wasn’t around then I could get the idiots together and take over this miserable piece of land, they are always there meddling in things they have no right to be in” He thought to himself stalking around the hippo’s territory deep in thought of what to do with his recent failures that were caused by Kion and his lion guard, “they are just too strong as a group I don’t know what I can do with my clan to destroy this unity they have with each other.” Stalking around the area Janja saw something zoom by him that was always familiar to him, it was Fuli she had such grace and speed that zipping across the miles of plains was no sweat to her.


“Here you go, Mrs. Hippo some fresh Junta fruit from the antelope herding area, hope this will help your foot” Fuli cheerfully dropping the fruit by the Hippo’s feet, what the two didn’t realize was there was a third party who was listening into their conversations as they were having it Janja was wondering why Fuli was around this part of the area and why she wasn’t around the other members of the lion guard it was perplexing to the hyena. “I wish I could be as fast as you, my dear I could have just gotten the fruit my self with your speed, look at you your so lean” Mrs. Hippo said egging on the conversation complementing the young cheetah on how fit and limber she was, blushing at all the complements she was getting from the hippo she knew that she had to excuse herself before she became to big for her britches, “I mean I’m fine with myself but it I was a couple of hundred pounds lighter I could be quick to instead I lumber around slower than a snail thanks to all this fat” the woman carried on to say not even realizing she was saying as things just came out of her mouth without any provocations from Fuli. “Well I got to go now, thanks for the chat Mrs. Hippo” Fuli stated before speeding of too somewhere in the Pride lands to help other people out with problems before finally returning to the lion Guard, the conniving hyena Janja had gotten out of his hiding spot to scope out the area, see if anyone who he deemed to be his enemy was still in the area, “looks like the coast is clear for the moment, but that Hippo just gave me an idea that could work to help me take over this pathetic place” that will have the fastest one become the slowest, looks like I’m going to need those chumps to help me out with this plan, hope they can pull it off since they aren’t the brightest when it comes to this kind of stuff” Janja said making his way back to the out lands to meet with all the others of his little group.


Fuli began to make her rounds around the edge of the pride lands, the last of her rounds before she could finally go back to the den of the lion guard, “seems as iff all was safe here” Fuli said looking around for any disturbances that would be around, there wasn’t much around this area as most she could see was many rocks and dried sand, “guess that does it for looking for someone to help” Fuli stated looking forward to going back to the lion guard den, making her way back wasn’t going to be hard as she begun to make her way toward that way. “Oh no please help me” someone yelled hoping someone to hear them, Fuli didn’t exactly know who this person was but they needed help and she was there to provide this help, Fuli rushed over as fast as she could to find out who was asking for help and why they were so distraught over whatever was holding them there. Closer and closer Fuli got to the source of the yells for help, scanning the area for anything that would seem to be out of the ordinary to her the young cheetah finally found the source of the sounds of help, it was what seemed to be some kind of bird it, “are you hurt, I’m here to help” Fuli stated proudly standing a distance away from whatever kind of bird this way. The closer she got to the bird the more she begun to realize that this wasn’t a bird that she had seen before as it seemed almost like it was made of straw, before she could see the rest of this bird that cried for help something or someone had knocked her out not even knowing what happened with the bird.


Awaking from her slumber that was induced by some one there wasn’t anything around her to stick out where exactly she was, “how did I get myself into this” she wondered circling this large cave that Fuli found herself in, not even knowing how to get out all the young cub thought of was to start climbing out pf this unknown place, “I cant let you do that my dear Fuli, my associates made a great effort to get you here” a smug hyena stated looking at his prize as she tried to climb the ledge. “Janja I thought you would pull something like this, my friends will come to get me” Fuli hissed at her captor with hatred of this plan he had cooked up. “Don’t worry my dear I will take good care of you” Janja stated as…..
1542321212.title: Janja's Plan

choices: Fuli escaped the tackle, she has to escape (failed)
Forced to eat, her struggling makes the hyenas mad
15423212121.content:
Fuli didn’t quite understand why Janja had brought her into the out-lands, she thought that she would surely perish by the hand of this mad hyena, but she didn’t want to dwell on it for too long looking for a way to get out of this mess was all she cared about. The rocks seemed too steep for some one of her size and stature to climb it was too narrow and slippery for some one who was built for speed to maneuver through, it would seem though the hyenas that looked up to Janja as their leader didn’t have any trouble getting in and out of the massive cave system that they called home, she didn’t know how and idiot like Janja got the upper hand on her but it was all said and done she just now needed to escape from Janja clan’s grasp, all eyes were on Fuli, it was enough to make her skin crawl with how many Hyenas looked at her like she was a meal waiting to be devoured, “now that we have you the lion guard will fall into place, but we all have an idea to make you less likely to run away, and hey I’m sure you love what we all have plans for your I know the ladies will love to pamper you” Janja chuckled moving away from the high cliff that he and his goons occupied, Fuli just wondered how an idiot like Janja could outwit her in such a way that there was nothing that she could see that could be exploited for her own benefit. “I have to get out of here and tell Kion about how smart Janja has been with this plan, we need to be ready for his new clever demeanor” Fuli though eyes darted around the cave the light that shown from the skylight that led to the outside of the system of winding passages seemed to be her best bet for the moment. Beginning the long and arduous climb to the top was starting to look like it was no small feat for her to complete the rocks were very smooth, Fuli had a hard time getting up them with every new foothold she acquired she lost three it begun to look like this was a losing battle for Fuli.

“Uhh, boss shouldn’t we like stop her from climbing up, if she uh succeeds then Kion will come and beat us again” Nne asked his usual dumb worried smirk set upon his face unflinching like it was stuck there, “Naw, she will never get up here its hard enough for us hyenas to climb that rock wall no way a cheetah could its too slippery for her” Janja retorted to his underling with confidence that he was making the right decision when it came to his statement, there was just something that seemed like he was aware of that Fuli wasn’t and it annoyed her to no end, “oh it looks like the ladies are back with your first meal of many” he chuckled, moving away from the cliff-side away from the view of Fuli. Sliding down the rocks it seemed futile for her to try this way, hearing something was coming through the cave system that was behind her the smell of it was of various meats all from all around the Serengeti. Fuli was confused by this as knowing how the hyena's usually only thought of themselves especially Janja and his clans there had to be at least a dozen different kinds of carcass being pulled by some hyenas on a makeshift cart all this meat made Fuli wondering what Janja actually had up his sleeve when it came to dealing with Fuli seeing all the meat being presented to her only made her wondering more about the intention of her captor.

Without any warning the girls begun to pounce upon Fuli, with no context of what was happening to her Fuli began to struggle to get free from the grips of the two or three hyenas that pinned her down, the sounds of the rest ripping pieces off of the various meats could be heard from the corner where the carcasses were placed, “oh I get it they just didn’t want me to eat their food as it was them who captured all the food in the first place, I wouldn’t have eaten it anyways I already had lunch before Janja’s scheme got me into this situation anyways” Fuli though trying to rationalize the reason why she was being held down by these girls. “don’t worry it will be all over soon” one of them chuckled, what did this mean exactly Fuli wondered not knowing that her question would be answered soon. Like a conga line of food all the hyena’s begun to line line up food in mouth to be fed into her mouth, seeing this strange line up only made the young cheetah fearful about what was going to happen to her, struggling to get free from her captors seemed impossible but she had to try it was her only way. Not knowing if her plan would even work all she knew is that she didn’t want any part of what these hyenae were thinking about what they were going to do to her, even if it was going to be a feeble attempt Fuli would do anything to escape.
15423212121.title: Tackled

choices: Fuli eats all she can eat, the hyena's stop feeding her
Fuli is forced to eat way more than she can
154232121212.content:
Fuli didn’t know what Janja was trying to accomplish with whatever his plan was when he thought of capturing the worn out Fuli, Janja isn’t what scared her in the slightest, she knew she had to escape from his grasp and report back to Kion, the clutch of these female hyenas was quite strong pinning her down to what Fuli believed to be their way to stop her from eating the plump gazelle that was foolish enough to wander into the Outlands but this was overkill, the female hyenas surrounded Fuli with one still on top of the cheetah holding her down with such force that it was impossible for her to get out from under this older hyena. Mouths full of bits of meat from the carcass that they had just captured, glaring with intent at Fuli only made the cub that more comfortable, the smell of blood wafted through the cave, the glares the female hyenas were giving her only made Fuli more uncomfortable about the situation she found herself in. Janja just looked down at his clan circling the Cheetah, like a pair of vultures ready to strike they were all in position to enact the marvelous plan that he had running through his head, sure he knew that it was going to take more than what he had at the moment to fully realize it, but this was something he was willing to sacrifice to put this snobby cheetah in her place.

         “Hope you enjoy your first meal of many, Fuli” chuckled Janja in his typical hyena fashion, giving a nod to what seemed like the leader of all the females that were stuck in the pit with Fuli, wicked grin plastered on the leader’s face, she chuckled stated coyly “have fun girls make sure she is very well fed.” Before Fuli could get a word in edge wise meat was being shoved into her gaping maw, taken aback by the brutal shoving that the female hyenas started Fuli scared at what they were doing begun to struggle to be released from her confinement of being on the ground. Breathing began to become a struggle her saliva mixed with the chunks of meat shoved into her mouth made a thick like gravy substance, Fuli had two options either she swallow the meat or die from choking to death on the meat. With a hard filled “Gulp” sound coming from her only made the hyenas laugh that annoying laugh that they always murmured from their lips, laughing at how Fuli struggled to eat the meat that was in her mouth it was hilarious to them, this was only to continue for Fuli there wasn’t going to be any kind of escape for the young cheetah this was all she was going to know if Janja had anything to say about her current situation.

         One after another more hyenas ripped off pieces of meat from the dead gazelle only for it end up in Fuli’s stomach, she tried to resist their constant feedings, closing her mouth in defiance of whatever Janja had planned for her seemed like the only way she could stop the barrage her stomach was getting. Already bloated from meat that was forced into her stomach there was no way she could eat any more food, that was just something that the hyenas just ignored as meat was always near Fuli’s mouth to be shoved in without warning, Fuli wondered if Janja was trying to murder her by making her explode, if this was the case then Fuli wasn’t going to go down fighting it. She always like to be alone scouting the area for the lion guard but this time it really bit her in the butt, all she could do was be as tight-lipped as she could be, struggling back and forth did nothing to alleviate her current situation “just give up my dear your not escape, just accept our hospitality and enjoy your self” the female hyena said circling Fuli looking at her at every angle enjoying the new bloated look that Fuli was having. Tears began to mist from the cheetah’s eyes she didn’t know if the lion guard would come for her all she knew was it was becoming more and more difficult for her to keep her mouth shut, the hyenas slowly but surely begun to open her mouth for more meat to be shoved down her throat by a patiently waiting chuckling hyena to finish her mission given to her by Janja.
